content: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: SkillDzire Date: Thu, Jul 18, 2024 at 2:52 PM Subject: Join AI master series by SkillDzire in association with AICTE To:   *Who can attend*:     -     For Students, Faculties & Working Professionals    -     Those who wants to Upskill in AI Domain with Expert Guidance  You are at the right time, at the right place to learn Artificial Intelligence from scratch, plus this is your best opportunity to learn from industry experts with 14+ years of honest experience.     -     Start Date: *July 24th*    -     Timings: 7 PM - 8:30 PM    -     Free Certification  *What will you learn in the 21 day master class series*:     -     Day 1: Python Programming Fundamentals    -     Day 2: Variables, Data Types & Operators    -     Day 3: Basic Input & Output Operations    -     Day 4: Control Flow Statements    -     Day 5: Functions & Modules in Python    -     Day 6: Introduction to AI, ML, and DL    -     Day 7: Data Collection from Different Sources, Data Cleaning    -     Day 8: Introduction to NumPy for Numerical Computing    -     Day 9: Introduction to Pandas for Data Manipulation and Analysis    -     Day 10: Data Transformation & Visualization    -     Day 11: Introduction to Matplotlib for Visualization    -     Day 12: Overview of Scikit-Learn Library for Machine Learning in Python    -     Day 13: Supervised Learning: Classification & Regression    - subject: Fwd: 15-Day Professional Training in SQL
content: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Yukta Gupta Date: Mon, Jul 1, 2024 at 11:57 AM Subject: 15-Day Professional Training in SQL To: Sir/Madam   Dear Sir/Madam,  SQL is one of the most important skill recruiters look for in business and data analyst hiring.  With Turnip's *15-Day SQL Training Certificate Course*, participants get 24x7 live server access for *fully experiential learning*.  The course is suitable for all scholars aspiring for jobs in research, analytics and data science. It can be conducted as a skill development or value added activity, MOOC certification or professional training/internship program.  * Register to Start the Course *  *Course benefits*  ✅  15-Day self-paced journey developed by Dr. Rahul Kapoor ✅   Fully experiential learning as per NEP 2020 ✅   Course starts immediately after registration and email verification ✅   High quality videos with lifetime access ✅   15-Day *Professional Training Certificate* shareable on LinkedIn ✅   Reduced fee: *₹395/-* (incl. certificate)  *Official course page*  The course has received over 500 testimonials. Please read some on the official course page and check out *upgraded certificate sample: turnip.co.in/sql-course *  *Course author*  Dr. Rahul Kapoor has used SQL for over 12 years as a researcher and data architect for big data applications. His first analytics SaaS product, IPGRAM, was acquired by a UK firm in 2021.  *Please forward the email to all students and faculty.*  Best regards,  Yukta Gupta | Marketing Manager turnip.co.in ------------------------------  Sent by Turnip Innovations Pvt. Ltd. Best regards, Yukta Gupta | Marketing Manager turnip.co.in Sent by Turnip Innovations Pvt. Ltd. subject: Announcing TEDx CHARUSAT :: Ingenious Creations
content: Dear CHARUSAT Family Members, Greetings!!  Faculty of Technology and Engineering (FTE), Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT) is going to host *TEDx CHARUSAT *on September 24, 2024. This event promises to be inspiring and thought-provoking, showcasing innovative ideas and compelling stories from a diverse range of speakers.  *Event Details:*     - *Date:* September 24, 2024    - *Venue:* CHARUSAT Campus (Exact venue details will be shared on later    date)    - *Time:* 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM  *TEDx CHARUSAT* aims to bring together the brightest minds, fostering an environment where ideas can be shared, discussed, and celebrated. Under the theme *"Ingenious Creations",* we will explore groundbreaking ideas and revolutionary innovations that have the potential to change the world. We believe that every participant will leave the event with new perspectives and a renewed sense of curiosity.  *Call for Speaker Recommendations:* As we prepare for this exciting event, we are looking for identification of exceptional speakers. If any staff member has any close contacts or knows of individuals who have a powerful story, innovative idea, or unique perspective to share, please refer them to us. We are looking for speakers who can inspire, challenge, and engage our audience.  *How to Recommend a Speaker:* Please send your speaker recommendations to  *tedx@charusat.ac.in *by July 25, 2024. Kindly include the following details:     - Name of the speaker    - Contact information (email and phone number)    - A brief description of their background and the topic they would speak    on.    - A video link to the TEDx /Any other prominent talk given by the speaker  Your input is invaluable, and we are confident that TEDx CHARUSAT will be an unforgettable event.  Thank you for your support and participation. We look forward to seeing you at TEDx CHARUSAT!  *For any query/concerns/information *kindly get in touch with *Dr. Nikita Bhatt* (nikitabhatt.ce@charusat.ac.in) |* Dr. Dweepna Garg* ( dweepnagarg.ce@charusat.ac.in) | *Dr. Kirti Makwana *( kirtimakwana.mba@charusat.ac.in) | *Ms. Pinal Patel* ( pinalpatel.cv@charusat.ac.in).  Best Regards,  Dr. Vijay Chaudhary, Dr. Bankim Patel & Dr. Trushit Upadhyaya --  I/c Principal Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology Faculty of Technology & Engineering Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT) CHARUSAT Campus, Changa, 388421 Petlad, Anand Gujarat, India.  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). subject: Fwd: Reminder for AWS ML event!
content: Regards, Radhika H. Patel, Assistant Professor, Department of Information Technology, Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR), CHARUSAT,  Changa  ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: AWS Cloud Club CHARUSAT Date: Sun, 21 Jul 2024, 5:19 pm Subject: Reminder for AWS ML event! To: <20ce@charusat.edu.in>, <20it@charusat.edu.in>, <20cs@charusat.edu.in>, <21ce@charusat.edu.in>, <21it@charusat.edu.in>, <21cs@charusat.edu.in>, < 22ce@charusat.edu.in>, <22cs@charusat.edu.in>, <22it@charusat.edu.in>, < 22aiml@charusat.edu.in>, <23aiml@charusat.edu.in>, <23ce@charusat.edu.in>, < 23it@charusat.edu.in>, <23cs@charusat.edu.in> Cc: Parth Shah , Sanket Suthar < sanketsuthar.it@charusat.ac.in>, <20it062@charusat.edu.in>, < 20it116@charusat.edu.in>, Sandip Patel , Principal C.S.Patel Institute of Technology , Minal Patel , Principal DPTR < principal.dptr@charusat.ac.in>, Chirag Patel , Radhika Patel , Ritesh Patel < riteshpatel.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Dipak Ramoliya < dipakramoliya.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Head IT CHARUSAT , Dharmendra Patel , Head CE CHARUSAT < hod.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Dr Dweepna Garg , Ashwin Makwana , Amit Nayak < amitnayak.it@charusat.ac.in>, Amit Thakkar , Nirav Bhatt , Sarita Thummar < saritathummar.ce@charusat.ac.in>, JAY LAKHANI < lakhanijaylakhanijay764@gmail.com>, <21ce031@charusat.edu.in>, < 21IT009@charusat.edu.in>   *Hello AWS enthusiasts👋,*   We hope you're all in good spirits and actively honing new skills within yourselves.   This is a friendly reminder about *ML Connect: AWS*, happening soon! Get ready for an incredible day of Machine Learning and AI with top women in tech.   *📅 Date: 23rd July*  *⏰ Time: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM*  *📍Venue: RPCP Auditorium, CHARUSAT*    *Sessions:*  *- *"*Innovating with AWS: ML and GenAI in action*" session by Poonam Patel *- *"*Glimpses From Scratch to ML development*" session by Hima Soni *- *"*AI 360 - The Complete Spectrum: Seeing Beyond the Obvious*" hands-on workshop by Vaishnavi Sonewane  And some fun quizzes and swags!!  Note: To attend the hands-on session, RSVP on Meetup and fill out the form: Google form . To attend the sessions, just register here:   Register here Don’t miss this opportunity to learn, network, and grow! 🌟👩‍💻   For any queries contact: Dulari Bhushan: +91 78510 37942  Parmesh Bhatt: +91 6355 177 933  Best regards, AWS Cloud Club CHARUSAT  *LinkedIn* *||* *Instagram* *||* *Meetup* --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Patel, Assistant Professor, Department of Information Technology, Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR), CHARUSAT,  Changa ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: AWS Cloud Club CHARUSAT < awscloudclub@charusat.ac.in > Date: Sun, 21 Jul 2024, 5:19 pm Subject: Reminder for AWS ML event! To:  < 20ce@charusat.edu.in >,  < 20it@charusat.edu.in >,  < 20cs@charusat.edu.in >,  < 21ce@charusat.edu.in >,  < 21it@charusat.edu.in >,  < 21cs@charusat.edu.in >,  < 22ce@charusat.edu.in >,  < 22cs@charusat.edu.in >,  < 22it@charusat.edu.in >,  < 22aiml@charusat.edu.in >,  < 23aiml@charusat.edu.in >,  < 23ce@charusat.edu.in >,  < 23it@charusat.edu.in >,  < 23cs@charusat.edu.in > Cc: Parth Shah < parthshah.ce@charusat.ac.in >, Sanket Suthar < sanketsuthar.it@charusat.ac.in >,  < 20it062@charusat.edu.in >,  < 20it116@charusat.edu.in >, Sandip Patel < sandippatel872@gmail.com >, Principal C.S.Patel Institute of Technology < principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in >, Minal Patel < minalpatel.dce@charusat.ac.in >, Principal DPTR < principal.dptr@charusat.ac.in >, Chirag Patel < chiragpatel.dce@charusat.ac.in >, Radhika Patel < RADHIKAPATEL.IT@charusat.ac.in >, Ritesh Patel < riteshpatel.ce@charusat.ac.in >, Dipak Ramoliya < dipakramoliya.ce@charusat.ac.in >, Head IT CHARUSAT < hod.it@charusat.ac.in >, Dharmendra Patel < dharmendrapatel.mca@charusat.ac.in >, Head CE CHARUSAT < hod.ce@charusat.ac.in >, Dr Dweepna Garg < dweepnagarg.ce@charusat.ac.in >, Ashwin Makwana < ashwinmakwana.ce@charusat.ac.in >, Amit Nayak < amitnayak.it@charusat.ac.in >, Amit Thakkar < amitthakkar.it@charusat.ac.in >, Nirav Bhatt < niravbhatt.it@charusat.ac.in >, Sarita Thummar < saritathummar.ce@charusat.ac.in >, JAY LAKHANI < lakhanijaylakhanijay764@gmail.com >,  < 21ce031@charusat.edu.in >,  < 21IT009@charusat.edu.in > Hello AWS enthusiasts👋, We hope you're all in good spirits and actively honing new skills within yourselves. This is a friendly reminder about ML Connect: AWS , happening soon! Get ready for an incredible day of Machine Learning and AI with top women in tech. 📅 Date: 23rd July ⏰ Time: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM 📍Venue: RPCP Auditorium, CHARUSAT Sessions: - " Innovating with AWS: ML and GenAI in action " session by Poonam Patel - " Glimpses From Scratch to ML development " session by Hima Soni - " AI 360 - The Complete Spectrum: Seeing Beyond the Obvious " hands-on workshop by Vaishnavi Sonewane And some fun quizzes and swags!! Note: To attend the hands-on session, RSVP on Meetup and fill out the form: Google form . To attend the sessions, just register here: Register here Don’t miss this opportunity to learn, network, and grow! 🌟👩‍💻 For any queries contact: Dulari Bhushan: +91 78510 37942 Parmesh Bhatt: +91 6355 177 933 Best regards, AWS Cloud Club CHARUSAT LinkedIn || Instagram || Meetup DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). subject: Contributors Application GSSOC'24
content: Google Forms      Thanks for filling in Contributors Application GSSOC'24  Here's what was received.    Edit response      Contributors Application GSSOC'24      Are you a beginner looking to step into the exciting world of open-source    development?    Then GSSoC'24 is the perfect opportunity for you!    GirlScript Summer of Code (GSSoC) is an initiative by the GirlScript    Foundation that was started in 2018. Its mission is to empower beginners to    get acquainted with open-source development. Join a community of over 20000    contributors and take your first step into the world of open-source!    GSSoC'24 provides you with the chance to:      Contribute to real-world problems  Gain valuable knowledge and experience  Embark on a journey of learning and growth    Ready to kickstart your open-source journey? Apply to GSSoC'24 today!      Email *      23dcs056@charusat.edu.in      Contributor Details      Name of applicant *      Vansh Malani      Gender *      Male        Phone number *      9426067191      College *      Devang Patel Institute of Advanced Technology and Research      GitHub Profile URL *      https://github.com/vmalani27      LinkedIn Profile URL *      https://www.linkedin.com/in/vansh-malani-6b37002a1/      Discord Username with tag (eg, Diablo#1147 if possible or just give your    username eg , Diablo) *      vansh_malani#1933      Country *      India      Referral Code (write any if none)      ajak-236      Tell us more...      Why do you want to participate? *      I am deeply interested in the world of open source programs as i use them    daily and i want to give back to the community      What do you expect from this program? *      i expect to contribute and recognise the community of opensource and also    learn a lot from this program      Have you been associated with GirlScript priorly? *      No, but ive heard a lot about it and i am keen to join it.      Community Guidelines    Kindly go through the guidelines document that should be followed    throughout the duration of the program.          Link:    https://drive.google.com/file/d/1AaD9wWaY4ZdzsI8J6ILXHg7MkmH-qZ3y/view?usp=sharing    *      ✓  I hereby declare that I have read, understood and will abide by the    guidelines stated above.      Thank you for registering for GSSoC'24. We are elated by your response.    Our team will review your application and get back to you soon! subject: Only 2 days left to enter your submission! - Microsoft Developers AI Learning  Hackathon
content: ( http://devpost.com )  Submissions are due on Wednesday, June 26th. --------------------------------------------  Key things to remember: -----------------------  1) To submit to Phase 2, You and your team members must have completed Phase 1  2) $10k cash prizes are up for grabs (only applicable to phase 2 submissions)  3) There are several screenshots to provide, be sure to read the requirements and rules to make your project(s) eligible!   Best of luck — can’t wait to see what you’ve come up with.  You received this email because you signed up for Microsoft Developers AI Learning Hackathon. If you're no longer participating, you can unregister here ( https://azurecosmosdb.devpost.com/ ).  © 2024 Devpost, Inc. All rights reserved. Unsubscribe from these notifications ( https://devpost.com/notification_subscriptions/1KcgPg0OAsGJvKeu8JQeVA ) Submissions are due on Wednesday, June 26th. subject: Fwd: Campaign on Mera Pehla Vote - Desh Ke Liye from 28.02.2024 to  06.03.2024 -Regarding
content: *Thanks and Regards,* *RADHIKA H. PATEL* *Assistant Professor* *Department of Information Technology* *DEPSTAR,* *CHARUSAT, Changa*        ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR Date: Sat, Mar 2, 2024 at 3:08 PM Subject: Fwd: Campaign on Mera Pehla Vote - Desh Ke Liye from 28.02.2024 to 06.03.2024 -Regarding To: Depstar ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: AICTE No Reply Date: Sat, 2 Mar 2024 at 2:50 PM Subject: Campaign on Mera Pehla Vote - Desh Ke Liye from 28.02.2024 to 06.03.2024 -Regarding To:   Dear Madam/Sir, Madam/Sir,  Greetings from All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) ..!  Please refer our previous communications with respect to launch of a Campaign on Mera Pehla Vote Desh Ke Liye from 28.02.2024 to 06.03.2024 with the objective to ensure universal enlightened participation of youth in elections proposed by the Ministry of Education in collaboration with the Ministry of Youth Affairs proposes.    In this regard a Standard Operating Procedure (SoP) with suggested list of activities, list of creative content, prepared for the purpose have already been shared which is again attached herewith.    To encourage first-time voters to actively participate in the biggest festival of democracy, the 18th Lok Sabha Election, it is to inform that a dedicated campaign page has been made LIVE on MyGov platform link being https://www.mygov.in/mera-pehla-vote/. The page has activities like pledge, quiz, reel, podcast, and blog writing.   AICTE requests your institution to carry out the Campaign for strengthening the spirit of democracy in the country. And also share this information with all Students, faculty members and staff so that they can also take part in the ongoing Campaign to ensure the maximum participation from all the eligible students. All the institutions including Nodal institutions to join and participate in Campaign Mera Pehla Vote - Desh Ke Liye, and submit daily activities report latest by 4 PM on daily basis (between 02.03.2024 to 06.03.2024) positively in this google form link : https://forms.gle/w2YgSZHAbSiYgg2r6   With regards *Dr.N.H.Siddalingaswamy* Advisor II (Regulation Bureau) All India Council for Technical Education New Delhi-110070  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon  this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient  is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, or the  employee, or agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended  recipient and/or if you have received this in error, please contact the  sender and delete the material from the computer or device. CHARUSAT does  not take any liability or responsibility for any malicious codes/software  and/or viruses/Trojan horses that may have been picked up during the  transmission of this message. By opening and solely relying on the contents  or part thereof this message, and taking action thereof, the recipient  relieves the CHARUSAT of all the liabilities including any damages done to  the recipient's pc/laptop/peripherals and other communication devices due  to any reason. To encourage first-time voters to actively participate in the biggest festival of democracy, the 18th Lok Sabha Election, it is to inform that a dedicated campaign page has been made LIVE on MyGov platform link being https://www.mygov.in/mera-pehla-vote/. The page has activities like pledge, quiz, reel, podcast, and blog writing. AICTE requests your institution to carry out the Campaign for strengthening the spirit of democracy in the country. And also share this information with all Students, faculty members and staff so that they can also take part in the ongoing Campaign to ensure the maximum participation from all the eligible students . All the institutions including Nodal institutions to join and participate in Campaign Mera Pehla Vote - Desh Ke Liye, and submit daily activities report latest by 4 PM on daily basis (between 02.03.2024 to 06.03.2024) positively in this google form link : https://forms.gle/w2YgSZHAbSiYgg2r6 With regards Dr.N.H.Siddalingaswamy Advisor II (Regulation Bureau) All India Council for Technical Education New Delhi-110070 DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). content: @go.mathworks.com is an unmonitored mailbox. Use @mathworks.com address for replies.         Greetings from MathWorks!    Greetings from MathWorks!    MathWorks, in association with the Indian Institute of Science (IISc) and the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology, is excited to invite the Team Captain to participate in the Introductory webinar for Minidrone Competition:   MathWorks Minidrone Competition – India 2024 .    If you have any questions pertaining to participating in Round 1 of the competition, scan the QR or use the meeting link to join the Introductory webinar on Monday, July 22. subject: Acknowledgement of Participation: Robotics Workshop on April 13, 2024
content: Dear Participant  On behalf of the Electronics and Communication Engineering Department at Indus University, Ahmedabad, in collaboration with e-Yantra Lab, IIT Bombay, I would like to extend our sincere gratitude for your successful participation in the one-day workshop on Robotics conducted on April 13, 2024.  Your active involvement and enthusiasm greatly contributed to the success of the workshop, fostering a dynamic learning environment and valuable interactions among participants.  We look forward to welcoming you to future workshops and events hosted by our department.  Please find the attached certificate of the workshop.   --  With Regards *P* *rof.Divyangna GandhiAssistant Professor,*  *IITE, INDUS UNIVERSITYRancharda via Shilaj, Ahmedabad**- 382115* L: +91-2764 260277 / 78 / 79 Ext: M: +91 9925518841 Website: https://www.indusuni.ac.in [image: https://www.facebook.com/TheIndusUni] [image: https://twitter.com/theindusuni] [image: https://www.linkedin.com/school/indus-university-ahmedabad/] Dear Participant On behalf of the Electronics and  Communication Engineering Department at Indus University, Ahmedabad, in  collaboration with e-Yantra Lab, IIT Bombay, I would like to extend our  sincere gratitude for your successful participation in the one-day  workshop on Robotics conducted on April 13, 2024. subject: Fwd: Oracle Cloud Learning Subscriptions Updates Jun, 2024
content: From: Oracle University MyLearn Subject: Oracle Cloud Learning Subscriptions Updates Jun, 2024 To: [image: Oracle Logo] Oracle University [image: Image] Welcome to Oracle MyLearn, Priteshkumar  ------------------------------ Jun, 2024 Featured Course   View course  Oracle Fusion Cloud Applications: Run and Operate Foundations Running and operating a Fusion Environment post-implementation is an ongoing effort that requires collaboration between IT teams, functional users, and management to ensure the continued success of the Oracle Fusion Applications within the organization. The Run and Operate Course is designed to meet the needs of managing Oracle Fusion Applications after they've been set up.  View course Free Certification for OCI Generative AI through 31 July, 2024  Do you want to expand your AI knowledge and position yourself as an expert? Our *OCI Generative AI Professional Certification and Course *is being offered for free through July 31. This is a unique opportunity for Software Developers, Machine Learning/AI Engineers, and Gen AI Professionals to gain a competitive edge, at no cost to you! Don’t miss out on this limited-time free AI certification. Get certified for free ------------------------------ *New Oracle Cloud Application AI Courses Released!*  Learn AI Essentials, Embedded and Custom AI, Generative and Classic AI, and Oracle's AI strategy across Oracle Cloud Applications with these new courses:  Explore the range of AI-driven features designed to Attract, Grow, and Keep top talent with Oracle AI in Fusion Cloud Human Capital Management (HCM). Get up to speed with the core AI features to increase the efficiency and usability of productivity features with Oracle AI in Customer Experience (CX) . ------------------------------ *Oracle Fusion Cloud HCM: Grow *  Learn more about Oracle Grow, a user experience-driven landing page that provides insights into career-enhancing features in the Oracle Fusion Cloud Grow course . Grow brings together HCM and AI capabilities to create a powerful tool for career growth, helping the whole organization thrive—from employees to managers. ------------------------------ *Service Cloud & Field Service New Features Now Available*  Learn about the latest new features of Service Cloud and Field Service with *20 24B New Features courses *that cover feature overviews, business benefits, implementation considerations, and demonstrations. See courses ------------------------------ *1 Million Learners in the OU Learning Community!*  The Oracle University Learning Community has grown to * over 1 million* learners. Did you know that you have free access to the Community if you have a MyLearn subscription? The Community allows you to connect with Oracle experts, engage with instructors and peers, and participate in various challenges, live events, and more. So, what are you waiting for? Connect with your fellow learners today. subject: Fwd: Achievement in Khel Mahakumbh-2024 State level Chess Tournament.
content: Dear All,  Greeting of CHARUSAT  Sports   We are thrilled to announce that Joy Shah (21CS062) a student of the Computer Science Engineering department at the Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology, affiliated with Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT) he has as made us proud by emerging 1st in the Anand district level Khel Mahakumbh Open Age category Chess Tournament.  We are delighted to inform you that Joy has further excelled by winning the Bronze Medal in the State Level tournament of the same event total 61 players participated held on the 26th and 27th of May, 2024, in Ahmedabad.  Joy has been participating in Khel Mahakumbh since 2013 and has won a total of 3 gold, 3 silver, and 3 bronze medals over the years. Additionally, he has been honored with the Jaydeepsinhji Bariya Award by the Sports Authority of Gujarat for his outstanding achievements.  We extend our heartiest congratulations to Joy Shah on this remarkable achievement.  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon  this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient  is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, or the  employee, or agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended  recipient and/or if you have received this in error, please contact the  sender and delete the material from the computer or device. subject: Fwd: Syllabus for Internal Theory Exam for Digital Electronics (CSE101)
content: *Thanks & Regards,* *Mrs. Mohini Darji* *Assistant Professor* *Department of Computer Science & Engineering* *Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research **(DEPSTAR)* *Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)* *Changa-Gujarat 388421*   ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Harshul Yagnik Date: Mon, 19 Feb 2024 at 2:58 PM Subject: Syllabus for Internal Theory Exam for Digital Electronics (CSE101) To: <23cs@charusat.edu.in> Cc: Mohini Darji , Gaurav Kumar < gauravkumar.aiml@charusat.ac.in>, Head CSE , HOD AIML , HOD Depstar Dear Students,  The syllabus for the Internal Theory Examination for Digital Electronics (CSE101) is as follows:  Unit 1: Number Systems Different Radix Number Systems, Number base conversions, Complements, Signed and Unsigned Numbers, Digital arithmetic (Binary Addition and Subtraction (normal and with complements)), Binary codes, Code Conversion, Binary Logic and Logic Gates  Unit 2: Simplification of Boolean functions Boolean Algebra (Basic Definitions, Axioms, Postulates and Theorem, Boolean functions: Canonical and Standard Form, Maxterm and Minterm, SOP and POS), Simplification of Boolean functions using Boolean theorems and postulates, Simplification of Boolean functions using K-map (up to 4 variable K-map), Realize logic circuit using Basic gates and Universal gates  Unit 3: Combinational Circuits Design Procedure, Analysis procedure of combinational circuits, Half Adder, Half Subtractor, Full Adder, Full Subtractor  All the best for examination --  Harshul Yagnik  Assistant Professor,  Department of Computer Science Engineering,  Charotar University of Science & Technology +91-9737642757 --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon  this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient  is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, or the  employee, or agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended  recipient and/or if you have received this in error, please contact the  sender and delete the material from the computer or device. CHARUSAT does  not take any liability or responsibility for any malicious codes/software  and/or viruses/Trojan horses that may have been picked up during the  transmission of this message. By opening and solely relying on the contents  or part thereof this message, and taking action thereof, the recipient  relieves the CHARUSAT of all the liabilities including any damages done to  the recipient's pc/laptop/peripherals and other communication devices due  to any reason. subject: Fwd: Inviting Applications for Startup Srujan Seed Support (S4) from  your esteemed University/Institute
content: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: EDIC CHARUSAT Dear students,  This is a great opportunity to receive financial support for your ideas and transform them into products. If any student is interested and has an idea for a startup or an innovative product, please contact me so that we can proceed with applying for the funds.   Dear Sir/Ma'am,  Greetings from Gujarat Student Startup & Innovation Hub (iHub)!  Gujarat Student Startup and Innovation Hub (iHub), established as a flagship nodal agency by the state Education Department is envisioned to be a centre for all startup stakeholders to develop an end-to-end innovation and entrepreneurial ecosystem in Gujarat by creating a pathway from Mind-to-Market.  iHub is running 20 flagship programmes and nurturing over 400+ startups, supporting them with all the startup support verticals viz. co-working space, funding, networking opportunities, mentoring, capacity-building programmes, and infrastructural support. We extend startup support right from the ideation stage to the growth stage handholding startups from the beginning of their startup journey till they are ready to accelerate into the market with their ventures.  iHub had launched the 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐮𝐩 𝐒𝐫𝐮𝐣𝐚𝐧 𝐒𝐞𝐞𝐝 𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭 (𝐒𝟒) initiative to support innovative ideas and startups in availing the grants from INR 2.5 Lac to 10 Lac for their product development. Till date, *250* startups have been supported by iHub under the Startup Srujan Seed Support initiative with the funding support of INR 13 Crore.  Eligibility Criteria for Startup Srujan Seed Support (S4):     -     Any Innovator/Startup up to the age of 35 years, who is:    -     The innovators and Startups aspiring to avail this could be in any stage    as below:  A school student of Foundational/Preparatory/Middle/Secondary level (Up to Class 12) from Gujarat.  A Diploma/Vocational/Undergraduate/Postgraduate/Doctoral student or an alumna/alumnus from Gujarat.  Any dropout from school/institute/university from Gujarat.  Link to Apply: https://ihubgujarat.in/srujan Last Date of Application in this cohort: 15th May 2024  You may circulate the above information to all the innovators/startups in your university so that a maximum number of Students/Innovators/Startups can leverage the opportunity.  For any queries, you may reach out to Mr. Mrunal Kakkad on +91 73838 54283 | mrunal@ihubgujarat.in     Thanks & Regards,  --  Hiranmay Mahanta CEO, *i*-Hub www.ihubgujarat.in +91-9909959336 Gujarat Student Start-up and Innovation Hub  [image: ihubgujarat-in]ihubgujarat-in   --  Dr. Jaimin N Undavia, Associate Professor & Coordinator, CHARUSAT STARTUP AND INNOVATION CELL, Faculty of Computer Science and Applications, CHANGA M: 9426923708, 7283968701 Ext: 5250   --   *Nilesh Kumar Dubey**(PhD)* Assistant Professor, Computer Science and Engineering, Institutional Coordinator of *IQAC*, *CSIC,* *UIIC, IPR* Devang Patel Institute of Advanced Technology & Research Charotar University of Science And Technology (CHARUSAT), Changa-388421, Gujarat, INDIA. http://www.charusat.ac.in  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon  this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient  is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, or the  employee, or agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended  recipient and/or if you have received this in error, please contact the  sender and delete the material from the computer or device. CHARUSAT does  not take any liability or responsibility for any malicious codes/software  and/or viruses/Trojan horses that may have been picked up during the  transmission of this message. By opening and solely relying on the contents  or part thereof this message, and taking action thereof, the recipient  relieves the CHARUSAT of all the liabilities including any damages done to  the recipient's pc/laptop/peripherals and other communication devices due  to any reason. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: EDIC CHARUSAT < CSIC@charusat.ac.in > Dear students, This is a great opportunity to receive financial support for your ideas and transform them into products. content: *Dear  students,COGNIZANCE(IIT ROORKEE)+IBM is organizing a 2 Month Training + Internship program designed by IBM & MICROSOFT. We are enrolling only LIMITED STUDENTS in the program.*  Registration batch  >MARCH-APRIL >APRIL-MAY >MAY-JUNE  *APPLY IN YOUR DREAM COMPANY FOR THE INTERNSHIP :* *https://forms.gle/HZ38ZqBA6uArMcx49 *    IIT-ROORKEE and MNCs offer students a chance to learn theory and apply it practically on live industry projects.  🔴Program structure🔴   *1️⃣ First month:* 🔺Theoretical concepts from industry experts  🔺10 live projects from experts   🔺 IIT training has been designed in the form of Live lectures along with living mentorship from industry professionals ( Login credentials will be provided to students after registration )  *2️⃣ Second month:*  🔺Capstone project (major project from industry)  🔺 It's a group project assigned to a group of 15 interns. content: *Thanks and Regards,* *RADHIKA H. PATEL* *Assistant Professor* *Department of Information Technology* *DEPSTAR,* *CHARUSAT, Changa*        ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR Date: Thu, Mar 21, 2024 at 9:10 AM Subject: Fwd: Sharing the GR of Anti-Ragging issued on 19/03/2024. To:     ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Prof. A.U. Patel Date: Wed, Mar 20, 2024 at 6:09 PM Subject: Sharing the GR of Anti-Ragging issued on 19/03/2024. To:   Dear sir/ma’am,  Greetings from Knowledge Consortium of Gujarat!  It is my immense pleasure to inform you that Department of Education (Higher & Technical), Government of Gujarat has finalized the* GR of Curbing the Menace of Ragging in Higher & Technical Educational Institutions of the State of Gujarat *on 19/03/2023.  The signed GR is also attached herewith for your kind perusal. subject: Fwd: Engineering Physics - 2 | PY143 | Quiz
content: Dear all,   *Please read the provided instructions carefully. * This is to let you know that there will be a total of two quizzes organized during the semester (even 2023-24) as a part of the internal evaluation process. I request students to go through the details given below.   *Quiz: 1 * *Syllabus:* Experiments 5, 6, 7, 8, and 9 *Total marks:* 20 Marks *Total Questions:* 20 (1 mark each) *Type of the questions:* Multiple choice questions (MCQ) based on the procedure of the experiment, calculation from provided data, numerical, problems, basic concepts of theory, etc. *Mode of examination:* Online *Platform: *Google Quiz form *Date & Day:*  6th April 2024 & Saturday *Time:* 3:30 PM to 4:00 PM   *Quiz: 2* *Syllabus:* Experiments 1, 2, 3, and 4 *Total marks:* 15 Marks *Total Questions:* 15 (1 mark each) *Type of the questions:* Multiple choice questions (MCQ) based on the procedure of the experiment, calculation from provided data, numerical, problems, basic concepts of theory, etc. *Mode of examination:* Online *Platform: *Google Quiz form *Date & Day:*  27 April 2024 & Saturday *Time:* 3:30 PM to 4:00 PM   *PS:*> Please note that you shall receive an email with a link to the Google Quiz form before the 5-minute Quiz. Therefore, stay online in a browser (such as Chrome, Firefox, etc ) with *an institute login ID only*. *(You won't be able to give quiz with your personal email)*  > Information regarding journal submission and external examination will be conveyed through mail shortly.  > *If you fail to attend any of the quizzes without informing prior you will lose your mark on the respective quiz, and you won't be able to claim a second chance. *   Write to me or your lab professor if you have any concerns Sanni --  *Thanks,*    *Sanni, Ph.D.Assistant professorDepartment of Physical Sciences Faculty of Applied SciencesP D Patel Institute of Applied Sciences,CHARUSAT , Changa. - 388 421, India*  *Email: sannikapatel.phys@charusat.ac.in * *            sunkapatel@gmail.com * *Web: https://sites.google.com/a/charusat.ac.in/sanni-kapatel/ * *Phone: (M) +91 - 9978577009*  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). subject: AWS Academy (CHARUSAT) Registration for Cloud Foundation Course  [Registration Deadline Extended]
content: Dear Teachers/Students,   Greetings!!!   It is a matter of pleasure that 7 (4CP+3SA) batches of AWS Academy have completed with more than 600+ (667 trained - 100+ certified) students AWS Certified who benefited in terms of good internship and Job opportunities.   Interested students are requested to register themselves using the following link:   > *Registration for Cloud Foundation Course: *Click Here!! > Note: The batch registration will be closed on *6th January 2024*.    As said by Brain Tracy: "Continuous learning is the minimum requirement for > success in any field." so *we would highly encourage the students to take > part in AWS ACADEMY *   [image: 33bd050e-fea5-45a1-8ded-ca3fc79e2ea1.jpg]  *Learning Outcomes:*       - Efficient design and deployment of the AWS system    - Cost-evaluation and cost-control mechanisms    - Elastic Load Balancing on multiple EC2 instances    - Data ingress and egress on AWS    - Identifying relevant and suitable uses of AWS architecture    - Lift and shift mechanism of AWS on-premises applications    - Finding the right solutions based on computational, database, and    security needs    - And of course, be AWS Certified ready!   As we have become an AWS Academy member institute, we can start providing training to the students which help them to uplift their career as IT professionals.   *Following are a few glimpses about AWS certification:*   AWS certifications demonstrate the skills to design and manage software solutions on Amazon's ultra-popular cloud platform.   Simply put, cloud computing is the on-demand, pay-as-you-go distribution of IT resources over the Internet. Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s leading cloud platform and provider of these resources.   As more and more businesses move traditionally in-house services to the cloud - to reap benefits like reduced costs and increased efficiency - those with skills and certifications in the latest cloud computing solutions - especially those from AWS - will enjoy a wide range of job opportunities and top-tier salaries.   *Benefits of AWS Certification*   There are numerous advantages to becoming AWS certified. Amazon Web Services certifications…       - Validate your skills and knowledge in the preeminent cloud computing    platform.    - are consistently listed among the top-paying info-tech certifications    worldwide.    - Garner more interviews for aspiring cloud specialists and higher wages    once hired.    - Are recognized industry-wide as reliable and well-designed tech    credentials.    - Demonstrate credibility and dedication to your cloud computing career    path.    - Provide access to a network of like-minded peers    and AWS thought-leaders.    - Require recertification which ensures that your AWS skills remain    current.    *For any Query contact: *  Dr. Minal Patel (DEPSTAR-CE) [M - 9998574188]  minalpatel.dce@charusat.ac.in  Prof. Sanket Suthar (CSPIT-IT)  sanketsuthar.it@charusat.ac.in Dr. Parth Shah (HOD, IT, CSPIT)  parthshah.ce@charusat.ac.in   ----------------------------------------  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon  this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient  is strictly prohibited. subject: Summer sale, big discounts
content: Hi flashvansh123, Do you know the best part about summers? I mean, apart from Mangoes 🥭 and IPL 🏏. It is the season of fun and freedom. As a student, you are free from all the assignments and classes. You can do whatever you want in the summer, be it learning a new skill, or working on a new project. The possibilities are endless. I tried to master Piano one summer, but ended up learning very little because I got distracted by other things. You may also be worrying about all the things you want to achieve this summer. My advice: Just pick one goal. To remove the unnecessary distraction from your number one goal, we are launching summer sale . No need to juggle between multiple resources. Get CodeChef Pro for as low as Rs. 200 per month and commit to a focussed learning goal this summer. Become Pro PS: The sale ends on 12th May. PPS: Reply with your learning goal and I will share a course from CodeChef with you. Regards, Aniruddh Dubey Product Head If you do not wish to receive emails from us, you can unsubscribe Hi flashvansh123, Do you know the best part about summers? subject: Fwd: [Google Developer Student Clubs] Register for Solution Challenge 2024!
content: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: 'Vishal from India Edu Program Team' via Google Devs Edu Leads < googledevs-eduleads@googlegroups.com> Date: Mon, Dec 11, 2023 at 11:52 AM Subject: [Google Developer Student Clubs] Register for Solution Challenge 2024! To: Educator Team Dear Educators,  2024 Solution Challenge is a global annual competition for university students to solve for one or more of the United Nations 17 Sustainable Development Goals using Google Technology. We would like to invite student developers from your campus to participate in the same. We encourage you to spread the word ahead in your network of universities who might benefit from this opportunity!  Here are few steps to participate in the challenge :  December 1st, 2023 - January 20, 2024  After registration  January 04, 2023 - January 20, 2024  January 21, 2024 to February 22, 2024  Step 1 : Register and showcase your interests.  Remember to join a GDSC Club as a member to be eligible for future submissions.  Step 2 : Build a team and choose a SDG for which you want to build a solution for.  Step 3 (Optional) : Submit a solution for getting mentorship at one of the locations for the regional bootcamps.  Step 4 : Submit solutions for the first round of evaluation globally.  Register Here before Jan 20, 2024 Being part of Solution Challenge your students get :     -     Opportunity to be part of Global Competition.    -     Learn and upskill yourselves in Google Technology by building projects.    -     Showcase in your profile.    -     Receive mentorship from Google experts.    -     Win certificates and exciting prizes.   Are you excited? Do not forget to register before the deadline, i.e. 20 Jan 2024  They can also check out these bonus resources while they start working.     -     Learning Content -     Explore solutions from past winners -     SDG Themes for which they want to build a solution for.   Please do share this opportunity with your students and we look forward to seeing tons of submissions from them!  --  You received this message because you are subscribed to the Google Groups "Google Devs Edu Leads" group. To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to googledevs-eduleads+unsubscribe@googlegroups.com. To view this discussion on the web visit https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/googledevs-eduleads/CADKUkh-9g11vZosA3tQOTPVNGFr8%3DfYKLkkziJ3Kxw4quNpmZQ%40mail.gmail.com .   --  *Prof. Ashwin Makwana (Ph D), *  Head, *Career Development and Placement Cell (CDPC)*, CHARUSAT *and*  *Associate Professor,* U & P U Patel *Department of Computer Engineering,*Faculty of Technology & Engineering(CSPIT), Charotar University of Science & Technology, AT: Changa, Ta:Petlad, Dist:Anand, Gujarat. 02697-265213/265123, (M)9408151969 *CHARUSAT Accredited with 'A+' by NAAC - Govt. of India*  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). [ MANDATORY INTERNSHIP ] Greetings! We are pleased to share with you that our company, TEACHNOOK, is collaborating with Cognizance (IIT Roorkee) to offer a unique 2-month Training + Internship  Program. This advanced program will provide you with the missing practical skills that you need to enhance your career. We are enrolling only LIMITED STUDENTS in the program for CHARUSAT . To know more information join in whatsapp group: https://chat.whatsapp.com/GoB39BYWJ5A7fpBJlti0NG It is Mandatory for students to fill out the form, if you get shortlisted you will be getting a call from our HR Team: https://forms.gle/wXeFXk2pcBC9rXx86 FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE: First month : IIT training has been designed in the form of Live lectures along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login credentials will be provided to students after registration) No Prerequisites Required. Second month : Internship with live mentorship for projects from professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will be giving students experience in solving real-world problems. Project 1:- 10 individual projects assigned to each intern which they have to complete with their mentor . Project 2:-  Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a group of 15 interns. For each intern particular work will be assigned to them they have to work on it. (Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by the company side itself) Here are two types of Classes we are providing: 1. Blended Program/Recorded classes: You will receive recorded sessions, whatever doubts you have you can clear it in live doubt clearing sessions which will be organized every weekend. 2. Mentor led/Live classes: You will be having live zoom classes at 6:30PM  for 2 to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well LMS(Learning Management System) portal where you will have access to it for 6 months. After Completion of the program the student shall receive a: ✅ Program completion certificate issued by Cognizance (IIT Roorkee) and Verified By Wipro DICE ID . ✅ Co-Branded Internship certificate from Top MNCs. ✅ 100% Placement Assistance. ✅ Access to a growing community. Congratulations! To Already registered students , You've taken the first step towards a brighter future. Don't miss out on this chance to take your career to the next level. Spread the word to your friends and classmates so they can benefit too! content: *Dear Students of * *CHARUSAT* *(ALL  DEPARTMENTS 1st to 4th year**)* *[ MANDATORY INTERNSHIP ]*  Greetings!  We are pleased to share with you that our company, TEACHNOOK, is collaborating with Cognizance (IIT Roorkee) to offer a unique 2-month Training + Internship  Program. This advanced program will provide you with the missing practical skills that you need to enhance your career.   We are enrolling only *LIMITED STUDENTS *in the program for *CHARUSAT**.*  *To know more information join in whatsapp group:*  *https://chat.whatsapp.com/GoB39BYWJ5A7fpBJlti0NG *   *It is Mandatory for students to fill out the form, if you get shortlisted you will be getting a call from our HR Team:* https://forms.gle/wXeFXk2pcBC9rXx86   *FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:* *First month*: IIT training has been designed in the form of Live lectures along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login credentials will be provided to students after registration) *No Prerequisites Required.*   *Second month*: Internship with live mentorship for projects from professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will be giving students experience in solving real-world problems.  Project 1:- 10 individual projects assigned to each intern which they have to complete with their mentor .  Project 2:-  Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a group of 15 interns. For each intern particular work will be assigned to them they have to work on it. (Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by the company side itself)  Here are two types of Classes we are providing:  1. Blended Program/Recorded classes: You will receive recorded sessions, whatever doubts you have you can clear it in live doubt clearing sessions which will be organized every weekend.  2. Mentor led/Live classes: You will be having live zoom classes at 6:30PM  for 2 to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well LMS(Learning Management System) portal where you will have access to it for 6 months.  After Completion of the program the student shall receive a:  ✅ Program completion certificate issued by  Cognizance (IIT Roorkee) and Verified By Wipro DICE ID. ✅ Co-Branded Internship certificate from Top MNCs. ✅ 100% Placement Assistance. ✅ Access to a growing community.  *Congratulations! To Already registered** students*, You've taken the first step towards a brighter future. Don't miss out on this chance to take your career to the next level. Spread the word to your friends and classmates so they can benefit too! subject: GitHub Profile Review On Live Session
content: View this post on the web at https://gssoc.substack.com/p/github-profile-review-on-live-session  Attention all contributors 👩🏻‍💻🧑🏻‍💻!  We are excited to announce a special GitHub Profile Review Session happening today at 8:00 PM on YouTube Live [ https://substack.com/redirect/bb127f2a-df6b-4eb8-b35f-d0ac7311a2b2?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ]. [ https://substack.com/redirect/bb127f2a-df6b-4eb8-b35f-d0ac7311a2b2?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ] Session Highlights: 🔍 Live GitHub Profile Reviews: Get personalized feedback on your GitHub profile. 💡 Tips to Enhance Your GitHub: Learn valuable tips and tricks to make your profile stand out. Rewards and Giveaways on Live [ https://substack.com/redirect/6387f244-e1b2-4ac9-9260-9487059a4a73?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ]: 🎁 25 Free Resume Reviews: Includes ATS review, custom ATS optimized templates, and a detailed review sent directly to your inbox (worth $25). 🎉 Giveaway of 25 XYZ Domain Coupon Codes: Be one of the lucky winners to get a free XYZ domain! Don't miss out on this opportunity to improve your GitHub profile and win exciting rewards. See you at 8:00 PM! Stay tuned and get ready to elevate your GitHub game! Speaker Details: Sanjay Viswanathan GitHub: Sanjay Viswanathan [ https://substack.com/redirect/206865e7-5668-42af-a257-119ea007298e?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ] LinkedIn: Sanjay Viswanathan [ https://substack.com/redirect/b367cfd2-0dc2-4165-afae-ac146dce2747?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ] 🎉 Upcoming Events on GSSOC Event 1: Emerging Trends in Cloud-Based Data Engineering Speaker: Venkata Sreeram Date: 20th July 7:00 PM Location: Youtube Live [ https://substack.com/redirect/3ac1876e-2126-4540-9108-9a0d8d21a2a0?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ] We request everyone to follow these guidelines to ensure a fair and memorable GSSoC event. Genuine contributions will help you build healthy relationships and secure good jobs. Let’s make this year’s GSSoC the best one yet with high-quality contributions and exciting perks! Session Highlights: 🔍 Live GitHub Profile Reviews : Get personalized feedback on your GitHub profile. 💡 Tips to Enhance Your GitHub : Learn valuable tips and tricks to make your profile stand out. Rewards and Giveaways on Live : 🎁 25 Free Resume Reviews : Includes ATS review, custom ATS optimized templates, and a detailed review sent directly to your inbox (worth $25). 🎉 Giveaway of 25 XYZ Domain Coupon Codes : Be one of the lucky winners to get a free XYZ domain! Don't miss out on this opportunity to improve your GitHub profile and win exciting rewards. See you at 8:00 PM! Join us at 8 pm Stay tuned and get ready to elevate your GitHub game! Speaker Details: Sanjay Viswanathan GitHub: Sanjay Viswanathan LinkedIn: Sanjay Viswanathan 🎉 Upcoming Events on GSSOC Event 1: Emerging Trends in Cloud-Based Data Engineering Speaker: Venkata Sreeram Date: 20th July 7:00 PM Location: Youtube Live We request everyone to follow these guidelines to ensure a fair and memorable GSSoC event. Genuine contributions will help you build healthy relationships and secure good jobs. Let’s make this year’s GSSoC the best one yet with high-quality contributions and exciting perks! If you find someone violating these rules, please inform us here Report Here Wishing you all a happy contribution! subject: Google Calendar now shows events from Gmail
content: Google Calendar now shows events from Gmail    Google Calendar can show events such as reservations and flights, that   Gmail creates from messages you receive. Your calendar now shows this event   from Gmail:  ML Connect: AWS on Tue Jul 23, 2024 at 10:00am  Only you can see an event from Gmail unless you change the event's   visibility. You can also change the default visibility of events from Gmail   in Calendar settings.  To stop seeing these events in Calendar or change their default visibility,   go to Events from Gmail in Calendar settings. To stop Gmail from creating   these events, you must also turn off Smart features and personalization in   Gmail settings. Learn more at   https://support.google.com/calendar/?p=events_from_gmail about events from   Gmail and how to control them.  This is the only notification you’ll get about events from Gmail. In   the future, Calendar won’t send you an email when Gmail creates a new   event. Google Calendar now shows events from Gmail Google Calendar can show events such as reservations and flights, that Gmail creates from messages you receive. Your calendar now shows this event from Gmail: ML Connect: AWS on Tue Jul 23, 2024 at 10:00am - View Only you can see an event from Gmail unless you change the event's visibility. You can also change the default visibility of events from Gmail in Calendar settings. To stop seeing these events in Calendar or change their default visibility, go to Events from Gmail in Calendar settings. To stop Gmail from creating these events, you must also turn off Smart features and personalization in Gmail settings. Learn more about events from Gmail and how to control them. This is the only notification you’ll get about events from Gmail. In the future, Calendar won’t send you an email when Gmail creates a new event.

content: Dear Students, We at DEPSTAR are excited to announce a series of activities for the upcoming semester. Some activities will be open to all, while others will be tailored to your specific interests. To ensure effective planning and to provide you with targeted guidance, we encourage you to choose a career path aligned with your interests.  *Please complete the Google form provided below by 1st June 2024.*  If you have any questions, feel free to contact the TPR or HOD Sir/Ma'am.  *Form Link: https://forms.gle/CZJf9T36ofvuQs4E7 *  --  regards Ms. Krishna Patel (Ph.D.) Assistant Professor Department of Computer Science & Engineering Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research Charotar University of Science And Technology  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). subject: The process of CSIC (CHARUSAT Startup and Innovation Centre) @CHARUSAT
content: Dear Students, Greetings of the day!!  As CSIC Coordinator, I am excited to share the process we follow at CHARUSAT. We CSIC (CHARUSAT STARTUP AND INNOVATION CENTRE), a dynamic and forward-thinking start-up center that focuses on Job Creators, not Job Seekers.  Our team of experts has been working tirelessly to develop cutting-edge products/services that are designed to how it can address a specific problem or fulfill a need in the market. It works with a vision to develop successful entrepreneurs who can contribute (to nation-building) through creativity, problem-solving, and innovation for the growth and development of society at large.  CSIC aims to create an entrepreneurial ecosystem within CHARUSAT that acts as a catalyst in identifying, motivating, and nurturing entrepreneurial talents; mentoring them toward sustainable pursuits through entrepreneurship awareness, education, training, and research. We are proud to share that our start-up has already gained significant traction in the industry, and we have received positive feedback from early adopters.  We would be honored to further discuss our upcoming start-up and explore potential and opportunities with SSIP, for further information, kindly visit the following links.  For SSIP 2.0 Policy: *https://rb.gy/8qutqt *  The steps under which Entrepreneurial mindset development follows @CSIC:  1) Sensitization/Orientation Activity  2) Idea registration  3) Idea pitching & Evaluation  4) Prototype building funding under SSIP  5) Company Registration  Apart from the above process, other things under which students can groom themselves:  1) Idea Thon. 2) Exposure to take part in other competitive events across India. 3) Company Registration  You can meet me in lab 307 related to CSIC for any assistance. --   *Nilesh Kumar Dubey**(PhD)* Assistant Professor, Computer Science and Engineering, Institutional Coordinator of *IQAC*, *CSIC,* *UIIC, IPR* Devang Patel Institute of Advanced Technology & Research  Changa-388421, Gujarat, INDIA. http://www.charusat.ac.in  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon  this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient  is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, or the  employee, or agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended  recipient and/or if you have received this in error, please contact the  sender and delete the material from the computer or device. CHARUSAT does  not take any liability or responsibility for any malicious codes/software  and/or viruses/Trojan horses that may have been picked up during the  transmission of this message. By opening and solely relying on the contents  or part thereof this message, and taking action thereof, the recipient  relieves the CHARUSAT of all the liabilities including any damages done to  the recipient's pc/laptop/peripherals and other communication devices due  to any reason. For SSIP 2.0 Policy: https://rb.gy/8qutqt The steps under which Entrepreneurial mindset development follows @CSIC: 1) Sensitization/Orientation Activity 2) Idea registration 3) Idea pitching & Evaluation 4) Prototype building funding under SSIP 5) Company Registration Apart from the above process, other things under which students can groom themselves: 1) Idea Thon. 2) Exposure to take part in other competitive events across India. 3) Company Registration You can meet me in lab 307 related to CSIC for any assistance. -- Nilesh Kumar Dubey (PhD) Assistant Professor, Computer Science and Engineering, Institutional Coordinator of IQAC , CSIC, UIIC, IPR Devang Patel Institute of Advanced Technology & Research Changa-388421, Gujarat, INDIA. http://www.charusat.ac.in DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). content: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Team Galvanize Date: Mon, Jul 15, 2024 at 9:07 AM Subject: Session with EducationUSA Advisor | Please Share With Students. To: Charotar Institute of Technology   Hello from Galvanize,  *Galvanize* is excited to announce an exclusive session with the *EducationUSA Advisor at the U.S.-India Educational Foundation (USIEF) Center*. This session will focus on "*Mastering the USA Higher Education Application Process from Start to Finish"* and is specifically designed for students *planning to study in the United States.*  Click *www.galvanizeme.com/usa* to know more!  *We kindly request that you forward this email to all your students.*  We believe that providing access to *these resources will empower students to confidently pursue their academic* aspirations on a global scale.  Once again thanking you for all your support!  PFB, Email for your students!  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  Hello Student,  Are you thinking about pursuing your *Master's, MBA, or Ph.D. in the United States* but feeling *uncertain about the application process, university selection, or how to apply?*  We're here to help! Join us for an informative webinar with the *EducationUSA advisor at the U.S.- India Educational Foundation (USIEF) Center, *where they'll provide you with a comprehensive overview of the essential steps you need to follow to *pursue your academic goals in the U.S *and let you know the* Mastering the USA Higher Education Application Process from Start to Finish!*  When it's happening: *Friday, 19th July 2024, 7 PM (IST) Onwards*  *CLICK HERE TO REGISTER NOW* or use *www.galvanizeme.com/usa* *Hurry up and Register. subject: Fwd: Most Advanced Ethical Hacking of 2024: Latest version of CEH +  CEH Practical
content: Dear Students,   Nice chance to grab the opportunity. Kindly go through the trailing mail if interested.  Thank you.  Regards, Radhika H. Patel, Assistant Professor, Department of Information Technology, Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR), CHARUSAT,  Changa      ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Pritesh Prajapati Date: Wed, Apr 3, 2024 at 3:19 PM Subject: Most Advanced Ethical Hacking of 2024: Latest version of CEH + CEH Practical To:  Dear students,  We are glad to inform you that *"Charotar University of Science and Technology - CHARUSAT"* is now the official *EC-Council Academia Partner*. It gives us immense pleasure to welcome “CHARUSAT” *students* to EC Council's newly launched *CEHv12* program, Certified Ethical Hacker CEHv12 will teach you the latest commercial-grade hacking tools, techniques, and methodologies used by hackers and information security professionals to lawfully hack an organization. *93 students have benefited from CEH at CHARUSAT with a subsidized academia kit price.*   *What’s new in CEHv12?*: *MITRE Attack Framework, The diamond model of intrusion analysis, Techniques for establishing persistence, Evading NAC and endpoint security, Understand Fog, Edge, and Grid Computing Models*   *You will get:*     - EC-Council Official Course Book for CEHv12 for self-study (24 Months) -    Accessible Online/Offline. To Download App - Access To iLabs for 6 Months. Check the ilabs Demo Here:    *https://youtu.be/iU_7zKypJZI* .    - An Exam Voucher (1 Year) - *Get a globally recognized certificate for* passing    the exam. Accreditations - Over 200 hands-on labs with Over 3,500 hacking tools. Learn how to    hack multiple operating systems (Windows 11, Windows servers, Linux,    Ubuntu, Android)    - The venue of the Exam will be our University Premises.  *Popular Cybersecurity Tools in the Course:*     - *Network scanning and mapping tools *(e.g. Nmap, hping3)    - *Vulnerability assessment tools *(e.g. OpenVAS, Nessus)    - *Penetration testing tools *(e.g. Metasploit, Aircrack-ng)    - *Packet sniffers and network analyzers *(e.g. Wireshark, Omnipeek    Network Analyzer)    - *Social engineering tools *(e.g. Social-Engineer Toolkit (SET),    SpeedPhish Framework (SPF))    - *Password cracking tools *(e.g. John the Ripper, L0phtCrack)    - *Forensics tools *(e.g. FTK, EnCase, Autopsy)    - *Wireless hacking tools *(e.g. Aircrack-ng, Wifiphisher)    - *Encryption tools *(e.g. CryptoForge, VeraCrypt)  *Common Job Roles for C|EH :*     - Mid-Level Information Security Auditor    - Cybersecurity Auditor    - Security Administrator    - IT Security Administrator    - Cyber Defense Analyst    - Senior Security Consultant    - Information Security Manager    - Senior SOC Analyst    - Solution Architect    - Cybersecurity Consultant       - Vulnerability Assessment Analyst    - Warning Analyst    - Information Security Analyst 1    - Security Analyst L1    - Infosec Security Administrator    - Cybersecurity Analyst L1, L2, & L3    - Network Security Engineer    - SOC Security Analyst    - Security Analyst    - Network Engineer  *Webinar on "A Career in Cybersecurity" by EC-Council with Collaboration of CHARUSAT | Campus Official: *https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X-QgxO3JhlA   *Testimonials:*     - How Certified Ethical Hacker Helped Me Land a Job with Big4 | Sidhant    Gupta - Catch Your Big Break in Cybersecurity with C|EH | Ravina Joshi - How C|EH Helped Me Build a Successful Career in Cybersecurity *Market Cost:*      - For CEHv12, the actual eCourseware Price is $850, per their norms. To    attempt an Exam without Training in CEH, you need 2 years of experience in    Information Security, which has application Fees of $100 (non-refundable) +    an Exam Voucher Price of Pearson Vue Voucher ($1199) or an ECC exam voucher    ($950). So the total cost of eCourseware + exam will be $1900 (850+100+950)    or $2149 (850+100+1199).    - Directly from EC-Council India: *1,79,902.32 INR including Taxes *    - *New Offer -  **What is CEH Master?: **CEH + CEH Practical = CEH    (Master) - https://www.eccouncil.org/train-certify/ceh-master/ *   *Cost for CHARUSAT Students only:*     - *We* communicated and requested *the EC-Council for the same, and they    are ready to provide a *subsidized academia kit* for CHARUSAT students    at a *reduced cost as per the options below.  *Option 1: Self-Study Mode*  *Course Name*  *Purchase URL*  *Actual Cost*  *Discount Code*  *Final Checkout Academic Discounted Cost*  *with @charusat.edu.in Email ID only*  CEHv12 (Complete Series) eBook + iLabs w/ ECC Exam Voucher   Click Here *₹1,79,902.32*   *ECC-ACA-IND2-CEHv12-ELV*   *₹ 17,102 INR*   CEH Practical (Only Practical Exam)   Click Here *₹49,758.50*   *ECC-ACA-IND-CEH-PRACTICAL*   *₹ 13,781 INR*  *Option 2: Instructor-Led Training Mode*  Course  Name  Package  Price INR/Student Kit   Certified Ethical Hacker CEHv12    *Official EC-Council Certified Instructor-Led Training* +  CEHv12 (Complete Series) eBook + iLabs w/ ECC Exam Voucher   *33,102 INR*  (16,000+17,102)   *Purchase Procedure from EC-Council Kits Directly with Discounted Cost: *     1. Please ensure you create an account on the EC-Council site with your    university student domain "studentid*@**charusat.edu.in *” and log in before you pay.    2. *Please Apply the discount code at checkout before payment to get the    student offer. *    3. Please email me at *priteshprajapati.it@charusat.ac.in * with *order number *details conforming    to your purchase for our records, along with:       1. Student Name:       2. Student ID:       3. Email Address:    *Once the purchase is made for kits, you will receive your material from ordersupport@eccouncil.org in 5-7 working days. After payment, the EC-Council will directly deliver your learning material.*  *Interested students **are requested to fill out the details **to get a **subsidized academia kit i**n the given form on or before 15 April 2024. * *Register for EC-Council Ethical Hacker 2023-24 (Batch 6): * https://forms.gle/hrzCCVqUfxiCmzsYA.  EC-Council’s Certified Ethical Hacker training (ECC-CEH) certifies a security professional as an Ethical Hacker and Penetration Tester. CEH training certifies an ethical hacker's abilities to guard against the weaknesses and vulnerabilities of network infrastructure and illegal hacking. A CEH certification is helpful considering the increasing security threats to computer networks and web servers and the need to make networks "hacker-proof". The best way to do this is to understand the methods employed by hackers to intrude into systems.    The Certified Ethical Hacker program is the pinnacle of the most desired information security training program any information security professional will ever want to be in. To master hacking technologies, you will need to become one, but an ethical one! The accredited course provides advanced hacking tools and techniques hackers, and information security professionals use to break into an organization. As we put it, *“To beat a hacker, you need to think like a hacker”*. This course will immerse you into the Hacker Mindset so that you will be able to defend against future attacks. The security mindset in any organization must not be limited to the silos of a specific vendor, technologies, or pieces of equipment.    This ethical hacking training will introduce the students to an interactive environment where they will be shown how to scan, test, hack, and secure their systems. The lab-intensive environment gives each student in-depth knowledge and practical experience with the current essential security systems. Students will begin by understanding how perimeter defenses work and then learn how to scan and hack their networks (no real network is harmed) to spot vulnerabilities. During this ethical hacking course, students learn how intruders escalate privileges and what steps can be taken to secure a system.  *References:*     1. https://www.eccouncil.org/programs/certified-ethical-hacker-ceh/    2. https://cert.eccouncil.org/certified-ethical-hacker.html    3. https://cert.eccouncil.org/application-process-eligibility.html#ceh    4.    https://store.eccouncil.org/product/ceh-vue-exam-cum-practical-voucher/    5. https://store.eccouncil.org/product/ceh-vue-exam-voucher/   *Thanks & Regards,*  *Mr. Priteshkumar Prajapati **|| Website || Blog || YouTube Channel || LinkedIn || ** Mobile App || GitHub ||* *|| CEI ** || CCSE || **CHFI || **CEH **|| ECIH || CND ||** ACE * *|| **Credly Profile || Credential Profile || * *Assistant Professor, * *EC-Council Academia & CompTIA Academic Partner * *Representative,* *K. D. Patel Department of Information Technology,* *Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology,* *Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT), Changa, India.* *Email: priteshprajapati.it@charusat.ac.in *   --   *Thanks & Regards,*  *Mr. Priteshkumar Prajapati **|| Website || Blog || YouTube Channel || LinkedIn || ** Mobile App || GitHub ||* *|| CEI ** || CCSE || **CHFI || **CEH **|| ECIH || CND ||** ACE * *|| **Credly Profile || Credential Profile || * *Assistant Professor, * *EC-Council Academia & CompTIA Academic Partner * *Representative,* *K. D. Patel Department of Information Technology,* *Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology,* *Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT), Changa, India.* *Email: priteshprajapati.it@charusat.ac.in *  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT).
