Patel, Assistant Professor, Department of Information Technology, Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR), CHARUSAT,  Changa ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Pritesh Prajapati < priteshprajapati.it@charusat.ac.in > Date: Wed, Apr 3, 2024 at 3:19 PM Subject: Most Advanced Ethical Hacking of 2024: Latest version of CEH + CEH Practical To: Dear students, We are glad to inform you that "Charotar University of Science and Technology - CHARUSAT" is now the official EC-Council Academia Partner . It gives us immense pleasure to welcome “CHARUSAT” students to EC Council's newly launched CEHv1 2 program, Certified Ethical Hacker CEHv12 will teach you the latest commercial-grade hacking tools, techniques, and methodologies used by hackers and information security professionals to lawfully hack an organization. 93 students have benefited from CEH at CHARUSAT with a subsidized academia kit price. What’s new in CEHv1 2 ? : MITRE Attack Framework , The diamond model of intrusion analysis , Techniques for establishing persistence , Evading NAC and endpoint security , Understand Fog, Edge, and Grid Computing Models You will get: EC-Council Official Course Book for CEHv1 2 for self-study (24 Months) - Accessible Online/Offline. To Download App Access To iLabs for 6 Months. Check the ilabs Demo Here: https://youtu.be/iU_7zKypJZI . An E xam V oucher (1 Year) - Get a globally recognized certificate for passing the exam. Accreditations Over 200 hands-on labs with Over 3,500 hacking tools . Learn how to hack multiple operating systems (Windows 11, Windows servers, Linux, Ubuntu, Android) The venue of the Exam will be our University Premises. Popular Cybersecurity Tools in the Course: Network scanning and mapping tools (e.g. Nmap, hping3) Vulnerability assessment tools (e.g. OpenVAS, Nessus) Penetration testing tools (e.g. Metasploit, Aircrack-ng) Packet sniffers and network analyzers (e.g. Wireshark, Omnipeek Network Analyzer) Social engineering tools (e.g. Social-Engineer Toolkit (SET), SpeedPhish Framework (SPF) ) Password cracking tools (e.g. John the Ripper, L0phtCrack) Forensics tools (e.g. FTK, EnCase, Autopsy) Wireless hacking tools (e.g. Aircrack-ng, Wifiphisher) Encryption tools (e.g. CryptoForge, VeraCrypt) Common Job Roles for C|EH : Mid-Level Information Security Auditor Cybersecurity Auditor Security Administrator IT Security Administrator Cyber Defense Analyst Senior Security Consultant Information Security Manager Senior SOC Analyst Solution Architect Cybersecurity Consultant Vulnerability Assessment Analyst Warning Analyst Information Security Analyst 1 Security Analyst L1 Infosec Security Administrator Cybersecurity Analyst L1, L2, & L3 Network Security Engineer SOC Security Analyst Security Analyst Network Engineer Webinar on "A Career in Cybersecurity" by EC-Council with Collaboration of CHARUSAT | Campus Official: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X-QgxO3JhlA Testimonials: How Certified Ethical Hacker Helped Me Land a Job with Big4 | Sidhant Gupta Catch Your Big Break in Cybersecurity with C|EH | Ravina Joshi How C|EH Helped Me Build a Successful Career in Cybersecurity Market Cost: For CEHv12, the actual eCourseware Price is $850, per their norms. To attempt an Exam without Training in CEH, you need 2 years of experience in Information Security, which has application Fees of $100 (non-refundable) + an Exam Voucher Price of Pearson Vue Voucher ($1199) or an ECC exam voucher ($950). So the total cost of eCourseware + exam will be $1900 (850+100+950) or $2149 (850+100+1199) . Directly from EC-Council India: 1,79,902.32 INR including Taxes New Offer - What is CEH Master?: CEH + CEH Practical = CEH (Master) - https://www.eccouncil.org/train-certify/ceh-master/ Cost for CHARUSAT Students only: W e communicated and requested the EC-Council for the same, and they are ready to provide a subsidized academia kit for CHARUSAT students at a reduced cost as per the options below. Option 1: Self-Study Mode Course Name Purchase URL Actual Cost Discount Code Final Checkout Academic   Discounted C ost with @ charusat.edu.in Email ID only CEHv12 (Complete   Series) eBook + iLabs w/ ECC Exam Voucher Click Here ₹1,79,902.32 ECC-ACA-IND2-CEHv12-ELV ₹ 17,102 INR CEH Practical (Only Practical Exam) Click Here ₹49,758.50 ECC-ACA-IND-CEH-PRACTICAL ₹ 13,781 INR Option 2: Instructor-Led Training Mode Course  Name Package Price INR/Student Kit Certified Ethical Hacker CEHv1 2 Official EC-Council Certified Instructor- L ed Training + CEHv1 2 (Complete Series) eBook + iLabs w/ ECC Exam Voucher 33,102 INR (16,000+17,102) Purchase Procedure from EC-Council Kits Directly with Discounted Cost : Please ensure you create an account on the EC-Council site with your university student domain " studentid @ charusat.edu.in ” and log in before you pay . Please Apply the discount code at checkout before payment to get the student offer. Please email me at priteshprajapati.it@charusat.ac.in with order number details conforming to your purchase for our records, along with: Student Name : Student ID : Email Address : Once the purchase is made for kits , you will receive your material from ordersupport@eccouncil.org in 5- 7 working days. After payment, the EC-Council will directly deliver your learning material . Interested students are requested to fill out the details to get a subsidized academia kit i n the given form on or before 15 April 2024. Register for EC-Council Ethical Hacker 202 3-2 4 (Batch 6): https://forms.gle/hrzCCVqUfxiCmzsYA . EC-Council’s Certified Ethical Hacker training (ECC-CEH) certifies a security professional as an Ethical Hacker and Penetration Tester. CEH training certifies an ethical hacker's abilities to guard against the weaknesses and vulnerabilities of network infrastructure and illegal hacking. A CEH certification is helpful considering the increasing security threats to computer networks and web servers and the need to make networks "hacker-proof". The best way to do this is to understand the methods employed by hackers to intrude into systems. The Certified Ethical Hacker program is the pinnacle of the most desired information security training program any information security professional will ever want to be in. To master hacking technologies, you will need to become one, but an ethical one! The accredited course provides advanced hacking tools and techniques hackers, and information security professionals use to break into an organization. As we put it, “To beat a hacker , you need to think like a hacker ” . This course will immerse you into the Hacker Mindset so that you will be able to defend against future attacks. The security mindset in any organization must not be limited to the silos of a specific vendor, technologies, or pieces of equipment. This ethical hacking training will introduce the students to an interactive environment where they will be shown how to scan, test, hack, and secure their systems. The lab-intensive environment gives each student in-depth knowledge and practical experience with the current essential security systems. Students will begin by understanding how perimeter defenses work and then learn how to scan and hack their networks (no real network is harmed) to spot vulnerabilities. During this ethical hacking course, students learn how intruders escalate privileges and what steps can be taken to secure a system. Reference s : https://www.eccouncil.org/programs/certified-ethical-hacker-ceh/ https://cert.eccouncil.org/certified- ethical - hacker .html https://cert.eccouncil.org/application-process-eligibility.html#ceh https://store.eccouncil.org/product/ceh-vue-exam-cum-practical-voucher/ https://store.eccouncil.org/product/ceh-vue-exam-voucher/ Thanks & Regards, Mr. Priteshkumar Prajapati || Website || Blog || YouTube Channel || LinkedIn || Mobile App || GitHub || || CEI || CCSE || CHFI || CEH || ECIH || CND || ACE || Credly Profile || Credential Profile || Assistant Professor, EC-Council Academia & CompTIA Academic Partner Representative, K. subject: Seminar on "Project Selection: For the upliftment of your career"
content: Dear Students,  Greetings!!!  We are excited to invite you to a seminar on "*Project Selection: For the Upliftment of Your Career*" on July 6th, 2024, from 3:00 PM to 4:00 PM. This session will focus on the importance of selecting the right types of projects, whether research-based, service-sector based, or otherwise, to enhance your career growth.  *Session Details:* *Date:* 6th July 2024 *Time:* 03:00 PM to 04:00 PM *Resource Person: *Dr. Hardik Jayswal *Venue:* Will be communicated to Interested Students  *Link for the registration:* https://forms.gle/FZaeC2uZxQyh521r9  Please join us for this enlightening session and take a step towards empowering yourself for success and future readiness.  Looking forward to your active participation.   *Thanks and Regards,* *RADHIKA H. subject: Join the CHARUSAT Media Crew: Unleash Your Creativity and Showcase  Our Campus!
content: Dear Students,  The *CHARUSAT Media Crew (CMC) *is looking for passionate students like you! This is your chance to be part of a team that shares the unique story of our campus through creative and exciting content. It's more than just developing your skills; it's about leaving a lasting impact by showcasing the energy and beauty of CHARUSAT life.  Become a member and explore your creativity! You'll be responsible for crafting visually compelling content that resonates with everyone, from current students to alumni and even the wider community. Whether you're a whiz at photography, videography, graphic design, or anything else artistic, your contribution will play a key role in shaping how people see CHARUSAT.  Imagine seeing your work on our official channels, admired by thousands! This is your golden opportunity to showcase your talent and inspire others with your unique artistic perspective.  We eagerly await the incredible content you will create and are excited to support you on this creative journey. If you’re ready to make a difference and leave your mark, join us as part of the CHARUSAT Media Crew.  Recruitment is open for : Photographer Videographer Cinematographer Camera Operator ( Having Proper Camera Knowledge ) Content Creator of University Social Media Handles Video Editor ( Reels or Professional Video )  Fill out the form: https://forms.gle/F9Lk1KDvAqebQAi78 *Registration Closes on July 19, 2024*  If you have any other questions or need further assistance with your invitation, feel free to ask! Mann Patel: 9512316804 / d22dce159@charusat.edu.in Vaidik Patel: 6355176669 / d22dce156@charusat.edu.in   Thanks & Regards,  *Corporate Communication Officer* [image: ] : www.charusat.ac.in [image: ] : *https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PdpuaQNgDSc&t=85s * [image: My account - Activating your personal WhatsApp link] --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). By opening and solely relying on the contents  or part thereof this message, and taking action thereof, the recipient  relieves the CHARUSAT of all the liabilities including any damages done to  the recipient's pc/laptop/peripherals and other communication devices due  to any reason. subject: 2 Credit Compulsory Course on Liberal Arts at CHARUSAT
content: Dear Students,    Greetings!    You must be aware that the Faculty of Humanities offers a *2 Credit * Compulsory *Course on Liberal Arts.*   Please be informed that the liberal arts course opted by you will be taught in the *Workshop Mode *(9:10 am to 4:30 pm) during* 05, 06, and 07 March, 2023 *at CHARUSAT Campus, Changa.    *Please note that if you fail to attend the workshop, complete the tasks, activities and assignments, you may FAIL in the course and get a BACKLOG.*    *Please make a note of following:*      - Ensure that your Liberal Arts Course Registration is completed on the    E-Governance and you have elected / registered for one of the Liberal Arts    Courses i.e. Painting, Photography, Media and Graphic Design, Contemporary    Dance, and Dramatics.    - Each course of Liberal Arts is a 2 Credit Course.    - *You are required to collect a Kit*. The kit distribution is scheduled    on *March 04, 2024* (from 9:30 am to 4:00 pm) in different slots. The    venue for the kit distribution will be Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of    Management. You will be informed about your slot for kit collection by your    institute faculty coordinator.    -  Students must bring the Kit every day and take care of the materials    and instruments given to them. In case, if something is lost, you will be    required to manage it.    - *Ensure to maintain 100% attendance and completion of the assigned    tasks/assignments / submissions during the liberal arts workshop. Failing    to do so may result in FF Grade/backlog in this course. *    - Students need to report on time (at least 10 minutes before the    stipulated time).    - They must perform the practical or do the tasks assigned to them.    -  As the external Resource Persons are invited, you are also required    to maintain discipline and decorum befitting the students of a university    and professional programs.    - It is required that every student carry their own Identity Card and    wears it during all three days of the workshop.    - Details of the syllabus for the opted course, the evaluation scheme,    and other instructions will be provided to the students in their kit as    well as via email.    - Ensure that you have access to your Teams / Google Classroom account    as that will be required for further communications and submissions.    - Follow the instructions / guidance given by the Resource Persons /    Faculty Coordinators.  Feel free to contact Dr. Pradipsinh B Zala, Mobile Number: 9510963189 (Institute Coordinator) in case of any queries.    Happy Learning! 😀😀    With regards,    *Dr. Pradipsinh B Zala*  Assistant Professor  Faculty of Humanities  *Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT) *  Changa-388421 | Ta. Petlad,  Dist. Anand | Gujarat  *Mobile No: +91-95109 63189*  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon  this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient  is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, or the  employee, or agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended  recipient and/or if you have received this in error, please contact the  sender and delete the material from the computer or device. CHARUSAT does  not take any liability or responsibility for any malicious codes/software  and/or viruses/Trojan horses that may have been picked up during the  transmission of this message. By opening and solely relying on the contents  or part thereof this message, and taking action thereof, the recipient  relieves the CHARUSAT of all the liabilities including any damages done to  the recipient's pc/laptop/peripherals and other communication devices due  to any reason. Dear Students, Greetings! You must be aware that the Faculty of Humanities offers a 2 Credit Compulsory Course on Liberal Arts. Please be informed that the liberal arts course opted by you will be taught in the Workshop Mode (9:10 am to 4:30 pm) during 05, 06, and 07 March, 2023 at CHARUSAT Campus, Changa. Please note that if you fail to attend the workshop, complete the tasks, activities and assignments, you may FAIL in the course and get a BACKLOG. Please make a note of following: Ensure that your Liberal Arts Course Registration is completed on the E-Governance and you have elected / registered for one of the Liberal Arts Courses i.e. Painting, Photography, Media and Graphic Design, Contemporary Dance, and Dramatics. Each course of Liberal Arts is a 2 Credit Course. You are required to collect a Kit . The kit distribution is scheduled on March 04, 2024 (from 9:30 am to 4:00 pm) in different slots. The venue for the kit distribution will be Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management. You will be informed about your slot for kit collection by your institute faculty coordinator. Students must bring the Kit every day and take care of the materials and instruments given to them. In case, if something is lost, you will be required to manage it. Ensure to maintain 100% attendance and completion of the assigned tasks/assignments / submissions during the liberal arts workshop. Failing to do so may result in FF Grade/backlog in this course. Students need to report on time (at least 10 minutes before the stipulated time). They must perform the practical or do the tasks assigned to them. As the external Resource Persons are invited, you are also required to maintain discipline and decorum befitting the students of a university and professional programs. It is required that every student carry their own Identity Card and wears it during all three days of the workshop. Details of the syllabus for the opted course, the evaluation scheme, and other instructions will be provided to the students in their kit as well as via email. Ensure that you have access to your Teams / Google Classroom account as that will be required for further communications and submissions. Follow the instructions / guidance given by the Resource Persons / Faculty Coordinators. Feel free to contact Dr. Pradipsinh B Zala, Mobile Number: 9510963189 (Institute Coordinator) in case of any queries. Happy Learning! 😀😀 With regards, Dr. Pradipsinh B Zala Assistant Professor Faculty of Humanities Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT) Changa-388421 | Ta. Petlad, Dist. Anand | Gujarat Mobile No: +91-95109 63189 DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, or the employee, or agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended recipient and/or if you have received this in error, please contact the sender and delete the material from the computer or device. CHARUSAT does not take any liability or responsibility for any malicious codes/software and/or viruses/Trojan horses that may have been picked up during the transmission of this message. By opening and solely relying on the contents or part thereof this message, and taking action thereof, the recipient relieves the CHARUSAT of all the liabilities including any damages done to the recipient's pc/laptop/peripherals and other communication devices due to any reason.

subject: Sign up for the Live Session #1 - Microsoft Developers AI Learning Hackathon
content: ( http://devpost.com )  Join Microsoft Reactor and engage with startups and developers live sessions ( https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/reactor/series/S-1304/ )  May 1 from 8am to 9am Pacific Time - Learn to Build Your Own AI Apps with Azure Cosmos DB Part 1 ( https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/reactor/events/22116/ )  In this session, we'll walk you through the first half of our developer guide, covering essential topics such as Azure Cosmos DB, AI concepts, and the Azure OpenAI API. Whether you're just starting out or an experienced developer, this webinar provides valuable insights and practical experiences to help you build intelligent applications efficiently on Azure. Don't miss out on the chance to become proficient in Azure OpenAI and Vector Search technologies.  Sessions will be recorded for those who can’t attend during that time.   Hope to see you then!  You received this email because you signed up for Microsoft Developers AI Learning Hackathon. If you're no longer participating, you can unregister here ( https://azurecosmosdb.devpost.com/ ).  © 2024 Devpost, Inc. All rights reserved. Whether you're just starting out or an experienced developer, this webinar provides valuable insights and practical experiences to help you build intelligent applications efficiently on Azure. subject: Fwd: Regarding MYSY Scholarship Certificate Issuance Update
content: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Registrar CHARUSAT Date: Thu, Nov 2, 2023 at 1:50 PM Subject: Regarding MYSY Scholarship Certificate Issuance Update To:  Dear All,  This is to inform you that certificate-related processes for the following scholarships will exclusively take place through the e-governance system.  1) Mukhymantri Yuva Swavalamban Yojana (MYSY)  2) Hon. Chief Minister Scholarship Scheme (CMSS)  3) Digital Gujarat Scholarship  4) National Scholarship  This means that students, who are eligible for the above-mentioned scholarships must apply for and obtain his/her certificates via the e-governance system. Manual certificate issuance by institutes will no longer be an option.   Thank you for your cooperation and support in implementing this important initiative.  With Regards,   Dr. Atul Patel  Registrar   Accredited Grade “A+” by NAAC  www.charusat.ac.in  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). subject: =?utf-8?q?More_related_to_=22What_is_the_difference_between_a_steam_boiler_a?=  =?utf-8?q?nd_a_steam_generator=3F=22?=
content: Stories from your activity  -----  Question: How does a steam generator or boiler work?   Answer from Annamalai   In houses, steam is used in cooking. The flame heats the water and water boils. This is simple boiler. Steam Generator or Large boiler are also similar , but the sizes are  Read More: https://www.quora.com/qemail/track_click?al_imp=eyJ0eXBlIjogMzMsICJoYXNoIjogIjB8MXwxfDI1NzU0NzY4NiJ9&al_pri=8&aoid=qmIUeoF4ciu&aoty=1&aty=4&cp=1&ct=1712081174931374&et=130&id=21d412be0b0f49849322cefdc22f0a8c&inject=1&source=7&src=1&st=1712081174941353&stories=1_qmIUeoF4ciu%7C1_awvL6H1qCYa%7C1_XVdk7ZOG9gY%7C1_dqahANFaFkj%7C1_jBEYQf8UtSm%7C1_RrJDpTrUNPm%7C1_LG2lc5MY7I2%7C1_Y9KaMeR5M6u%7C1_3cKMRU83RG4%7C1_1EzwB1hr9v6&ty=1&ty_data=qmIUeoF4ciu&uid=Io9ojkJ4mt6&v=0 ----- Question: What are the main components of the steam boiler? subject: Fwd: INDUSTRY WORKSHOP on Data Science Series: Basics of Unstructured  Data Handling with ELK" on Saturday August 10, 2024 from 7:00 - 8:30 pm in  online mode
content: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: CSI KOLKATA Date: Thu, Jul 18, 2024 at 5:37 PM Subject: INDUSTRY WORKSHOP on Data Science Series: Basics of Unstructured Data Handling with ELK" on Saturday August 10, 2024 from 7:00 - 8:30 pm in online mode To:   *Dear Sir / Madam,*  Greetings from CSI Kolkata Chapter!    I am glad to inform you that the Computer Society of India, Kolkata Chapter is organizing *a INDUSTRY WORKSHOP on "**Data Science Series: Basics of Unstructured Data Handling with ELK**" on Saturday August 10, 2024 from 7:00 - 8:30 pm in online mode.*    *Speaker: Mr. Angshuman Ray, Sr. Solution Architect at Ericsson*    Students, Faculty and Industry Professionals should greatly benefit from this Workshop on the latest technology.    Therefore, requesting to share this information with faculty members, students, industry personnel and colleagues. The registration link of this course is given below:    *Registration Link : **https://forms.gle/fYfcS6TTBnPH2rCk8* Registration fee starts from Rs. 150 -- seats are limited and will be filled up on a first come first serve basis.    Please see the attached brochure for more information and requesting participation. subject: Fwd: Sub: Design Thinking impact on UPI
content: Dear Students,  A good article to go through.    Greetings from School of Design Thinking  Ever wondered how UPI payments became so seamless in India? Design Thinking played a crucial role!  This article explores how a human-centered and future-focused approach shaped UPI for a smooth user experience. subject: Invitation to C++ Templates and STL Peer Learning Session
content: Dear students,  I hope this email finds you well. We are excited to announce a peer learning session on C++ templates and the Standard Template Library (STL) that will be held tomorrow at* 2:20 pm* in *317 lab.*  Whether you are a beginner looking to enhance your understanding of these fundamental C++ concepts or an experienced developer seeking to deepen your knowledge, this session will offer valuable insights and opportunities for collaborative learning.  We are excited to meet you there.  *note: You can bring your own device for this session*  with regards, *Yash C. Patel */ student, 22DCS085, Depstar CSE, Email: 22dcs085@charusat.edu.in Mo. : +919313584983 Dear students, I hope this email finds you well. We are excited to announce a peer learning session on C++ templates and the Standard Template Library (STL) that will be held tomorrow at 2:20 pm in 317 lab. Whether you are a beginner looking to enhance your understanding of these fundamental C++ concepts or an experienced developer seeking to deepen your knowledge, this session will offer valuable insights and opportunities for collaborative learning. We are excited to meet you there. note: You can bring your own device for this session with regards, Yash C. Patel / student, 22DCS085, Depstar CSE, Email: 22dcs085@charusat.edu.in Mo. : +919313584983

content: *Thanks and Regards,* *RADHIKA H. PATEL* *Assistant Professor* *Department of Information Technology* *DEPSTAR,* *CHARUSAT, Changa*        ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR Date: Wed, Jun 26, 2024 at 12:47 PM Subject: Fwd: 📣 📣 𝐆𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐀𝐈 𝐅𝐨𝐫 𝐓𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐜𝐨𝐦 - 𝐅𝐢𝐫𝐬𝐭 𝐂𝐥𝐚𝐬𝐬 𝐅𝐫𝐞𝐞 🚀 🚀 To: Depstar         *❇ ❇ 𝐆𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐀𝐈 𝐅𝐨𝐫 𝐓𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐜𝐨𝐦 - 𝐅𝐢𝐫𝐬𝐭 𝐂𝐥𝐚𝐬𝐬 𝐅𝐫𝐞𝐞 ❇ ❇*  Dear Sir/Madam,  *Did you miss the bus of Cloud in Telecom but don't want to miss the opportunities with Artificial Intelligence in Telecom?*   Accelerate your career growth by taking an AI + Gen AI course specifically designed for *Telecom Professionals.*  TelcoLearn in association with "AI ML etc." is conducting an online GenAI course for *Telecom Professionals*. In this course, we will start with the basics of AI and go all the way to the latest topics like AI Agents in 3 months.  The course is relevant, practical, end-to-end and short.  100+ professionals from Organizations like Microsoft, Nvidia, Infosys, Maersk, Sapient, Oracle, TCS, Genpact, Airtel, Unilever, Vodafone, Jio, Sterlite, Vedanta, iDreamCareer, PayTM etc. have attended the course before.   ✅ Demo Session 1 - 28th June - 7:30 - 8:30 PM IST or  ✅ Demo Session 2 - 30th June 2-3 PM IST ✅ Mode :- Online (Webex) ✅ Instructor 1 – Nikhilesh Tayal ( https://www.linkedin.com/in/nikhileshtayal/ )  ✅ Instructor 2– Sanjay Kumar ( https://www.linkedin.com/in/sanjaykumar-5g6g/ )   *About Trainers - Nikhilesh* is a serial entrepreneur, teacher, and alumnus of IIT KGP. Currently, he runs "AI ML etc." - an upskilling platform for serial professionals & entrepreneurs to learn AI easily and faster.  *Sanjay Kumar* is a Senior Telecom Professional with over 22 years of experience. He is the founder of TelcoLearn and has trained 20K+ people in more than 50 countries.  *Register for the session* *Join our Whatsapp Community for AI in Telecom * Unsubscribe | Update your profile | 113 Cherry St #92768, Seattle, WA 98104-2205 [image: Built with ConvertKit] --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). content: Notification settings CE144 OBJECT ORIENTED PROGRAMMING WITH C++ New assignment  Submission of Practical -11 Aim:- Create a C++ code to take employee experience to   represent as floating point value. Practical - 12 Aim:- Develop a C++ program for CHARUSAT students marksheet   generator (practical 1) using class. Practical - 13 Aim:- Update the CHARUSAT employee system (practical 8) as   per given class diagram. Practical - 14 Aim:- Develop a C++ program for library management system. Practical - 15 Aim:- Develop a C++ program for amazon product as per given   class diagram. Practical - 16 Aim:- Update the TATA motors system (practical 3) to get   input from the file. subject: Fwd: Invitation to Online Workshop on NDLI/NDLI Club - May 28, 2024
content: Dear Students,  Go through the trailing mail. Kindly take the benefit of the workshop.  Thank you.  Regards, Radhika H. Patel, Assistant Professor, Department of Information Technology, Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR), CHARUSAT,  Changa  ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Jay Patel Date: Mon, 27 May 2024, 4:59 pm Subject: Invitation to Online Workshop on NDLI/NDLI Club - May 28, 2024 To: DEPSTAR Cc: Head CE Depstar , Principal DEPSTAR < principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>, Nisha Panchal < nishapanchal.dce@charusat.ac.in>   Dear sir/ma'am,  We are excited to invite you to an informative online workshop on the National Digital Library of India (NDLI) and the NDLI Club, scheduled for May 28, 2024, at 11:00 AM.  *Event Details:*  Date: May 28, 2024 Time: 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM Platform: Google meet.  Tuesday, May 28 · 11:00am12:00pm Time zone: Asia/Kolkata Google Meet joining info Video call link: https://meet.google.com/xnd-ckrp-nku Or dial: ‪(US) +1 470-273-8924‬ PIN: ‪173 179 118‬#  *Workshop Agenda:*  - Introduction to NDLI and its vast resources - Need for an NDLI/NDLI CLUB registration. - How to navigate and utilize NDLI for academic and research purposes - Benefits and features of the NDLI Club - Interactive Q&A session  *About NDLI:* The National Digital Library of India (NDLI) is a digital repository containing a vast collection of academic content from various domains, accessible to students, researchers, and educators. The NDLI Club is an initiative to promote the use of NDLI resources through community engagement and collaborative learning.  We encourage you to join this workshop to enhance your knowledge and make the most of the resources available through NDLI and the NDLI Club. Your participation will be invaluable in fostering a collaborative learning environment.  *Note: * 1. It is complosory for all the staff to attend this online workshop. 2. Circulate the same to all the DEPSTAR Students.  If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.  Looking forward to your participation.   *Best regards,* *Jay Patel* *Assistant Professor,* *Executive Central Council,* *Department of Computer Engineering,* *Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)* *Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)*  *Stay healthy and fit.*   *Please don't print this e-mail unless you really need to.*  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). content: Dear Students,  Greetings!!!  Please find attached herewith the* seating arrangement of Unit Test_1.*      - Students are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in    the email attachment.    - Students are required to uphold decorum in the examination location.    - Mobile phones, smartwatches, or any other electronic devices are    strictly prohibited within the exam hall.    - Bags must be left outside, and it is mandatory to wear an ID card.    - Students have to take their seats in the exam hall at least 15    minutes before the exam time.  *The exam will take place in the DEPSTAR Building.* *Thanks and Regards,* *RADHIKA H. subject: =?UTF-8?Q?Invitation_to_the_Inauguration_of_UTKARSH=E2=80=9924=3A_Inte?= 	=?UTF-8?Q?r_University_Sports_Extravaganza?=
content: Dear All,  We are thrilled to invite you to the grand inauguration of "UTKARSH’24", an inter-university sports extravaganza, which promises to be an exciting celebration of athleticism and sportsmanship. The event will take place on 8th March at 8:30 AM at the Main Stage, Cricket Ground CHARUSAT University campus.  UTKARSH’24 will bring together teams from 19 participating universities across Gujarat, making it a truly inclusive and spirited competition. The inauguration ceremony marks the commencement of three days filled with thrilling matches, friendly rivalries, and unforgettable moments.  We cordially invite all members of the CHARUSAT Family to join us as we kick off UTKARSH’24 in the presence of teams from universities across the state. Your presence and support will add to the excitement of the event and contribute to its success. We look forward to welcoming you to the inauguration of UTKARSH’24 on 8th March at 8:30 AM. Let us come together to cheer for our teams, celebrate the spirit of sportsmanship, and create lasting memories.  Thank you for your continued support, and we hope to see you there!  Best regards, Mr. Kruten Patel CCO CHARUSAT University  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). subject: Fwd: Guidelines for ME145 EOE Practical Exam, May 2024
content: From: Dr. Sagar Chokshi Date: Thu, May 2, 2024 at 10:42 AM Subject: Guidelines for ME145 EOE Practical Exam, May 2024 To: Cc:   Dear Students,  Please find the *Guidelines for ME145 EOE* *Practical Exam *below. 1. EOE practical exam will be conducted in* EG Lab* 322, Second floor, A6 Building. 2. The following is the evaluation pattern as per pedagogy of ME145 EOE. INTERNAL EVALUATION EXTERNAL EVALUATION Sheet-1 Sheet-2 Experiments Total Practical Performance Viva Total OUT OF 10 OUT OF 07 OUT OF 08 OUT OF 25 OUT OF 15 OUT OF 10 OUT OF 25 3. To evaluate External 15 Marks, Engineering Drawings will be asked from any chapters randomly that you have to draw within a given time (approx. 30 mins to 45 mins will be given as per the questions) during Practical Performance 4. To evaluate External 10 Marks, *Viva* will be conducted by an external examiner from all EG/Civil/Mechanical portions. 5. Formal dressing is mandatory for practical examination.  You can contact me if you face any queries during and before the EOE Practical exam. Mob. No. +91-9726622007. --- Radhika Madam is requested to forward this email to DEPSTAR students. --- Thanks & Regards,  *Dr. Sagar Chokshi,* Associate Professor, Department of Mechanical Engineering, Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology Faculty of Technology & Engineering, Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT), ACCREDITED WITH “A+” GRADE BY NAAC Education Campus Changa -388421 At. & Post Changa-388421, Ta: Petlad, Dist: Anand, (Gujarat) India. content: *Dear Student of Charusat,*  Greetings From Teachnook!  We are pleased to share with you that our company is collaborating with *Cognizance (IIT Roorkee)* to offer a unique *2-month Training + Internship  Program*. This advanced program will provide you with the missing practical skills that you need to enhance your career.  We are enrolling only *LIMITED STUDENTS *in the program.  *It is Mandatory for students to fill out the form, if you get shortlisted you will be getting a call from our HR Team:*  LINK:- https://forms.gle/NF1cgFGe5ohF5LtV9  To know more information join in WhatsApp group:  *LINK:- https://chat.whatsapp.com/LXw7P60nsieIt8RYAvTvWi *   *FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE :*  *First month : *IIT training has been designed in the form of Live lectures along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login credentials will be provided to students after registration) No Prerequisites Required.  *Second month : Internship with live mentorship for projects from professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will be giving students experience in solving real-world problems.*  *Project 1:- 10 individual projects assigned to each intern which they have to complete with their mentor .*  *Project 2:-  Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a group of 15 interns. For each intern particular work will be assigned to them they have to work on it.* (Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by the company side itself)  *Here are two types of Classes we are providing:*  *1. Blended Program/Recorded classes: You will receive recorded sessions, whatever doubts you have you can clear it in live doubt clearing sessions which will be organized every weekend.*  *2. Mentor led/Live classes: You will be having live zoom classes at 6:30PM  for 2 to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well* LMS(Learning Management System) portal where you will have access to it for 6 months.     - Duration: 1 to 6 months.    - Batch Start Date: 7th of Every Month.    - Schedule: Weekly Twice after 6:30 PM.    - Link for classes : 24 HRs Prior to your registered mail.  *Mentors & their LinkedIn Profile whom we have on boarded for our programs.*   Web development Mentor Full-stack Developer at TCS ( https://www.linkedin.com/in/pratyushupadhyay/ )  Drone Engineering Mentor Technology Development Manager at Drona Aviation ( https://www.linkedin.com/in/apurvadonde/)  Android App Mentor-Senior Software Engineer at Uber ( https://www.linkedin.com/in/mohitsvnit/)  Cyber Security Mento, Associate Consultant - Warlabs at SISA ( https://www.linkedin.com/in/iamronithomas/)  After Completion of the program the student shall receive a:     - *Program completion certificate issued by *Cognizance (IIT Roorkee)    and Verified By Wipro DICE ID*.*    - *Co-Branded Internship **certificate from Top MNCs.*    - *100% Placement Assistance with Growth Community.*   *Congratulations! To Already registered students, You've taken the first step towards a brighter future. Don't miss out on this chance to take your career to the next level. Spread the word to your friends and classmates so they can benefit too!* Dear Student of Charusat, Greetings From Teachnook! We are pleased to share with you that our company is collaborating with Cognizance (IIT Roorkee) to offer a unique 2-month Training + Internship  Program . This advanced program will provide you with the missing practical skills that you need to enhance your career. We are enrolling only LIMITED STUDENTS in the program. It is Mandatory for students to fill out the form, if you get shortlisted you will be getting a call from our HR Team: LINK:- https://forms.gle/NF1cgFGe5ohF5LtV9 To know more information join in WhatsApp group: LINK:- https://chat.whatsapp.com/LXw7P60nsieIt8RYAvTvWi FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE : First month : IIT training has been designed in the form of Live lectures along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login credentials will be provided to students after registration) No Prerequisites Required. Second month : Internship with live mentorship for projects from professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will be giving students experience in solving real-world problems. Project 1:- 10 individual projects assigned to each intern which they have to complete with their mentor . Project 2:-  Capstone Project : It's a group project assigned to a group of 15 interns. For each intern particular work will be assigned to them they have to work on it. (Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by the company side itself) Here are two types of Classes we are providing: 1. Blended Program/Recorded classes: You will receive recorded sessions, whatever doubts you have you can clear it in live doubt clearing sessions which will be organized every weekend. 2. Mentor led/Live classes: You will be having live zoom classes at 6:30PM  for 2 to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well LMS(Learning Management System) portal where you will have access to it for 6 months. Duration: 1 to 6 months. Batch Start Date: 7th of Every Month. Schedule: Weekly Twice after 6:30 PM. Link for classes : 24 HRs Prior to your registered mail. Mentors & their LinkedIn Profile whom we have on boarded for our programs. Web development Mentor Full-stack Developer at TCS ( https://www.linkedin.com/in/pratyushupadhyay/ ) Drone Engineering Mentor Technology Development Manager at Drona Aviation ( https://www.linkedin.com/in/apurvadonde/ ) Android App Mentor-Senior Software Engineer at Uber ( https://www.linkedin.com/in/mohitsvnit/ ) Cyber Security Mento, Associate Consultant - Warlabs at SISA ( https://www.linkedin.com/in/iamronithomas/ ) After Completion of the program the student shall receive a: Program completion certificate issued by Cognizance (IIT Roorkee) and Verified By Wipro DICE ID . Co-Branded Internship certificate from Top MNCs. 100% Placement Assistance with Growth Community. Congratulations! to: Bela Shah <belashah.cse@charusat.ac.in>,  	Vidisha Pradhan <vidishapradhan.cse@charusat.ac.in>,  	"Dr. Kirti Makwana" <kirtimakwana.mba@charusat.ac.in>
subject: Re: IMP: (Update) TheHackersMeetup Expert talk & CTF
content: Hello Hackers!  Here are the solutions for all the challenges as promised :) I have zipped and attached all the necessary files for you to reproduce the challenges locally.   ** Welcome* Solution: You had to visit the /robots.txt file on the same domain where the CTF was hosted.   * *I can't SEEEEE IT* Solution: >From the source code of the page you can see it is fetching the flag from a remote API. Check the Network activity with inspect when you click the get flag button.   * *Secure Login* Solution: You can edit frontend html from inspect. Remove 'disabled' from all html form elements to enter text into the fields. Entering default credentials 'admin:password' and pressing the login button fetched the flag but didn't display on the front end. You again had to see the network activity and check the response from the remote API.   * *Encoding is not encryption!* Challenge: VEhNe0NyeXB0MEJAYnl9 Solution: Base64 encoded string.   * *Stupid Chemistry* Challenge: 39 EA 1 6 2 M 53 16 TR 39 Periodic Table cipher - dcode.fr/atomic-number-substitution   ** QR Busted!* Solution: QR codes are in a pattern. Fill in the missing two corners by copying the top right corner and scan it for the solution.   ** Find me if you can* Challenge: "Co-lead of The Hackers Meetup, Harshiv Kinariwala doesn't follow security policies and posts company secrets on social media! Can you believe that! Find that secret to get the flag." Solution: https://twitter.com/h_kinariwala   * *The Third Eye* Solution: A mp3 file is given. Use tools like audacity or skel to visualize it. It was Spectrogram Stegnography. Many have submitted the flag correctly but you were supposed to replace whitespaces with an underscore ( _ ).   ** RUN ME* Solution: The problem category was pwn where you are given an executable and you have to understand it's nature and logic and exploit it. Here in the given linux executable, you have to brute force the inputs by creating a local bash script that would input numbers one by one and output the correct number that is being accepted. Check the attached script to understand the logic.   These are all the intended solutions. There are other unintended ways as well that we hadn't taken into consideration. Well done if you managed to solve a challenge with a new way that is not mentioned here.  Reach out to Het Soni (21cs068@charusat.edu.in, +91 95109 56552) for any queries regarding the CTF. Thank you everyone who participated. Happy Hacking. subject: Fwd: Announcement of Certification Course on "Machine Learning and  Data Science: From Beginner to Expert"
content: Regards, Radhika H. Patel, Assistant Professor, Department of Information Technology, Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR), CHARUSAT,  Changa  ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Dean FCA CHARUSAT Date: Fri, 24 May 2024, 12:43 pm Subject: Announcement of Certification Course on "Machine Learning and Data Science: From Beginner to Expert" To: Charusat Family Dear Family Members,  Greetings of the day!  It's our pleasure to announce the Certification Course on "Machine Learning and Data Science: From Beginner to Expert", which at its core focuses on empowering a learner to master the skills essential for today's data-driven world. This course is designed for all Undergraduate and Postgraduate students / PhD Scholars / Faculty Members / Working Professionals who wish to understand the domain and make their career in it.  The course will begin on June 29, 2024 (Saturday), featuring *hybrid sessions* every Saturday, covering a wide range of essential content (the detailed content can be found here - https://sites.google.com/charusat.ac.in/cmpicaml/home ).  The brochure for the same is attached herewith for your kind reference.  The registration form for the course is - https://forms.gle/sV1Z3XnniKSFPhqa8.  The registration fee for this course is Rs. 499/- and the last date to register for the course is June 20, 2024.  You all are requested to circulate this message with the brochure to your students/faculty members and encourage them to register for the same.  Thank you.  Regards.  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). You all are requested to circulate this message with the brochure to your students/faculty members and encourage them to register for the same. Thank you. Regards. subject: Re: No Water Bottles Allowed in the Lab
content: Dear Students,  We have noticed that some students have been bringing water bottles into the lab recently. While we understand the convenience, it's important to consider the potential risks this poses to our lab equipment. Accidental spills could result in damage to sensitive machinery, disrupting our work and studies.  With immediate effect, we kindly request all students to refrain from bringing water bottles into the lab. This measure is essential to uphold a safe and productive environment for everyone. subject: Fwd: Inviting Expression of Interest for Idea submission in The  Inventors Challenge-2024
content: Dear Students,  Kindly go through the trailing mail and if you are interested in the *idea submission* on the mentioned subject then meet me for the discussion.  Thanks & Regards, Miss. Naina Parmar, Assistant Professor, Computer Science & Engineering Department, Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR) Changa-Gujarat 388421  Greetings from AICTE, Arm Education and STMicroelectronics!  All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), Ministry of Education, India, Arm Education and STMicroelectronics is organizing the 3rd edition of the contest "The Inventors Challenge - 2024."  As we embark on the 3rd edition of the contest The Inventors Challenge on a mission to grow the semiconductor talent pool and help nurture innovation, among faculty and students of engineering institutes in India. You are requested to submit your idea by 30th April 2024 on themes mentioned below for the contest:  Faculties and students are requested to submit their ideas based on the themes mentioned below by 30th April 2024.     o   Good Health and Well-Being     - Affordable and Clean Energy    - Industry, Innovation, and Infrastructure    - Sustainable Cities and Communities    - Smart Mobility    - Artificial Intelligence at the Edge  This is a team event, and each team should have one faculty and up to four students. The entry idea must be submitted only by the faculty member on behalf of the team. The ideas can be submitted through the link - Idea Submission Form-The Inventors Challenge 2024 - Google Forms Please Note: - No ideas will be accommodated after the deadline, i.e. 30th April 2024.  For more details refer to the Arm Community or email at Apurva.Varma@arm.com or  Ritika.Srivastav@arm.com  *With Regards*  *Dr. Ramesh Unnikrishnan,*  *Advisor-II, Training and Learning Bureau,*  *All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE)*  *New Delhi-110070*  *Tel: 011-29581215*  --  You received this message because you are subscribed to the Google Groups "Depstar_CSE" group. To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to depstar_cse+unsubscribe@charusat.ac.in. subject: Fwd: We are hiring | Inviting students from Cspit
content: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Internshala Date: Fri, Mar 8, 2024 at 12:58 PM Subject: We are hiring | Inviting students from Cspit To:   We are excited to inform you that we are hiring students from Internshala for the new edition of our flagship Internshala Student Partner program [image: Internshala]  Give flight to your ambitions Dear Sir/Ma'am,  Greetings from Internshala!  We are excited to inform you that we are hiring students from Internshala for the new edition of our flagship Internshala Student Partner program - a program where your students get practical exposure and learn real-world skills like marketing, communication, and leadership.  I kindly request you to share this email or this link - internshala.com/i/isp41-db with all your students ( first to final year).  Note - The last date to apply is 13th March 2024. No registration charges are involved. Regards,  Surbhi Garg  Manager - University Relations  Internshala ~ trusted partner of 7000+ colleges  Internshala (Scholiverse Educare Pvt. Ltd.)  B-610, Unitech Business Zone Golf Course Extension Road, Sector 50, Gurugram  Not keen on career commitments? By opening and solely relying on the contents  or part thereof this message, and taking action thereof, the recipient  relieves the CHARUSAT of all the liabilities including any damages done to  the recipient's pc/laptop/peripherals and other communication devices due  to any reason. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Internshala < university.relations@internshala.com > Date: Fri, Mar 8, 2024 at 12:58 PM Subject: We are hiring | Inviting students from Cspit To: We are excited to inform you that we are hiring students from Internshala for the new edition of our flagship Internshala Student Partner program Give flight to your ambitions Dear Sir/Ma'am, Greetings from Internshala! We are excited to inform you that we are hiring students from Internshala for the new edition of our flagship Internshala Student Partner program - a program where your students get practical exposure and learn real-world skills like marketing, communication, and leadership. I kindly request you to share this email or this link - internshala.com/i/isp41-db with all your students ( first to final year ). Note - The last date to apply is 13th March 2024 . No registration charges are involved. Regards, Surbhi Garg Manager - University Relations Internshala ~ trusted partner of 7000+ colleges Internshala (Scholiverse Educare Pvt. Ltd.) B-610, Unitech Business Zone Golf Course Extension Road, Sector 50, Gurugram Not keen on career commitments? Unsubscribe here to break up with us. )  DigitalOcean’s virtual conference for developers, startups, and founders is back on July 9, 2024! Deploy is packed with top-notch sessions covering DigitalOcean cloud platform specifics, the benefits of building your AI-based apps in the cloud, and more. subject: And the winner is... - Microsoft Developers AI Learning Hackathon
content: ( http://devpost.com )  The judges have weighed in, and we're excited to share the news! Go to the Microsoft Developers AI Learning Hackathon gallery ( https://azurecosmosdb.devpost.com/project-gallery?ref_content=winner_announcement_email&ref_feature=engagement&ref_medium=email&utm_campaign=winner_announcement_email&utm_medium=email&utm_source=winner_announcement_email? ) to congratulate the winners and check out all of the awesome submissions.  Even though the competition is over, you don't have to stop coding. Update your portfolio ( https://devpost.com/portfolio?ref_content=winner_announcement_email&ref_feature=portfolio&ref_medium=email&utm_campaign=winner_announcement_email&utm_medium=email&utm_source=winner_announcement_email? ) to inform your followers about new projects and get feedback from fellow hackers.  Questions? If you have any questions about the hackathon, please post on the discussion forum ( https://azurecosmosdb.devpost.com/forum_topics ). content: AI-inspired courses from industry leaders          Empowered with AI!  ( https://link.coursera.org/f/a/74_5vfUCD_msGMs1gUShkw~~/AAQRxQA~/RgRoe5ujP0Q_aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY291cnNlcmEub3JnL2V4cGxvcmUvZ2VuZXJhdGl2ZS1haT9saWQ9aGViNWF6MHVpZ2RxVwNzcGNCCmaVoxaZZtt1UXBSGDIzZGNzMDU2QGNoYXJ1c2F0LmVkdS5pblgEAAAD4Q~~ )  Unlock the power of generative AI to propel your career to new heights with 150+ AI-focused courses, hands-on projects, and certificate programs.  View programs  ( https://link.coursera.org/f/a/Ptn1MnLgYwLr3-4BdJ7DCw~~/AAQRxQA~/RgRoe5ujP0Q_aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY291cnNlcmEub3JnL2V4cGxvcmUvZ2VuZXJhdGl2ZS1haT9saWQ9OWhyaXZycWwydm5mVwNzcGNCCmaVoxaZZtt1UXBSGDIzZGNzMDU2QGNoYXJ1c2F0LmVkdS5pblgEAAAD4Q~~ ) Generative AI with Large Language Models  ( https://link.coursera.org/f/a/m_7iJNb2R3Wv_CCzDrfvnw~~/AAQRxQA~/RgRoe5ujP0RHaHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY291cnNlcmEub3JnL2xlYXJuL2dlbmVyYXRpdmUtYWktd2l0aC1sbG1zP2xpZD0xYXR1c2p4c3MxeGdXA3NwY0IKZpWjFplm23VRcFIYMjNkY3MwNTZAY2hhcnVzYXQuZWR1LmluWAQAAAPh )   Learn the fundamentals ----------------------  Discover how to train and deploy LLMs in Generative AI with Large Language Models from AWS and DeepLearning.AI.  1. Understand how generative AI works. 2. Learn from expert AWS AI practitioners. 3. Dive into the latest research on GenAI.  Learn more →  ( https://link.coursera.org/f/a/8VUHLPmCXlsgPP8pD5QkoQ~~/AAQRxQA~/RgRoe5ujP0RHaHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY291cnNlcmEub3JnL2xlYXJuL2dlbmVyYXRpdmUtYWktd2l0aC1sbG1zP2xpZD1ta29jazVmbms1NzBXA3NwY0IKZpWjFplm23VRcFIYMjNkY3MwNTZAY2hhcnVzYXQuZWR1LmluWAQAAAPh )   Prompt Engineering  ( https://link.coursera.org/f/a/RUH6QlWa6Bxa7iCFzevUdw~~/AAQRxQA~/RgRoe5ujP0RMaHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY291cnNlcmEub3JnL3NwZWNpYWxpemF0aW9ucy9wcm9tcHQtZW5naW5lZXJpbmc_bGlkPTZuYnNnNTBudGNoeVcDc3BjQgpmlaMWmWbbdVFwUhgyM2RjczA1NkBjaGFydXNhdC5lZHUuaW5YBAAAA-E~ )   Become a prompt engineering expert ----------------------------------  Master prompt engineering patterns and techniques to effectively leverage generative AI in the Prompt Engineering Specialization from Vanderbilt University.  1. Learn how to automate tasks and increase productivity. 2. Gain skills to apply GenAI in your work and daily life. 3. Leverage LLMs for a wide range of intelligent applications.  Learn more →  ( https://link.coursera.org/f/a/rAEEcIgUYDsvYcXJ6XCohA~~/AAQRxQA~/RgRoe5ujP0RMaHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY291cnNlcmEub3JnL3NwZWNpYWxpemF0aW9ucy9wcm9tcHQtZW5naW5lZXJpbmc_bGlkPWUyMDhhcXlzY3UwMVcDc3BjQgpmlaMWmWbbdVFwUhgyM2RjczA1NkBjaGFydXNhdC5lZHUuaW5YBAAAA-E~ )   GenAI Fundamentals  ( https://link.coursera.org/f/a/HuNkZM2HJgXjVcJQn6iwdg~~/AAQRxQA~/RgRoe5ujP0RUaHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY291cnNlcmEub3JnL3NwZWNpYWxpemF0aW9ucy9nZW5lcmF0aXZlLWFpLWZvci1ldmVyeW9uZT9saWQ9ZTVqNXB4MXR5bjJsVwNzcGNCCmaVoxaZZtt1UXBSGDIzZGNzMDU2QGNoYXJ1c2F0LmVkdS5pblgEAAAD4Q~~ )   Revolutionize your life with GenAI ----------------------------------  Understand the fundamental concepts, models, tools, and applications of generative AI and apply them to your daily life in the Generative AI Fundamentals Specialization from IBM.  1. Discover powerful prompt engineering techniques. 2. Learn about the building blocks of generative AI. 3. Gain tips from experts on how to be successful with GenAI.  Learn more →  ( https://link.coursera.org/f/a/ipz0ieJ4ujkKwVhxmaq8BA~~/AAQRxQA~/RgRoe5ujP0RUaHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY291cnNlcmEub3JnL3NwZWNpYWxpemF0aW9ucy9nZW5lcmF0aXZlLWFpLWZvci1ldmVyeW9uZT9saWQ9cm5oOGc4ZGR2MDhyVwNzcGNCCmaVoxaZZtt1UXBSGDIzZGNzMDU2QGNoYXJ1c2F0LmVkdS5pblgEAAAD4Q~~ )   Hi, I'm Coach!  ( https://link.coursera.org/f/a/-Pibq-KpifeYOqFdquxUaQ~~/AAQRxQA~/RgRoe5ujP0Q2aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY291cnNlcmEub3JnL2NvdXJzZXJhcGx1cz9saWQ9ejA1a2ZscXc2YTA0VwNzcGNCCmaVoxaZZtt1UXBSGDIzZGNzMDU2QGNoYXJ1c2F0LmVkdS5pblgEAAAD4Q~~ )  ******************************************************* AI-powered guidance to enhance your learning experience *******************************************************  Did you know that with a Coursera Plus subscription you’ll get access to Coursera Coach within your courses?*  Coach provides on-demand assistance and tailored feedback as you learn, so you can get clear explanations that point you in the right direction.*  Start my free trial →  ( https://link.coursera.org/f/a/QkRMNQGS4zrtnZwXd5WmUA~~/AAQRxQA~/RgRoe5ujP0Q2aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY291cnNlcmEub3JnL2NvdXJzZXJhcGx1cz9saWQ9cnV5eDQwODczbGJ3VwNzcGNCCmaVoxaZZtt1UXBSGDIzZGNzMDU2QGNoYXJ1c2F0LmVkdS5pblgEAAAD4Q~~ )  *Exclusions may apply. subject: Fwd: Invitation for Bharat Blockchain Yatra event at CHARUSAT  University Changa
content: *Thanks and Regards,* *RADHIKA H. PATEL* *Assistant Professor* *Department of Information Technology* *DEPSTAR,* *CHARUSAT, Changa*        ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Vidisha Pradhan Date: Tue, Feb 20, 2024 at 1:31 PM Subject: Invitation for Bharat Blockchain Yatra event at CHARUSAT University Changa To: DEPSTAR , CSPIT , Principal DEPSTAR , Principal C.S.Patel Institute of Technology , HOD Depstar < hodds@charusat.ac.in>, Head CE CHARUSAT , Head CSE < hod.cse@charusat.ac.in>, Head IT CHARUSAT , Principal CMPICA CHARUSAT , HOD AIML < hod.aiml@charusat.ac.in>, Head EC CHARUSAT Cc: Amit Thakkar , Bela Shah < belashah.cse@charusat.ac.in>   Dear Sir,  I hope this email finds you well. We are excited to announce the upcoming **"Bharat Blockchain Yatra"** event, which will take place at **Charusat University, Changa, Gujarat** on ***29th February 2024**.*  *We believe that this event will provide a unique learning and networking opportunity for students interested in Blockchain. *  [image: BBY.PNG]  *Event Activities:*  - Hands-on Workshop - Bootcamp Sessions - Panel Discussions - Expert Talks - Product Showcasing  *Registration Link*: Register Here Thank you for your cooperation, and we look forward to welcoming you and your students to the **Bharat Blockchain Yatra**!  *We kindly request your support in spreading the word among your students and encouraging their participation.*  *If you have any questions or need further details, do not hesitate to reach out to us.*  --  Best Regards, *Vidisha Pradhan* Assistant Professor Department of Computer Science & Engineering, Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology (CSPIT), Charotar University of Science And Technology (CHARUSAT)  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon  this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient  is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, or the  employee, or agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended  recipient and/or if you have received this in error, please contact the  sender and delete the material from the computer or device. CHARUSAT does  not take any liability or responsibility for any malicious codes/software  and/or viruses/Trojan horses that may have been picked up during the  transmission of this message. By opening and solely relying on the contents  or part thereof this message, and taking action thereof, the recipient  relieves the CHARUSAT of all the liabilities including any damages done to  the recipient's pc/laptop/peripherals and other communication devices due  to any reason. Thanks and Regards, RADHIKA H. PATEL Assistant Professor Department of Information Technology DEPSTAR, CHARUSAT, Changa ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Vidisha Pradhan < vidishapradhan.cse@charusat.ac.in > Date: Tue, Feb 20, 2024 at 1:31 PM Subject: Invitation for Bharat Blockchain Yatra event at CHARUSAT University Changa To: DEPSTAR < depstar@charusat.ac.in >, CSPIT < cspit@charusat.ac.in >, Principal DEPSTAR < principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in >, Principal C.S.Patel Institute of Technology < principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in >, HOD Depstar < hodds@charusat.ac.in >, Head CE CHARUSAT < hod.ce@charusat.ac.in >, Head CSE < hod.cse@charusat.ac.in >, Head IT CHARUSAT < hod.it@charusat.ac.in >, Principal CMPICA CHARUSAT < principal.cmpica@charusat.ac.in >, HOD AIML < hod.aiml@charusat.ac.in >, Head EC CHARUSAT < hod.ec@charusat.ac.in > Cc: Amit Thakkar < amitthakkar.it@charusat.ac.in >, Bela Shah < belashah.cse@charusat.ac.in > Dear Sir, I hope this email finds you well. We are excited to announce the upcoming **"Bharat Blockchain Yatra"** event, which will take place at **Charusat University, Changa, Gujarat** on * *29th February 2024**. We believe that this event will provide a unique learning and networking opportunity for students interested in Blockchain. Event Activities : - Hands-on Workshop - Bootcamp Sessions - Panel Discussions - Expert Talks - Product Showcasing Registration Link : Register Here Thank you for your cooperation, and we look forward to welcoming you and your students to the **Bharat Blockchain Yatra**! We kindly request your support in spreading the word among your students and encouraging their participation. If you have any questions or need further details, do not hesitate to reach out to us. -- Best Regards, Vidisha Pradhan Assistant Professor Department of Computer Science & Engineering, Chandubhai S. subject: MUN- Model Youth Parliament @ CHARUSAT
content: Google Forms   Thanks for filling out MUN- Model Youth Parliament @ CHARUSAT Here's what was received.  View score   MUN- Model Youth Parliament @ CHARUSAT  Dear Students, You may register yourselves here to participate in MUN-   Model Youth Parliament as a part of YUVAMANTHAN Experiential Learning   Events. Yuvamanthan focuses on experiential learning, creating a practical   and risk-free environment for youth through interactive sessions and   simulated situations.    Youth Parliament will be organised parallel at two different venues where   both International and National Issues will be discussed by the   participants.    The participants will represent Various Countries in International Forum   while National Issues will be discussed by model parliamentarians   representing different issues related to the theme. Consensus on the   resolutions will be decided by Voting at the end of the discussion   monitored by the Jury members. All the Participants will be provided with   Certificates of Participation.   The details of the program are as following:  Date: July 30, 2024, Tuesday  Time: 2:00 pm to 4:30 pm  Venue: CHARUSAT Campus   Your email (23dcs056@charusat.edu.in) was recorded when you submitted this   form.   Name *   Vansh Malani   Student ID Number *   23dcs056   Contact Number ( preferably Whatsapp) *   9426067191   Semester *   1   2   3   4   5   6   7   8   PG 1   PG 2   PG 3   PG 4   Other:   Branch ( eg CE, IT, BBA- General, BOTAT, BSc IT etc..) *   CSE   Institute *   CSPIT   DEPSTAR   IIIM   RPCP   PDPIAS   CMPICA   ARIP   MTIN   BDIPS   Have you ever participated in Youth Parliament? *   Yes   No   Have you ever participated in Model United Nations? *   Yes   No   I want to participate in *   International Debate   National Debate   Create your own Google Form  Report Abuse Thanks for filling out MUN- Model Youth Parliament @ CHARUSAT Here's what was received. View score MUN- Model Youth Parliament @ CHARUSAT Dear Students, You may register yourselves here to participate in MUN- Model Youth Parliament as a part of YUVAMANTHAN Experiential Learning Events. Yuvamanthan focuses on experiential learning, creating a practical and risk-free environment for youth through interactive sessions and simulated situations. Youth Parliament will be organised parallel at two different venues where both International and National Issues will be discussed by the participants. The participants will represent Various Countries in International Forum while National Issues will be discussed by model parliamentarians representing different issues related to the theme. Consensus on the resolutions will be decided by Voting at the end of the discussion monitored by the Jury members. All the Participants will be provided with Certificates of Participation. The details of the program are as following: Date: July 30, 2024, Tuesday Time: 2:00 pm to 4:30 pm Venue: CHARUSAT Campus Your email ( 23dcs056@charusat.edu.in ) was recorded when you submitted this form. subject: Fwd: CIVF Demo Day Invitation (for circulation to our  students/faculties and outside colleges also)
content: Dear Students,  Kindly register and take the opportunity to attend the fantastic event to be hosted by CHARUSAT Innovative Ventures Foundation (CIVF). Spread a word regarding the same to your surroundings as well.    ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Dr. Swati Joshi Date: Thu, 21 Mar 2024, 13:22 Subject: Fwd: CIVF Demo Day Invitation (for circulation to our students/faculties and outside colleges also) To: ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [image: WhatsApp Image 2024-03-20 at 11.16.36 PM.jpeg]  Dear Participant, We are thrilled to invite you to CIVF Demo Day, an event designed to provide startups and students like you with a comprehensive understanding of the dynamic startup ecosystem and the exciting investment opportunities it presents. Demo Day serves as a platform for aspiring entrepreneurs, students, and investors to come together, exchange ideas, and explore the innovative projects shaping tomorrow's world. Whether you're a budding entrepreneur looking to kickstart your own venture or a student eager to learn about the intricacies of the startup landscape, this event is tailored to offer valuable insights and networking opportunities.  Event Details are as under: *Date:* 28th March, 2024 *Time: *1:00 PM-2:00 PM *Location: *IIIM Auditorium, Charusat campus, Changa *Register Here: *https://forms.gle/mmEaoNoWERV2rTaWA (Deadline: 25th March, 2024 till 4:00 PM) (Registration is *free* BUT it's *mandatory*)  Event Schedule: 12:30-1:00 PM: Registrations 1:00-1:15 PM: Graduation Ceremony 1:15-1:50 PM: Investors' Address 1:50-2:00 PM: Vote of Thanks 2:00 PM: Refreshment  Whether you're a seasoned entrepreneur or a curious student with a passion for innovation, Demo Day promises to be an enriching experience that will inspire and empower you to take your ideas to the next level.  We look forward to welcoming you to Demo Day and embarking on this exciting journey together. *Regards,* *Dr. Swati Joshi, * *Senior Executive Officer (SEO), * *CHARUSAT Innovative Ventures Foundation (CIVF), * *Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT) * *CHANGA - 388 421 * *GUJARAT - INDIA *  *Contact no.: +91 - 8460325900/7383491911* *E-mail: seo@civf.co.in *  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). subject: Feedback on Your ARTHYANTRA recruitment participation
content: Dear Participant,  I hope this message finds you well. We want to take a moment to thank you for your interest in joining the core team of Arthyantra CHARUSAT and for participating in the selection process. Your enthusiasm and dedication to contributing to our organization were evident throughout the process.  After careful consideration, we regret to inform you that you have not been selected for the core team at this time. Please know that this decision was not easy, as we received many qualified applicants.  Your strengths and contributions during the selection process were particularly impressive. We encourage you to continue being actively involved in Arthyantra CHARUSAT and to explore other ways to contribute and grow with us.  We understand that this news may be disappointing, but we want to assure you that your efforts and dedication have not gone unnoticed. We truly appreciate your interest and hope that you will continue to be a valuable part of our community.  Thank you once again for your interest in Arthyantra CHARUSAT. We appreciate your efforts and hope to see you continue to be a part of our journey.  Warm regards,  ARTHYANTRA CHARUSAT Dear Participant, I hope this message finds you well. We want to take a moment to thank you for your interest in joining the core team of Arthyantra CHARUSAT and for participating in the selection process. Your enthusiasm and dedication to contributing to our organization were evident throughout the process. After careful consideration, we regret to inform you that you have not been selected for the core team at this time. Please know that this decision was not easy, as we received many qualified applicants. Your strengths and contributions during the selection process were particularly impressive. We encourage you to continue being actively involved in Arthyantra CHARUSAT and to explore other ways to contribute and grow with us. We understand that this news may be disappointing, but we want to assure you that your efforts and dedication have not gone unnoticed. We truly appreciate your interest and hope that you will continue to be a valuable part of our community. Thank you once again for your interest in Arthyantra CHARUSAT. We appreciate your efforts and hope to see you continue to be a part of our journey. Warm regards, ARTHYANTRA CHARUSAT

subject: Utilization of Classroom Space After College Hours
content: Dear Students,  Considering the passion for learning, as per the directives received from Principal sir, it is decided that *the students can utilize classroom number 125 (Ground Floor | A5 Building) after college hours from 4:30 PM - 7:00 PM.*  It will be applicable from 8th April 2024 (Monday) till further notification.   *Additionally, please go through the following procedures:*     1. The interested students need to submit a duly filled and signed copy    (original copy) to the batch counselor.    2. The batch counselor will submit a photocopy of the same to the    watchman for his record.    3. All the original copies will be submitted (every week) by the batch    counselor to Prof. Rajesh Patel | He will maintain the record of all the    received applications.    4. Students utilizing the classroom will be under surveillance to ensure    a safe and conducive environment for study and work.    5. It's crucial to emphasize that any misbehavior will not be tolerated.    If any inappropriate conduct is observed, it should be immediately stopped,    and necessary actions will be taken in accordance with university policies.  Please find the attached document. The original copy should be submitted to the batch counselor by the student and a photocopy should be carried by students on a daily basis (subject to utilization of the mentioned classroom).  Thank you.   --  Thanks & Regards, Aishwariya Budhrani Assistant Professor, Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR), Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). It will be applicable from 8th April 2024 (Monday) till further notification. Additionally, please go through the following procedures: The interested students need to submit a duly filled and signed copy (original copy) to the batch counselor. subject: SYNAPSE 2024: THE TECHNO-CULTURAL BONANZA!
content: [image: Image]  *SYNAPSE 2024: THE TECHNO-CULTURAL BONANZA!*    Witness a technological marvel like no other as Dhirubhai Ambani Institute of Information and Communication Technology *(DAIICT)* is all set to become a stage for flourishing technical activities and fostering innovation.    Mark your dates for 22nd February to 25th February as the *SYNAPSE 2024* is all poised to deliver four days full of excitement with a multitude of impeccable learnings and forging of invaluable connections and memories.    As a result of the collaboration with *ABHIYANTA CHARUSAT*, all the students of CHARUSAT have the chance to register for the Technical events at absolutely *Zero Cost.*    Be part of the tech marvel for *Free *by registering at: https://forms.gle/d7wHyynQb6S4z73z9  *ABHIYANTA CHARUSAT* is thankful to the members of the organizing team of *SYNAPSE 2024*, for this fruitful partnership.   Cheers to technology and innovation!    For any queries, contact: Aashray Parikh - 7016927295 Divy Jani - 9714268214    Regards, *Team ABHIYANTA CHARUSAT* Get in Touch [image: LinkedIn] [image: Email] [image: __tpx__] SYNAPSE 2024 : THE TECHNO-CULTURAL BONANZA ! subject: Fwd: AICTE Approved IPR Certification
content: Dear Students,  Go through the trailing mail.  Interested may register for the course.   ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Yukta Gupta Date: Wed, Mar 20, 2024 at 8:38 AM Subject: AICTE Approved IPR Certification To: Sir/Madam  Dear Sir/Madam,  Turnip's *2-Week Patent Course* is now approved by AICTE! It can be conducted as a MOOC certification or skill development activity at par with NPTEL/Swayam.  Currently, institutes can avail it at a reduced fee ₹199/- only (incl. professional certificate). Check out the *course brochure* *Click Here to Start the Course* * Benefits *  ✅  Suitable for all students and faculty ✅  15 day self-paced learning journey created by Dr. Rahul Kapoor ✅  30-Hour *AICTE Evaluated Certificate* ✅  Complex patent phenomena described in simple language ✅  Self assessed quiz ✅  Course starts immediately after registration and email verification  * Please forward the course link to all students and faculty. *  *P.S.* Course is part of the AICTE NEAT Portal and offered as per MoU between Turnip Innovations and AICTE. It is India's most popular IPR certificate course! Institutes having 50+ candidates trained via this course will receive a hardcopy certificate of appreciation from Turnip.  Thanks and regards,  Yukta Gupta | Marketing Manager turnip.co.in ------------------------------  To opt-out from all Turnip communication, unsubscribe --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). subject: Seminar on "Project Selection: For the upliftment of your career"
content: Dear Students,  Thank you for registering for the seminar on "Project Selection: For the Upliftment of Your Career" on July 6th, 2024. In this seminar, we will discuss how to choose projects that align with your career goals, whether they are placements, further studies, or entrepreneurship. We will explore futuristic technologies and provide probable definitions for various projects.  Below are some references for you to review.  1.      Digital Twin for Manufacturing Optimization  2.      IoT-based Environmental Monitoring System  3.      AR for Enhanced Product Visualization  4.      VR-based Immersive Learning Platform  5.      AI-driven Predictive Maintenance System  6.      Blockchain for Supply Chain Transparency  7.      5G-enabled Smart City Infrastructure  8.      Cybersecurity Threat Detection Using AI  9.      Autonomous Drone Delivery System  10.   Natural Language Processing for Customer Service Automation  11.   Smart Home Automation Using IoT  12.   Chatbot for Customer Service Using NLP  13.   Real-Time Traffic Prediction Using Machine Learning  14.   Fraud Detection System Using AI  15.   Personalized Healthcare Recommendations Using Data Science  16.   Energy Consumption Optimization Using Smart Grids  17.   Image Recognition System for Autonomous Vehicles  18.   Blockchain-Based Secure Voting System  19.   Voice Assistant for Home Automation  20.   Sentiment Analysis for Social Media  21.   Predictive Maintenance for Industrial Equipment Using IoT  22.   Smart Irrigation System Using IoT  23.   Personal Finance Management App Using AI  24.   Human Activity Recognition Using Wearable Sensors  25.   Air Quality Monitoring and Prediction Using IoT  26.   Smart Parking System Using IoT  27.   Customer Churn Prediction Using Machine Learning  28.   Health Monitoring System Using Wearable Devices  29.   Emotion Detection Using Facial Recognition  30.   Smart Waste Management System Using IoT  31.   Automated Essay Scoring System Using NLP  32.   Supply Chain Optimization Using Blockchain  33.   Intelligent Tutoring System Using AI  34.   Smart City Management Using IoT and Big Data  35.   Predictive Analytics for Healthcare Using Machine Learning  36.   Fraud Detection in Financial Transactions Using AI  37.   Autonomous Drone Navigation Using Computer Vision  38.   Personalized Recommendation System Using Collaborative Filtering  39.   Real-Time Traffic Management System Using IoT  40.   Disease Outbreak Prediction Using Big Data Analytics  41.   Natural Disaster Prediction and Management Using IoT  42.   Smart Agriculture Using IoT and AI  43.   Personalized Learning Platform Using AI  44.   Virtual Reality Therapy for Mental Health  45.   AI-Powered Chatbot for Customer Support  46.   Smart Grid Security Using Blockchain  47.   Automated Content Generation Using AI  48.   AI-Driven Predictive Analytics for Retail  49.   Smart Wearable Health Monitoring Devices  50.   Automated Legal Document Analysis Using NLP  51.   Intelligent Traffic Signal Control Using AI  52.   Personalized Marketing Campaigns Using AI  Thank you, and we look forward to seeing you at the seminar tomorrow.  Location: 123, A5 Building, DEPSTAR Time: 3:00 PM onwards   --   *Hardik S. Jayswal*  (*M) : +91-9825961830*  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT).
