subject: Fwd: Training to build AI (Artificial intelligence) apps and websites  for Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research students
content: Students learn to build hands-on AI projects. Earn a certificate and an internship upon completion.  Dear Professor Dr.Amit Ganatra,    Earlier this month, we sent the link to our AI lesson plan generator to you. We thank professors like you for your feedback and appreciation. In case you have not received access to it then please let me know.    Many professors also expressed their interest in having their students enrolled in a training that teaches them to build such AI apps and websites.    It is becoming increasingly important to learn how to build AI apps and websites in order to keep pace with technology and innovation. The demand for engineers with AI development skills is growing rapidly, and is expected to be a major factor in providing better job opportunities for students. Companies are now actively looking to hire engineers with skills in AI.    Considering this, we are sharing the details of scholarship on our AI training. Please share this opportunity with your students.    We request you to forward the email to the students or Click here to share over WhatsApp. What is the Artificial Intelligence (AI) scholarship and internship program?     - As part of this program, the qualifying students of Devang Patel    Institute of Advance Technology and Research can *join the Artificial    Intelligence (AI) online video training at an 80% discount.* While the    regular fee of the training is Rs.8,600/-, the qualifying students can get    it at just Rs.1,750/-.     - Students have to visit https://info.boltiot.com/aischolarship to answer the scholarship test.   What are some of the activities that students will perform as part of this AI training?     - Learn concepts of Artificial Intelligence (AI) from the basics. No    previous knowledge is required.    - Learn programming languages like Python, HTML and Javascript required    to build these AI Apps and Websites.    - During the training, we will be available to solve any doubts or    queries.    - Students will build 6 different hands-on projects, such as Their own    ChatGPT, AI Recipe generator, AI Software coding helper, AI Image Generator    and many more...    - They will also build innovative Artificial Intelligence (AI) projects    by applying the learnings of the training in their field.   Why should the students avail this scholarship?     - Learn from basics.    - *Certificate:* upon completion of the training, which can be submitted    as part of university rules as well as during the job application process.    - *Work on industrial projects: *The students will work on the most    popular AI Platform by Open AI. The same platform is the base for ChatGPT    and is used by thousands of MNCs across the globe.    - *Guaranteed internship upon training **completion: *This internship    certificate can be submitted to the college if the university rules require    them to do so.   Other critical points:     - *The option of full refund:* In case the students are not happy with    the training offered to them, then they can get a full refund as per the    refund policy. This ensures that there is no risk for students or the    faculty involved in the process.     - *Lifetime access:* Students can register now and start the training    after the exams or at any other time. They can also take a break in between.     - Link to answer the scholarship quiz:    https://info.boltiot.com/aischolarship The last date to avail the scholarship is Tuesday, 26th of March 2024.    My team and I are excited to teach Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research students about Artificial Intelligence (AI). If you have any questions, please reply to this email or call us at (+91)8881197198 and press 4 to speak with us. I'm happy to provide any further information you need.    Regards, Rohit TS Software Developer - Bolt IoT  Bolt IoT (Inventrom Private Limited), 79, 11th Cross Rd, Binnamangala, Indiranagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560038, India, (+91)8881197198  Unsubscribe Manage preferences --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon  this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient  is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, or the  employee, or agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended  recipient and/or if you have received this in error, please contact the  sender and delete the material from the computer or device. CHARUSAT does  not take any liability or responsibility for any malicious codes/software  and/or viruses/Trojan horses that may have been picked up during the  transmission of this message. By opening and solely relying on the contents  or part thereof this message, and taking action thereof, the recipient  relieves the CHARUSAT of all the liabilities including any damages done to  the recipient's pc/laptop/peripherals and other communication devices due  to any reason. subject: Fwd: Invitation for Participation in MUN - Model United Nations -  Youth Parliament to be organized at CHARUSAT
content: Interested student(s) may register .   *Thanks and Regards,* *RADHIKA H. PATEL* *Assistant Professor* *Department of Information Technology* *DEPSTAR,* *CHARUSAT, Changa*        ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Registrar CHARUSAT Date: Mon, Jul 15, 2024 at 3:52 PM Subject: Invitation for Participation in MUN - Model United Nations - Youth Parliament to be organized at CHARUSAT To: Charusat Family Dear All,    We are happy to announce that CHARUSAT is organising *Model Youth Parliament (MUN)* on the theme - *Lifestyle for Environment*. The event is organised as a part of *YUVAMANTHAN* *Experiential Learning Events* guided by *UGC*.    The MUN is organised with a view to provide the youth opportunities to solve India’s critical challenges through a series of meetings where they role play Indian and International Policy Makers and engage in consensus building, International Relation and Diplomacy.    *Youth Parliament* under the MUN aims at teaching the youth democracy, equipping them with debating skills, stimulating them to present their own thoughts and listening to those of others, how to follow through, advocate for an idea, and make it a reality. It will be organised parallel at *TWO* different venues where both *International and National Issues* will be discussed by the participants.    The details of the same are as following:    Date: *July 30, 2024, Tuesday*  Time: *2:00 pm to 4:30 pm*  Venue: *CHARUSAT Campus*    The participants will represent various Countries in the International Forum while National Issues will be discussed by model parliamentarians representing different issues related to the theme. Consensus on the resolutions will be decided by Voting at the end of the discussion monitored by the Jury members.  All the Participants will be provided with Certificates of Participation.    You are requested to share this with all the students of your respective Institutes. Interested Faculty members may also participate in the event.    They may register themselves for the MUN through the following link: https://forms.gle/RhHLKVnawGJEbYR38    For any suggestion or query you may contact Dr. Robert Parmar, Asst. Professor on: +91 99254 66788.    Thanking you in anticipation of your participation,    With regards,   Dr. Atul Patel  Registrar   Accredited Grade “A+” by NAAC  www.charusat.ac.in  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon  this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient  is strictly prohibited. this email finds you well. As fellow educators passionate about fostering innovation and excellence in our students, we are excited to extend an invitation to you and your students to participate in Innocodeathon, an exhilarating 24 hour hackathon  hosted by our institution.  *About Innocodeathon*: InnoCodeathon is an annual 24-hour hackathon organized by the Department of Computer Science and Engineering,ITS Engineering College, Greater Noida It aimed at offering a technical competence for creative minds to identify momentous challenges and provides solutions for real life scenarios.  *Event Details*:  Date: 26 April 2024 Time: 9:30 am (24 hour hackathon) Venue: ITS engineering college campus Registration Link: https://unstop.com/hackathons/innocodeathon-its-engineering-college-itsec-greater-noida-906923   We encourage you to share this invitation with your students and encourage their participation. Together, let's inspire the next generation of coding enthusiasts and cultivate a culture of innovation within our academic community.  *Round 1 (Screening Round): Free Entry*  *Round 2 (Prototype Round*): ₹500/- per participant  OR ₹2000/- per team whichever amount is minimum   *Round 3 (Working model): Winning Round*  *Prizes and Rewards*  *First Prize* ₹ 51,000/  *Second Prize* ₹ 31,000/  *Third Prize* ₹ 21,000/  *Many more consolation prizes and goodies  *Hybrid Mode*: Physical presence of NCR and Delhi region teams is mandatory.  Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out to Mr. Manik Chandra Pandey (Assistant Professor CSE) at 88648 81199.  Thank you for your support, and we look forward to your participation in making Innocodeathon a resounding success.  --  Best Regards,  Abhishek Shivhare, Assistant Professor-Department of CSE, Mob No. 9811961919  I.T.S. Engineering College 46, Knowledge Park - III, Greater Noida. Dear Sir/Ma'am I hope this email finds you well. As fellow educators passionate about fostering innovation and excellence in our students, we are excited to extend an invitation to you and your students to participate in Innocodeathon, an exhilarating 24 hour hackathon  hosted by our institution. About Innocodeathon : InnoCodeathon is an annual 24-hour hackathon organized by the Department of Computer Science and Engineering,ITS Engineering College, Greater Noida It aimed at offering a technical competence for creative minds to identify momentous challenges and provides solutions for real life scenarios. Event Details : Date: 26 April 2024 Time: 9:30 am (24 hour hackathon) Venue: ITS engineering college campus Registration Link: https://unstop.com/hackathons/innocodeathon-its-engineering-college-itsec-greater-noida-906923 We encourage you to share this invitation with your students and encourage their participation. Together, let's inspire the next generation of coding enthusiasts and cultivate a culture of innovation within our academic community. Round 1 (Screening Round): Free Entry Round 2 (Prototype Round ): ₹500/- per participant  OR ₹2000/- per team whichever amount is minimum Round 3 (Working model): Winning Round Prizes and Rewards First Prize ₹ 51,000/ Second Prize ₹ 31,000/ Third Prize ₹ 21,000/ *Many more consolation prizes and goodies Hybrid Mode : Physical presence of NCR and Delhi region teams is mandatory. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out to Mr. Manik Chandra Pandey (Assistant Professor CSE) at 88648 81199. Thank you for your support, and we look forward to your participation in making Innocodeathon a resounding success. -- Best Regards, Abhishek Shivhare, Assistant Professor-Department of CSE, Mob No. 9811961919 I.T.S. Engineering College 46, Knowledge Park - III, Greater Noida. Pin Code - 201308 (Uttar Pradesh) Connect with us:- ITS   Engineering College 46, Knowledge park-III,   Greater Noida- 201310 Ph: 0120- 2331000, 2331001 Connect with us:- "Please consider the environment before printing your emails" The information transmitted in electronic mail messages sent from the https://www.its.edu.in/ domain, or referencing this disclaimer, and any documents attached, is intended only for the person, persons, entity, or entities to which it is addressed. subject: Souvenir Store - SPOURAL '24
content: Dear Students, Greetings of the day! As we all know, the students of CHARUSAT Executive Central Council have started a new initiative of the *SPOURAL Souvenir Store* near CHARUSAT Central Lawn. The store has various *exciting offers on franchise/souvenir items for sale.* *The list of the items and other details are attached in the form of the pdf file below. * I request all our students to visit the store in your free time. Hope you all will enjoy the visit to the souvenir store. Incase of any queries regarding souvenir store contact: Dr. Yogesh Jani +91 9558295583 / Mr. Dweep Patel +91 9737730290. Best of Luck for ongoing SPOURAL '24. *--* Convener Executive Central Council Charotar University of Science and Technology Changa, Gujarat - Bharat. Dear Students, Greetings of the day! As we all know, the students of CHARUSAT Executive Central Council have started a new initiative of the SPOURAL Souvenir Store near CHARUSAT Central Lawn. The store has various exciting offers on franchise/souvenir items for sale. The list of the items and other details are attached in the form of the pdf file below. I request all our students to visit the store in your free time. Hope you all will enjoy the visit to the souvenir store. Incase of any queries regarding souvenir store contact: Dr. Yogesh Jani +91 9558295583 / Mr. Dweep Patel +91 9737730290. Best of Luck for ongoing SPOURAL '24. -- Convener Executive Central Council Charotar University of Science and Technology Changa, Gujarat - Bharat. subject: Fwd: Patent Agent and Trade Marks Agent Exam, 2025 -Regarding
content: Having trouble reading this email? View it in your mobile/ web browser ------------------------------ Dear students,  Greetings from All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) !!  We are pleased to inform you that the number of patent applications filed has risen by 11.3%, from 82,811 in 2022-23 to 92,168 in 2023-24, thanks to the strong backing and involvement of academics. Notably, there has been a substantial increase in patent applications from Educational Institutes, soaring from 7,405 in 2021-22 to 23,306 in 2023-24. This remarkable 214% surge could be attributed to the unwavering support of AICTE.  We are delighted to announce notification for the Patent/Trade Marks Agent Examination on 03/07/2024 and interested candidates from the academic institutions who are eligible can apply for the Patent Agent Examination 2025 and the Trade Marks Agent Exam 2025 through online mode by  *08/08/2024 (05.30 PM). *  The academician and technocrats can contribute in nation building fulfilling the role of Patent Agent and Trade Marks Agent.  *With regards* *(e-Governance)* *All India Council for Technical Education* *Nelson Mandela road, Vasantkunj, New Delhi-110070 * Share it on Social Media [image: social icon] [image: social icon] [image: social icon] Forward it to a Friend This message was sent to principal.depstar[at]charusat[dot]ac[dot]in from AICTE through no-reply[at]sampark[dot]gov[dot]in ------------------------------ If you would prefer not to receive these emails please click unsubscribe --  You received this message because you are subscribed to the Google Groups "Depstar_CSE" group. To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to depstar_cse+unsubscribe@charusat.ac.in. To view this discussion on the web visit https://groups.google.com/a/charusat.ac.in/d/msgid/depstar_cse/CALCYB4vcOMcFE%2B5GR5aB%3DGvATKKwFifiS3n3sx%2B3jcT6nkcm2g%40mail.gmail.com .  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon  this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient  is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, or the  employee, or agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended  recipient and/or if you have received this in error, please contact the  sender and delete the material from the computer or device. CHARUSAT does  not take any liability or responsibility for any malicious codes/software  and/or viruses/Trojan horses that may have been picked up during the  transmission of this message. By opening and solely relying on the contents  or part thereof this message, and taking action thereof, the recipient  relieves the CHARUSAT of all the liabilities including any damages done to  the recipient's pc/laptop/peripherals and other communication devices due  to any reason. subject: MA144 (Section 1) online lecture link
content: Dear students,  The online lecture for MA144 (Engineering Mathematics II) is scheduled on 13.04.24, Saturday *from 09.00 am to 10.30 am *for the second semester students of IT and CSE branches. We will be discussing the topics of the Cauchy-Euler linear differential equation and Simultaneous differential equation from *Unit 2*. Kindly join the lecture using the following link without fail.  https://teams.microsoft.com/l/meetup-join/19%3ameeting_ZTk0ODMyNGItZjE0Mi00ODc3LTk5MWEtNjFkYTc1NzIwMzZh%40thread.v2/0?context=%7b%22Tid%22%3a%228dbd2884-120c-413b-80b2-1117dd3469a4%22%2c%22Oid%22%3a%223ed35552-5e3c-4b13-916a-3622e7a12052%22%7d  If necessary, kindly download the Microsoft teams to join the lecture. Please ensure to use your student id number as your name when joining.  Thank you.  --  * Dr. Rajendrakumar B. Chauhan*  * M.Sc., M.Phil., Ph.D. (Mathematics)*   * Assistant Professor Department of Mathematical Sciences, P. D. Patel Institute of Applied Sciences,*  * Charotar University of Science & Technology, Changa, Gujarat, India.*  *E-mail: rajendrachauhan.maths@charusat.ac.in *  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). 2024 at 2:31 PM  Subject: Fwd: ગુજરાત જ્ઞાન ગુરુ ક્વિઝ(G3Q 2.0) અંતર્ગતના વિજેતાઓના  વેરીફીકેશન બાબત  To: Depstar Do needful in case applicable.    ---------- Forwarded message ---------  From: Date: Thu, Mar 7, 2024 at 2:18 PM  Subject: ગુજરાત જ્ઞાન ગુરુ ક્વિઝ(G3Q 2.0) અંતર્ગતના વિજેતાઓના વેરીફીકેશન  બાબત  To: *પ્રતિ,1. રજીસ્ટ્રારશ્રી, તમામ યુનિવર્સીટીઓ, ગુજરાત રાજ્ય2. આચાર્યશ્રી,  તમામ કોલેજો, ગુજરાત રાજ્યશ્રીમાન,G3Q ૨.૦ નું લોન્ચિંગ પ્રમુખસ્વામી હોલ,  કાલાવડ રોડ, રાજકોટ ખાતેથી તા: ૨૪/૧૨/૨૦૨૩ના રોજ માન. મુખ્યમંત્રીશ્રીના  વરદહસ્તે કરવામા આવ્યું હતુ. ગુજરાત જ્ઞાન ગુરુ ક્વિઝ(G3Q 2.0)માં સ્પર્ધકને  ત્રણ કેટેગરીમાં વહેંચવામાં આવેલ છે. જેમાંથી School category Winners અને  College-University category Winners ને ઇનામની રકમ DBT મારફત મળવાપાત્ર છે.  આમ, G3Q 2.0ના Weekly વિજેતાઓ તથા બમ્પર ક્વિઝના વિજેતાઓને ઈનામની રકમનું  ચુકવણું કેસીજી કક્ષાએથી કરવાનું થાય છે. આમ, G3Q 2.0ના તમામ વિજેતાઓની ખરાઈ  G3Q Portal(https://g3q.co.in/ ) મારફત વિધાર્થીની સબંધિત  કોલેજ/યુનિવર્સીટી મારફત થાય તથા વિજેતા વિધાર્થી દ્વારા પોતાની બેંકની માહિતી  G3Q Portal ઉપર અપલોડ થાય તે માટેની કાર્યવાહી આપશ્રીની કક્ષાએથી કરવાની થાય  છે.G3Q 2.0 અંતર્ગતના વિજેતાઓના ઈનામની રકમ વિજેતા વિદ્યાર્થીના બેંક ખાતામાં  પ્રાપ્ત થાય તે માટે વિજેતા વિદ્યાર્થી દ્વારા આ લીંક https://quiz.g3q.co.in/ પર ક્લિક કરી વિજેતા વિદ્યાર્થીની બેંક ખાતાની  વિગતો સત્વરે ભરે તથા વિજેતા વિદ્યાર્થી આપશ્રીની કોલેજ/યુનિવર્સીટીનો છે કે  કેમ તેની અને તેના દ્વારા ભરવામાં આવેલ બેંકની વિગતોની ચકાસણી કરીને  https://quiz.g3q.co.in/ પર આપશ્રીની  કોલેજ/યુનિવર્સીટીને આપવામાં આવેલ G3Q UserID અને Passwordથી લોગ-ઇન થઈને  તા:૦૯/૦૩/૨૦૨૪ સુધીમાં અપ્રુવ કરવા જણાવવામાં આવે છે.નોંધ:-વિજેતા  વિદ્યાર્થીના વેરીફીકેશન માટે કોલેજ/યુનિવર્સીટીના G3Q UserID અને Password  Recover કરવા માટેની હેલ્પલાઇન અને Email: helpline No.: 99789 01597 or 78783  30030, Email:g3q2024@gmail.com .*   --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon  this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient  is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, or the  employee, or agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended  recipient and/or if you have received this in error, please contact the  sender and delete the material from the computer or device. CHARUSAT does  not take any liability or responsibility for any malicious codes/software  and/or viruses/Trojan horses that may have been picked up during the  transmission of this message. By opening and solely relying on the contents  or part thereof this message, and taking action thereof, the recipient  relieves the CHARUSAT of all the liabilities including any damages done to  the recipient's pc/laptop/peripherals and other communication devices due  to any reason. Thanks and Regards, RADHIKA H. PATEL Assistant Professor Department of Information Technology DEPSTAR, CHARUSAT, Changa ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR < principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in > Date: Thu, Mar 7, 2024 at 2:31 PM Subject: Fwd: ગુજરાત જ્ઞાન ગુરુ ક્વિઝ(G3Q 2.0) અંતર્ગતના વિજેતાઓના વેરીફીકેશન બાબત To: Depstar < depstar@charusat.ac.in > Do needful in case applicable. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: < info@gujgov.edu.in > Date: Thu, Mar 7, 2024 at 2:18 PM Subject: ગુજરાત જ્ઞાન ગુરુ ક્વિઝ(G3Q 2.0) અંતર્ગતના વિજેતાઓના વેરીફીકેશન બાબત To:  < principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in > પ્રતિ, 1.	રજીસ્ટ્રારશ્રી, તમામ યુનિવર્સીટીઓ, ગુજરાત રાજ્ય 2.	આચાર્યશ્રી, તમામ કોલેજો, ગુજરાત રાજ્ય શ્રીમાન, G3Q ૨.૦ નું લોન્ચિંગ પ્રમુખસ્વામી હોલ, કાલાવડ રોડ, રાજકોટ ખાતેથી તા: ૨૪/૧૨/૨૦૨૩ના રોજ માન. મુખ્યમંત્રીશ્રીના વરદહસ્તે કરવામા આવ્યું હતુ. ગુજરાત જ્ઞાન ગુરુ ક્વિઝ(G3Q 2.0)માં સ્પર્ધકને ત્રણ કેટેગરીમાં વહેંચવામાં આવેલ છે. જેમાંથી School category Winners અને College-University category Winners ને ઇનામની રકમ DBT મારફત મળવાપાત્ર છે. આમ, G3Q 2.0 ના Weekly વિજેતાઓ તથા બમ્પર ક્વિઝના વિજેતાઓને ઈનામની રકમનું ચુકવણું કેસીજી કક્ષાએથી કરવાનું થાય છે. આમ, G3Q 2.0 ના તમામ વિજેતાઓની ખરાઈ G3Q Portal( https://g3q.co.in/ ) મારફત વિધાર્થીની સબંધિત કોલેજ/યુનિવર્સીટી મારફત થાય તથા વિજેતા વિધાર્થી દ્વારા પોતાની બેંકની માહિતી G3Q Portal ઉપર અપલોડ થાય તે માટેની કાર્યવાહી આપશ્રીની કક્ષાએથી કરવાની થાય છે. G3Q 2.0 અંતર્ગતના વિજેતાઓના ઈનામની રકમ વિજેતા વિદ્યાર્થીના બેંક ખાતામાં પ્રાપ્ત થાય તે માટે વિજેતા વિદ્યાર્થી દ્વારા આ લીંક https://quiz.g3q.co.in/ પર ક્લિક કરી વિજેતા વિદ્યાર્થીની બેંક ખાતાની વિગતો સત્વરે ભરે તથા વિજેતા વિદ્યાર્થી આપશ્રીની કોલેજ/યુનિવર્સીટીનો છે કે કેમ તેની અને તેના દ્વારા ભરવામાં આવેલ બેંકની વિગતોની ચકાસણી કરીને https://quiz.g3q.co.in/ પર આપશ્રીની કોલેજ/યુનિવર્સીટીને આપવામાં આવેલ G3Q UserID અને Password થી લોગ-ઇન થઈને તા:૦૯/૦૩/૨૦૨૪ સુધીમાં અપ્રુવ કરવા જણાવવામાં આવે છે. નોંધ:- વિજેતા વિદ્યાર્થીના વેરીફીકેશન માટે કોલેજ/યુનિવર્સીટીના G3Q UserID અને Password Recover કરવા માટેની હેલ્પલાઇન અને Email: helpline No.: 99789 01597 or 78783 30030, Email:g3q2024@gmail.com . Ready...set...CODE! 💻🔥  Happy hacking,  -Devpost Team  (You can always reach us directly through our Discord server ( https://discord.com/invite/mYGykt3Dnx?utm_source=devpost&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=03102023 ) – we're happy to help in any way)     ******************* FEATURED HACKATHONS ******************* June 10, 2024 deadline 🏷️ Blockchain, ML/AI, Web  Register for the hackathon here ( https://ud-aws-hackathon.devpost.com//?utm_source=devpost&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=05302024 ) ( ( https://info.devpost.com/blog/user-story-param//?utm_source=devpost&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=blogpost )   *********************** IN OTHER HACKATHON NEWS ***********************     *************************************************************************************************************************************** Why companies are turning to internal hackathons ( https://au.news.yahoo.com/why-companies-turning-internal-hackathons-184947695.html ) ***************************************************************************************************************************************  Devpost CEO, Brandon Kessler, sat down with TechCrunch to talk about why companies are turning to internal hackathons to innovate. subject: Mandatory Attendance for Lecture/Lab Sessions
content: Dear Students,  All of you are hereby informed to attend the lecture/lab sessions regularly. *Attendance is mandatory for all the sessions* during the whole semester. subject: Fwd: EOC(Activity) - Invitation for Awareness session on Health and  wellness Program on 2nd March, 2024
content: *Thanks and Regards,* *RADHIKA H. PATEL* *Assistant Professor* *Department of Information Technology* *DEPSTAR,* *CHARUSAT, Changa*        ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Neeta Chudasama Date: Thu, Feb 29, 2024 at 4:34 PM Subject: EOC(Activity) - Invitation for Awareness session on Health and wellness Program on 2nd March, 2024 To: CSPIT , Dear Sir/Madam    We are pleased to inform you that the Department of Computer Engineering of DEPSTAR and M. S. Patel Department of Civil Engineering of CSPIT, in association with Equal Opportunity Cell (EOC), is jointly organizing an  Awareness session  on *Health and wellness Program on 2nd March, 2024.*    Health and wellness encompass holistic well-being, including physical fitness, mental resilience, and emotional balance, fostering a harmonious relationship between mind, body, and spirit for optimal vitality and quality of life. Prioritizing health and wellness involves adopting sustainable lifestyle habits such as regular exercise, balanced nutrition, adequate sleep, stress management, and self-care practices to promote longevity and overall happiness.  *Dr. Parthiv Gelani,* a seasoned expert with over 11 years of experience in Dermatology and 6 years of experience in Health and Wellness, will lead the session. The program aims to provide a comprehensive overview of how lifestyle diseases occur and how it can be cured without medicine and therefore living a happy and healthy life. Moreover, it offers a platform for one-on-one discussions, allowing participants to address personal concerns directly with the expert.  He has helped more than 15,000 people from more than 14 countries to achieve their health goals and lifestyle diseases such as diabetes, blood pressure, cholesterol, thyroid and common issues like gas, acidity, constipation, headache, etc. and helped them to live medicine-free lives. Collectively, he had taught how to solve health issues by changing food and improving lifestyle.  *Objectives of the Expert Talk:*  1.     Provide accurate and up-to-date information on various health topics, empowering individuals to make informed decisions about their well-being.  2.     Encourage the adoption of healthy habits such as regular physical activity, balanced nutrition, adequate sleep, and stress management, promoting overall well-being and reducing the risk of chronic diseases.   *Event Details:*  Date: March 2nd, 2024 Time: 2:30 PM to 3:30 PM. Venue: 229, Seminar Hall, DEPSTAR; A5 building    Registration link: https://forms.gle/w4BTdQJJEcjXv3Bx9  Certificates will be issued to all participate.    We encourage all staff members (teaching and non-teaching), students as well as all employees to participate actively in this informative session. Your valuable presence leads to success.   Faculty Coordinator:  Ms.Neeta Chudasama (DEPSTAR-CE)  Ms. Kanchan Dave(CSPIT-CL)   Kindly circulate among your students and staff.   Thanks and regards,    Ms. Neeta Chudasama  Assistant Professor  Department of Computer Engineering  Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)  Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)  Contact No.: 9428972072  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon  this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient  is strictly prohibited. subject: Complete Phase 1 of the hackathon! - Microsoft Developers AI Learning  Hackathon
content: ( http://devpost.com )  Hey everyone!  Just a quick reminder to begin and complete Part 1 ( https://aka.ms/AzureCosmosDB/CSCPart1 ) and Part 2 ( https://aka.ms/AzureCosmosDB/CSCPart2 ) of the Learning Journey ( https://azurecosmosdb.devpost.com/details/learningjourney ) (Phase 1 of the hackathon). You can now watch our Live Session #1 recorded video ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wfiGzyHLRQQ )!  * If you haven't started Part 1 or Part 2 yet, please go into the Manage email preferences of your Microsoft account and make sure your email for notifications is saved.  Follow one of the provided step-by-step developer guides to build your own custom AI copilot:  * Node.js version ( https://github.com/AzureCosmosDB/Azure-OpenAI-Node.js-Developer-Guide ) * Python version ( https://github.com/AzureCosmosDB/Azure-OpenAI-Python-Developer-Guide )  Please remember to screenshot your finished custom AI copilot to submit to your Devpost project.  * Custom AI copilot screenshot must showcase the following custom text prompt: “My name is [your name] and I am participating in the Microsoft Developer AI Learning Hackathon.”  NOW OPTIONAL: 2 Completion Emails screenshots  * Due to some technical difficulties, we’ve decided that the email screenshots will be optional as long as you provide us with your Microsoft Learn username and the email that you used to join the Cloud Skill Challenges.  Once you have completed all of the Learning Journey and your custom AI copilot, you’ll be able to move on to Phase 2 of the hackathon! For full details, check out our Learning Journey ( https://azurecosmosdb.devpost.com/details/learningjourney ) page.  You received this email because you signed up for Microsoft Developers AI Learning Hackathon. If you're no longer participating, you can unregister here ( https://azurecosmosdb.devpost.com/ ).  © 2024 Devpost, Inc. All rights reserved. Unsubscribe from these notifications ( https://devpost.com/notification_subscriptions/1KcgPg0OAsGJvKeu8JQeVA ) Hey everyone! Just a quick reminder to begin and complete Part 1 and Part 2 of the Learning Journey (Phase 1 of the hackathon). You can now watch our Live Session #1 recorded video ! If you haven't started Part 1 or Part 2 yet, please go into the Manage email preferences of your Microsoft account and make sure your email for notifications is saved. Follow one of the provided step-by-step developer guides to build your own custom AI copilot: Node.js version Python version Please remember to screenshot your finished custom AI copilot to submit to your Devpost project. Custom AI copilot screenshot must showcase the following custom text prompt: “My name is [your name] and I am participating in the Microsoft Developer AI Learning Hackathon.” NOW OPTIONAL: 2 Completion Emails screenshots Due to some technical difficulties, we’ve decided that the email screenshots will be optional as long as you provide us with your Microsoft Learn username and the email that you used to join the Cloud Skill Challenges. Once you have completed all of the Learning Journey and your custom AI copilot, you’ll be able to move on to Phase 2 of the hackathon! For full details, check out our Learning Journey page. You received this email because you signed up for Microsoft Developers AI Learning Hackathon. If you're no longer participating, you can unregister here . © 2024 Devpost, Inc. All rights reserved. Unsubscribe from these notifications

Best regards, Kirti Makwana On Mon, Jul 8, 2024 at 11:16 AM Dr. Kirti Makwana < kirtimakwana.mba@charusat.ac.in > wrote: Dear Students, Greetings from CHARUSAT_FTE_DEPSTAR !!! We are excited to announce a workshop on "Web Automation Testing Using Selenium WebDriver" by Dr. Jaishree Tailor, Associate Manager at L&T Technology Services, Vadodara. This workshop will provide valuable insights and hands-on experience in web automation testing, a crucial skill in today's software development landscape. Workshop Details: Date: July 20, 2024, Saturday Time: 10:00 AM onwards Venue: Will be communicated to the registered students Objective: The workshop aims to leverage awareness of industrial test automation, covering roles, methodologies, tools, and frameworks for web applications. It will focus on web automation techniques to streamline testing static web forms, including element interaction, script modularization, and unit test conversion using PyTest with Selenium and Python. Learning Outcomes: By the end of this workshop, participants will be able to: Explain the role of software testing in application development and differentiate between manual and test automation approaches. Utilize Selenium WebDriver to automate web application testing, including element identification, interaction, and assertion. Develop basic test automation scripts for interacting with various web elements (forms, dropdowns, links, etc.). Apply best practices for structuring and modularizing automation scripts for maintainability and reusability. Convert basic automation scripts into unit test scripts using the PyTest framework. Pre-requisites: Participants are encouraged to brush up on Python syntax, function/method design in Python, and HTML form tags, attributes, and elements before the workshop. Please make sure you have Python 3.9 or above and PyCharm Community Edition installed. Software Requirements: Python 3.9 or above: Download Here PyCharm Community Edition: Download Here Registration: Please register for the workshop by clicking here. Early registration is encouraged as seats are limited. Don't miss this opportunity to enhance your skills and learn from an industry expert. We look forward to your active participation. Best regards, Dr. Kirti Makwana Mobile:+91-9586861680 ACCREDITED WITH “A+” GRADE BY NAAC, GOI -- Dr. Kirti Makwana Mobile:+91-9586861680 ACCREDITED WITH “A+” GRADE BY NAAC, GOI -- Dr. Kirti Makwana Mobile:+91-9586861680 ACCREDITED WITH “A+” GRADE BY NAAC, GOI -- Dr. Kirti Makwana Mobile:+91-9586861680 ACCREDITED WITH “A+” GRADE BY NAAC, GOI -- Regards: Dr Dweepna Garg Head Of Department & Assistant Professor Department of Computer Engineering Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR) Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT) Contact No. : 02697-265321 (Intercom) -- Dr. Kirti Makwana Mobile:+91-9586861680 ACCREDITED WITH “A+” GRADE BY NAAC, GOI -- Dr. Kirti Makwana Mobile:+91-9586861680 ACCREDITED WITH “A+” GRADE BY NAAC, GOI DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Dear Students, Thank you for registering for the workshop titled "Web Automation Testing Using Selenium WebDriver" to be conducted by Dr. Jaishree Tailor, Associate Manager at L&T Technology Services, Vadodara. We are pleased to confirm your registration for the workshop. Please note that the workshop has limited seating (50 participants only) and registration is on a first-come, first-served basis. Additionally, we have taken into account the availability of students who expressed their inability to attend the workshop. Attendance at the workshop is mandatory. Details of the workshop are as follows: Date: July 20, 2024, Saturday Time: 10:00 AM onwards Venue: Will be communicated soon For any further queries or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us. Best regards, Kirti Makwana On Mon, Jul 8, 2024 at 11:16 AM Dr. Kirti Makwana < kirtimakwana.mba@charusat.ac.in > wrote: Dear Students, Greetings from CHARUSAT_FTE_DEPSTAR !!! We are excited to announce a workshop on "Web Automation Testing Using Selenium WebDriver" by Dr. Jaishree Tailor, Associate Manager at L&T Technology Services, Vadodara. This workshop will provide valuable insights and hands-on experience in web automation testing, a crucial skill in today's software development landscape. Workshop Details: Date: July 20, 2024, Saturday Time: 10:00 AM onwards Venue: Will be communicated to the registered students Objective: The workshop aims to leverage awareness of industrial test automation, covering roles, methodologies, tools, and frameworks for web applications. It will focus on web automation techniques to streamline testing static web forms, including element interaction, script modularization, and unit test conversion using PyTest with Selenium and Python. Learning Outcomes: By the end of this workshop, participants will be able to: Explain the role of software testing in application development and differentiate between manual and test automation approaches. Utilize Selenium WebDriver to automate web application testing, including element identification, interaction, and assertion. Develop basic test automation scripts for interacting with various web elements (forms, dropdowns, links, etc.). Apply best practices for structuring and modularizing automation scripts for maintainability and reusability. Convert basic automation scripts into unit test scripts using the PyTest framework. Pre-requisites: Participants are encouraged to brush up on Python syntax, function/method design in Python, and HTML form tags, attributes, and elements before the workshop. Please make sure you have Python 3.9 or above and PyCharm Community Edition installed. Software Requirements: Python 3.9 or above: Download Here PyCharm Community Edition: Download Here Registration: Please register for the workshop by clicking here. Early registration is encouraged as seats are limited. Don't miss this opportunity to enhance your skills and learn from an industry expert. We look forward to your active participation. Best regards, Dr. Kirti Makwana Mobile:+91-9586861680 ACCREDITED WITH “A+” GRADE BY NAAC, GOI -- Dr. Kirti Makwana Mobile:+91-9586861680 ACCREDITED WITH “A+” GRADE BY NAAC, GOI -- Dr. Kirti Makwana Mobile:+91-9586861680 ACCREDITED WITH “A+” GRADE BY NAAC, GOI -- Dr. Kirti Makwana Mobile:+91-9586861680 ACCREDITED WITH “A+” GRADE BY NAAC, GOI -- Regards: Dr Dweepna Garg Head Of Department & Assistant Professor Department of Computer Engineering Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR) Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT) Contact No. : 02697-265321 (Intercom) -- Dr. Kirti Makwana Mobile:+91-9586861680 ACCREDITED WITH “A+” GRADE BY NAAC, GOI DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). subject: CHARUSAT_FTE_DEPSTAR_Invitation to Workshop on Web Automation Testing  Using Selenium WebDriver
content: Dear Students,  *Greetings from CHARUSAT_FTE_DEPSTAR !!!*  *D**EPSTAR, CHARUSAT* in collaboration with the *Institution's Innovation Council (ICC) *is excited to announce a workshop on *"Web Automation Testing Using Selenium WebDriver"* by *Dr. Jaishree Tailor, Associate Manager at L&T Technology Services, Vadodara.* This workshop will provide valuable insights and hands-on experience in web automation testing, a crucial skill in today's software development landscape.  *Workshop Details:*     - *Date:* July 20, 2024, Saturday    - *Time:* 10:00 AM onwards    - *Venue:* Will be communicated to the registered students  *Objective:* The workshop aims to leverage awareness of industrial test automation, covering roles, methodologies, tools, and frameworks for web applications. It will focus on web automation techniques to streamline testing static web forms, including element interaction, script modularization, and unit test conversion using PyTest with Selenium and Python.  *Learning Outcomes:* By the end of this workshop, participants will be able to:     - Explain the role of software testing in application development and    differentiate between manual and test automation approaches.    - Utilize Selenium WebDriver to automate web application testing,    including element identification, interaction, and assertion.    - Develop basic test automation scripts for interacting with various web    elements (forms, dropdowns, links, etc.).    - Apply best practices for structuring and modularizing automation    scripts for maintainability and reusability.    - Convert basic automation scripts into unit test scripts using the    PyTest framework.  *Pre-requisites:* Participants are encouraged to brush up on Python syntax, function/method design in Python, and HTML form tags, attributes, and elements before the workshop. Please make sure you have Python 3.9 or above and PyCharm Community Edition installed.  *Software Requirements:*     - Python 3.9 or above: Download Here - PyCharm Community Edition: Download Here *Registration:* Please register for the workshop by *clicking here. **You can register early as seats are limited.*  Don't miss this opportunity to enhance your skills and learn from an industry expert. We look forward to your active participation.  *Please feel free to contact Dr. Kirti Makwana (kirtimakwana.mba@charusat.ac.in ) and/or Mr. Kashyap Patel (kashyappatel.dce@charusat.ac.in ) for any questions.*  Best regards,  *Dr. Kirti Makwana*  Mobile:+91-9586861680  *[image: Inline image 1]                    * ACCREDITED WITH “A+” GRADE BY NAAC, GOI [image: Workshop on Web Automation Testing.png]  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon  this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient  is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, or the  employee, or agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended  recipient and/or if you have received this in error, please contact the  sender and delete the material from the computer or device. CHARUSAT does  not take any liability or responsibility for any malicious codes/software  and/or viruses/Trojan horses that may have been picked up during the  transmission of this message. By opening and solely relying on the contents  or part thereof this message, and taking action thereof, the recipient  relieves the CHARUSAT of all the liabilities including any damages done to  the recipient's pc/laptop/peripherals and other communication devices due  to any reason. Dear Students, Greetings from CHARUSAT_FTE_DEPSTAR !!! D EPSTAR, CHARUSAT in collaboration with the Institution's Innovation Council (ICC) is excited to announce a workshop on "Web Automation Testing Using Selenium WebDriver" by Dr. Jaishree Tailor, Associate Manager at L&T Technology Services, Vadodara. This workshop will provide valuable insights and hands-on experience in web automation testing, a crucial skill in today's software development landscape. Workshop Details: Date: July 20, 2024, Saturday Time: 10:00 AM onwards Venue: Will be communicated to the registered students Objective: The workshop aims to leverage awareness of industrial test automation, covering roles, methodologies, tools, and frameworks for web applications. It will focus on web automation techniques to streamline testing static web forms, including element interaction, script modularization, and unit test conversion using PyTest with Selenium and Python. Learning Outcomes: By the end of this workshop, participants will be able to: Explain the role of software testing in application development and differentiate between manual and test automation approaches. Utilize Selenium WebDriver to automate web application testing, including element identification, interaction, and assertion. Develop basic test automation scripts for interacting with various web elements (forms, dropdowns, links, etc.). Apply best practices for structuring and modularizing automation scripts for maintainability and reusability. Convert basic automation scripts into unit test scripts using the PyTest framework. Pre-requisites: Participants are encouraged to brush up on Python syntax, function/method design in Python, and HTML form tags, attributes, and elements before the workshop. Please make sure you have Python 3.9 or above and PyCharm Community Edition installed. Software Requirements: Python 3.9 or above: Download Here PyCharm Community Edition: Download Here Registration: Please register for the workshop by clicking here. You can register early as seats are limited. Don't miss this opportunity to enhance your skills and learn from an industry expert. We look forward to your active participation. Please feel free to contact Dr. Kirti Makwana ( kirtimakwana.mba@charusat.ac.in ) and/or Mr. Kashyap Patel ( kashyappatel.dce@charusat.ac.in ) for any questions. Best regards, Dr. Kirti Makwana Mobile:+91-9586861680 ACCREDITED WITH “A+” GRADE BY NAAC, GOI DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Dear Students It is good opportunity  so go through the trailing mail and apply for it and acknowledge me through mail or meet me in the lab 307.  If you have any doubt or difficluty to fill the form then yuo cam let me know. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Tanya Shree < tanya.shree@internshala.com > Date: Tue, Jul 16, 2024 at 2:56 PM Subject: Invitation for Tally Hackathon: Event Overview and Participation Details To: jaiminundavia.mca@charusat.ac.in < jaiminundavia.mca@charusat.ac.in > Dear Prof. , Exclusive Invitation! Greetings from Internshala!! Tally Solutions, in collaboration with Internshala, is hosting a hackathon "CodeBrewers 2024” exclusively for top premier institutes of India. We would be thrilled to have students from your institute participate in this event. Students can apply here : http://internshala.com/i/tcbabhi Event Details: Registration Opens : 11th to 24th July. Quiz and Coding Challenge : 26th July. Hackathon : 9th - 11th August. Results Declaration : 19th August. What’s in it for your students? Cash pool of INR 3 Lakhs. Internship opportunity with Tally Solutions. Direct Entry for the Personal Interview. Tally Merchandise. Networking Opportunities with industry leaders and peers. Participation Guidelines: Eligibility: BE/B.Tech/Dual Degree students from the 2nd year onwards. Team Formation: They can register as Solo, Duo, or Trio. We look forward to your participation and contribution to make CodeBrewers 2024 a resounding success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We eagerly await your institute's involvement in this exciting event! Regards, Tanya Shree, University Relations Manager- Internshala, Trusted Partner of ~ 7500+ colleges Mob No. : (+91) 92892-18389 -- Nilesh Kumar Dubey (PhD) Assistant Professor, Computer Science and Engineering, Institutional Coordinator of IQAC , CSIC, UIIC, IPR Devang Patel Institute of Advanced Technology & Research Changa-388421, Gujarat, INDIA. http://www.charusat.ac.in DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is strictly prohibited. subject: =?utf-8?q?vansh=2C_get_an_additional_degree_from_IIT_=28besides_your_coll?=  =?utf-8?q?ege_degree=29=3A_Live_online_session_by_IIT_Mandi?=
content: Session by IIT Mandi. Professors will share steps for applying and getting a minor degree.  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌   Hi vansh !     IIT Mandi is conducting a live online session to guide students on getting an additional Degree from IIT besides your regular college degree.     In this live online session, IIT Professor will share steps for applying and getting a minor degree from IIT Mandi.     This will also allow you to get an IIT Alumni status. Also comes with Placement opportunities after course completion.      These programs can be attended online while you pursue your regular college.     Other session details:    * Date: Saturday, 25th May 2024   * Time: 6:00 - 7:00 PM   * Registration link: lu.ma/iitevent   * Fee: There is NO FEE for this event.     Limited seats available, registration on a first-come, first-served basis. Register NOW and book your seat.      The session is being offered by IIT Mandi in partnership with Masai School and Bolt IoT.     Regards,  Rohit TS  Software Developer - Bolt IoT     Link to register for the event: lu.ma/iitevent  Unsubscribe me vansh, get an additional degree from IIT (besides your college degree): Live online session by IIT Mandi Session by IIT Mandi. Professors will share steps for applying and getting a minor degree.  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ Hi vansh ! IIT Mandi is conducting a live online session to guide students on getting an additional Degree from IIT besides your regular college degree. In this live online session, IIT Professor will share steps for applying and getting a minor degree from IIT Mandi. This will also allow you to get an IIT Alumni status . Also comes with Placement opportunities after course completion . These programs can be attended online while you pursue your regular college. Other session details: Date: Saturday, 25th May 2024 Time: 6:00 - 7:00 PM Registration link: lu.ma/iitevent Fee: There is NO FEE for this event. Limited seats available, registration on a first-come, first-served basis. Register NOW and book your seat. The session is being offered by IIT Mandi in partnership with Masai School and Bolt IoT. Regards, Rohit TS Software Developer - Bolt IoT Link to register for the event: lu.ma/iitevent Unsubscribe me

In case of a query, please feel free to discuss. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Shardul Dave < davs@odoo.com > Date: Tue, May 28, 2024 at 10:33 AM Subject: Invitation for your students to participate in Odoo Combat 2024 - National Level Coding Challenge To:  < principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in > Dear Madam/Sir, We are excited to announce the Odoo Combat 2024, a national coding challenge designed to identify and celebrate the brightest young minds in the field of software development. This event, hosted by Odoo, is an excellent opportunity for students to showcase their coding skills, learn from industry experts, and win exciting prizes. We are expecting 1000+ finest minds of India to participate in this event. Odoo Combat 2024 Details Dates: 29-30 June 2024 Location: Odoo IN Pvt Ltd, Infocity, Gandhinagar, Gujarat Registration Link: Odoo Combat 2024 Registration Why participate? Skill Enhancement: Students will solve real-world problems, enhancing their coding and problem-solving skills. Networking Opportunities: Participants will have the chance to connect with industry professionals and like-minded peers. Prizes and Recognition: Winners will receive cash rewards and recognition from Odoo. Career Growth: Outstanding participants may receive internship and job opportunities with Odoo and its partners. Who can participate? This competition is open to all students and fresh graduates in India with a passion for coding and technology. Whether they are from computer science, information technology, or any related fields, this is a chance for them to shine. We kindly request you to inform your students about this exciting opportunity and encourage them to register for the event. Attached is a flyer with more details about the competition that you can share with your student community. For any questions or further information, please do not hesitate to contact us at +91 6357890568. We look forward to your students' participation and hope to see them excel in the Odoo Combat 2024! Thanks & Regards, Shardul Dave [M. +91 6357890568 ] | Assistant Manager (Events) 2nd Floor, Tower 3 - Infocity, Gandhinagar, Gujarat - India -- You received this message because you are subscribed to the Google Groups "DEPSTAR_CE" group. subject: MEMBERSHIP NOW OPEN For Rotaract Club of Charusat University.......!!!!!
content: Dear Students,  What is a Rotaract? Rotaract clubs are community-based and university-based groups that unite young adults to exchange ideas with community leaders, develop leadership and professional skills, and have fun through service.  Why should you be a part of Rotaract? Joining Rotaract means more than volunteering—it's about leadership, professional growth, and global connections. Make a real impact locally, gain resume-worthy skills, and forge friendships worldwide through meaningful service and cultural exchanges. Shape your future with Rotaract today. Ready to take up the chance to make a difference? All you need to do is meet these simple requirements:  Age criteria: 18 years and older Be a student at Charusat University  Express your interest by filling out our quick Google form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1J2AM-m-N0mgDbVaDfuzGQl1nDcyK8Qb6vR_YrPQ1jDM/edit?ts=66854ccb .  Are you curious to learn more about the essence of Rotaract? Check out this enlightening video: What is Rotaract! https://youtu.be/WDJs-jmiB8A  For any queries or clarifications, feel free to reach out to: Rtr. Pranshi Talati (22DCE121): + 91 99244-77822 Rtr. Desai Vishva (21DCE018): +91 81407-22823 Rtr. Harshal Vaghela (22DIT083): +91 8128-767867  Step into a world of service, growth, and camaraderie with the Rotaract Club of Charusat University. Let's create ripples of change together!  A few glimpses of our events are attached below.  Warm regards, Rotaract Club of Charusat University   Thanks & Regards,  *Corporate Communication Officer* [image: ] : www.charusat.ac.in [image: ] : *https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PdpuaQNgDSc&t=85s *  WhatsApp Video 2024-07-10 at 3.56.06 PM.mp4 --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). subject: Registeration Confirmation - E-Yantra, Robotics Workshop on April 13,  2024 @ Indus University
content: *Dear Participants,*  Thanks for registering for E-Yantra, Robotics Workshop on April 13, 2024 @ Indus University.  We hereby confirm your registration for the workshop. You are supposed to report the venue as per following details:  *Venue:* B227, 2nd Floor Bhanwar Building, IITE, Indus University *Date: *April 13, 2024 *Time: * *Registration: *9:00 to 9:30 AM *High Tea: *9:30 to 10:00 AM *Workshop* will start sharp at 10:00 AM  *-- * *Google Map Location:* https://maps.app.goo.gl/mQgFoNqwnHfAY1JX7  In case any query you may contact Dr. Divyangna Gandhi, Assistant Professor at Indus University, via email at workshop.ec@indusuni.ac.in  or (M) 9925518841   With Regards, Electronics & Communication Engineering Department  *IITE,INDUS UNIVERSITY*Rancharda via Shilaj, Ahmedabad-382115  *L: +91-2764 260277 / 78 / 79  Ext: 3 <+91-2764+260277/278+Ext:+2014>325* Website: https://www.indusuni.ac.in Dear Participants, Thanks for registering for E-Yantra, Robotics Workshop on April 13, 2024 @ Indus University. We hereby confirm your registration for the workshop. You are supposed to report the venue as per following details: Venue: B227, 2nd Floor Bhanwar Building, IITE, Indus University Date: April 13, 2024 Time: Registration: 9:00 to 9:30 AM High Tea: 9:30 to 10:00 AM Workshop will start sharp at 10:00 AM -- Google Map Location: https://maps.app.goo.gl/mQgFoNqwnHfAY1JX7 In case any query you may contact Dr. Divyangna Gandhi, Assistant Professor at Indus University, via email at workshop.ec@indusuni.ac.in or (M) 9925518841 With Regards, Electronics & Communication Engineering Department IITE,INDUS UNIVERSITY Rancharda via Shilaj, Ahmedabad-382115 L: +91-2764 260277 / 78 / 79  Ext: 3 325 Website: https://www.indusuni.ac.in

subject: Team Announcement - [DEPSTAR Coding Club]
content: printf(“ Hello Coders! “);   It is with utmost pleasure that we announce to you the team of DEPSTAR Coding Club (DCC) for the year 2023-24. The intensive interview process has pinnacled with the inclusion of seven sagacious students who flabbergasted us with their talent, temperament and creativity.  The selected members all bring to the table a diverse set of skill sets and a fresh set of perspectives. From coding to content creation, from marketing to management, a wide range of roles and responsibilities will be encompassed, each of them fortifying the student’s learning curve.  Attaching below the pdf of the selected members. Heartiest congratulations to you on making it to the final cut. A journey of immense growth, learning and self exploration is on the cards. Anticipating planetary development of the club.   Regards,  DEPSTAR Coding Club printf(“ Hello Coders! “); It is with utmost pleasure that we announce to you the team of DEPSTAR Coding Club (DCC) for the year 2023-24. The intensive interview process has pinnacled with the inclusion of seven sagacious students who flabbergasted us with their talent, temperament and creativity. The selected members all bring to the table a diverse set of skill sets and a fresh set of perspectives. From coding to content creation, from marketing to management, a wide range of roles and responsibilities will be encompassed, each of them fortifying the student’s learning curve. Attaching below the pdf of the selected members. Heartiest congratulations to you on making it to the final cut. A journey of immense growth, learning and self exploration is on the cards. Anticipating planetary development of the club. Regards, DEPSTAR Coding Club

subject: Reg. SGP Project Evaluation
content: Dear Team lead,  You all are informed to get your project reviews as below time frame and venue. The marking of the Project proposal review will take place as per the attached rubrics.  *Date: July 19, 2024* *Time: 2.20 PM to 4.20 PM * *Mode: Offline* *Venue: Sophos Lab*  *Due to any reason you are unavailable then you may come on July 20th, 2024 between 9 AM to 11 AM. Failing to remain present,  you and your team will be considered absent.*  *Team lead is requested to be present with the whole team* and if any supporting document then you may bring with you in soft or hard copy.  If you have any doubt then you may meet me or Vaishali Ma'am.  *Complete the review process by 20th July 2024.*  --  regards Ms. Krishna Patel (Ph.D.) Assistant Professor Department of Computer Science & Engineering Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research Charotar University of Science And Technology  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). subject: Fwd: REMINDER and INSTRUCTIONS for MA144 Quiz.
content: Dear Students,  An online quiz for MA144: Engineering Mathematics -II is scheduled today at 11:25 am to 12:00 noon. Kindly note down the following instructions before appearing for the quiz.  *Instructions* 1. The quiz will be conducted through Google Forms, login using your institute email ID only. 2. Ensure that your device and internet connection are functioning properly before starting the quiz as no technical queries will be entertained. 3. There is no provision for retaking the quiz, those students who fail to appear for the quiz or have not submitted the quiz on time will lose their marks. Marks will be considered for internal evaluation. 4. Syllabus of quiz: All units. 5.  The link will be activated exactly at 11:25 am and will be closed at 12:00 noon. Make sure to submit the quiz before 12:00 pm. 6. Kindly fill up the correct Roll number(in capitals), institute and other details asked on the first page of the form. 6. The link to access the quiz (google form) is as follows:   *https://forms.gle/wFNG3CkVbZ6S4fTN9 * Kindly prepare accordingly and make sure to adhere to the instructions provided.   Best regards, Jignesh Chauhan Mobile: 7600122587  --   *Jignesh Chauhan(Ph.D. Mathematics)* Assistant Professor Department of Mathematical Sciences, P. D. Patel Institute of Applied Sciences, Charotar University of Science & Technology, Off. Nadiad-Petlad Highway, Changa, Anand • 388 421, Gujarat, INDIA [image: email-icon]  jigneshchauhan.maths@charusat.ac.in [image: facebook icon] [image: linkedin icon] [image: twitter icon] [image: instagram icon] --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon  this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient  is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, or the  employee, or agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended  recipient and/or if you have received this in error, please contact the  sender and delete the material from the computer or device. CHARUSAT does  not take any liability or responsibility for any malicious codes/software  and/or viruses/Trojan horses that may have been picked up during the  transmission of this message. By opening and solely relying on the contents  or part thereof this message, and taking action thereof, the recipient  relieves the CHARUSAT of all the liabilities including any damages done to  the recipient's pc/laptop/peripherals and other communication devices due  to any reason. content: Dear All,  This is a kind reminder to all to appear for the Mock Unit Test scheduled today. content: Dear Students,  *A Mock/Practice test *as a training session for paperless examination is scheduled on* 06/11/2023* from* 10:00 AM to 11:AM.*  All of you are hereby informed to remain present the same without fail. subject: DEPSTAR_CSE_Unit Test -2 Schedule & Seating Arrangements
content: Dear Students,  Please find attached herewith Unit Test -2 *Schedule and Seating arrangement* details for your perusal.  *You are required to :*     - adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in the email attachment.    - uphold decorum in the examination hall.    - keep bags outside the exam hall.    - wear ID Card.    - report to the exam venue and take your seat *15 minutes before *the    exam time.      - Mobile phones, smartwatches, or any other electronic devices are *strictly    prohibited *in the exam hall.  *The exam will take place in the CMPICA Building.*      - Ground floor: Class 1 to 4    - First Floor: Class 5 to 7 and Tutorial Room    - Second Floor: Class 9 to 12, Lab 10, Lab 11, Lab 12(A), Lab 12(B),    Exam Hall 1 & Exam Hall 2  Contact the undersigned and/or Ms. Naina Parmar for any queries. --  *Dr. Kirti Makwana*  Mobile:+91-9586861680  *[image: Inline image 1]                    * ACCREDITED WITH “A+” GRADE BY NAAC, GOI  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). subject: Fwd: Invitation to Participate : TIFAN 2025
content: Dear Students,  Do register yourself. For any query contact yur counselor.   *Thanks and Regards,* *RADHIKA H. PATEL* *Assistant Professor* *Department of Information Technology* *DEPSTAR,* *CHARUSAT, Changa*         ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Malhar Chaniyara Date: Tue, Jun 18, 2024 at 3:59 PM Subject: Invitation to Participate : TIFAN 2025 To:  Dear University/Collage representatives Sir & Ma’am,    I hope this message finds you well. I am excited to invite your university/college students to participate in the upcoming Technology Innovation Forum for Agricultural Nurturing (TIFAN) 2025 event organized by SAE India.    TIFAN 2025 aims to promote innovation and technology in agriculture, providing a platform for students to showcase their creativity and technical expertise. We are focusing on enhancing technology integration in design solutions to drive impactful innovations in the agricultural sector. I have attached brochures providing an overview of the TIFAN 2025 event. Your students will have the opportunity to collaborate with mentors, industry experts, and peers to develop innovative solutions that can make a difference in agriculture.    The problem to solve in TIFAN required cross functional skills, I would suggest having teams formed from the different departments of your university. You can refer this year’s events by following this link . I would really encourage to students from Gujarat region to participate in this nation-wide event. This year there were, 75+ Teams registered for the event, out of which ~30 Teams finalize for the demonstration in final phase.    I look forward to welcoming your university/college students to TIFAN 2025 and witnessing their creativity and ingenuity in addressing agricultural challenges through technology-driven solutions.    Should you have any questions,? Please do not hesitate to reach out. Kindly share this email to relevant faculty/student group for their pursual.      Thanks & Regards,  *Malhar Chaniyara*  *Mentor, TIFAN 2025*  John Deere India– ETEC, Pune  Tower 14, Magarpatta City, Pune 411013  Cell: +91-72496 96110    Public  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). subject: Fwd: EPIIC (Guj2) - Cashpool of Rs. 10,000 - Content Creation contest
content: Dear Students,  Go through the trailing email and participate if interested.  *Thanks and Regards,* *RADHIKA H. PATEL* *Assistant Professor* *Department of Information Technology* *DEPSTAR,* *CHARUSAT, Changa*        ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR Date: Mon, Jun 24, 2024 at 2:50 PM Subject: Fwd: EPIIC (Guj2) - Cashpool of Rs. 10,000 - Content Creation contest To: Depstar     ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: EPIIC Date: Mon, Jun 24, 2024 at 1:53 PM Subject: EPIIC (Guj2) - Cashpool of Rs. 10,000 - Content Creation contest To: E P I I C Dear Sir,  Good Afternoon. I hope you are doing well.  We are excited to announce the Content Creation contest! This contest offers a cash prize and an opportunity for placements with a salary package of 2 to 3 lakhs.  Please find the details of the contest below. We kindly request you to circulate this information to students, including alumni groups, to encourage their participation. Nature of Contest Participants would be given a scenario. They have to prepare a creative post for social media. Participants are free to use any tools like Canva, blender, Maya, Adobe or even without any tools . Creativity is the key. Entry Fee Rs. 125 Cash Prize Winner : Rs. 5,000 for one participant  Consolation Prize : Rs. 1,000 for 5 participants Who can participate All UG/PG pursuing students, and recent graduates   UG/PG pursuing students including recent pass out batch, Any stream of Education. Employment / Internship Opportunity 1. If the winners have completed UG/PG : Cash Prize + Chance for a work from home Employment role with a salary package of 2- 3 Lakhs per annum   2. If the winners are pursuing UG/PG : Cash Prize + Chance for a work from home Internship role with stipend Last date to Apply 29th of June 2024  *Link to apply : https://www.candidate.epiic.in/ *  Please find the attached Contest poster for your perusal.  Kindly circulate to students. Interested candidates can apply. Please feel free to reach me out for any queries or clarifications.  *About EPIIC :*  EPIIC is a startup, floated with the objective to bridge and improve Industry - Academia Connect. *EPIIC has collaborations with Universities & Colleges to support and improve their placement percentage.*  Warm Regards, Ram Gopal R Co-Founder & COO EPIIC Skill Tech Private Limited 9361132923  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). subject: Update: Technical Issues - Microsoft Developers AI Learning Hackathon
content: ( http://devpost.com )  Hey everyone,  The technical issues of accessing Part 1 ( https://aka.ms/AzureCosmosDB/CSCPart1 ) and Part 2 ( https://aka.ms/AzureCosmosDB/CSCPart2 ) of the Azure Cosmos DB Developer Cloud Skills Challenges should be fixed now!   If you're not receiving the completion emails, please go into the Manage email preferences of your Microsoft account and make sure your email for notifications is saved.  * If you're adding in your email after completing, you'll still get the completion emails, please wait 24-48 hours.  Lastly, friendly reminder to those who are submitting as a team for Phase 2 of the hackathon, please remember:  * Include all team member's Microsoft Learn usernames * Upload all team member's completion email screenshots (2 per team member) * Upload all team member's custom AI copilot screenshots (1 per team member) * Each screenshot must showcase the following custom text prompt: “My name is [your name] and I am participating in the Microsoft Developer AI Learning Hackathon.”  If you have any questions, feel free to email us or ask in our Discord channel.  You received this email because you signed up for Microsoft Developers AI Learning Hackathon. If you're no longer participating, you can unregister here ( https://azurecosmosdb.devpost.com/ ).  © 2024 Devpost, Inc. All rights reserved. Unsubscribe from these notifications ( https://devpost.com/notification_subscriptions/1KcgPg0OAsGJvKeu8JQeVA ) Hey everyone, The technical issues of accessing Part 1 and Part 2 of the Azure Cosmos DB Developer Cloud Skills Challenges should be fixed now! If you're not receiving the completion emails, please go into the Manage email preferences of your Microsoft account and make sure your email for notifications is saved. If you're adding in your email after completing, you'll still get the completion emails, please wait 24-48 hours. Lastly, friendly reminder to those who are submitting as a team for Phase 2 of the hackathon, please remember: Include all team member's Microsoft Learn usernames Upload all team member's completion email screenshots (2 per team member) Upload all team member's custom AI copilot screenshots (1 per team member) Each screenshot must showcase the following custom text prompt: “My name is [your name] and I am participating in the Microsoft Developer AI Learning Hackathon.” If you have any questions, feel free to email us or ask in our Discord channel. You received this email because you signed up for Microsoft Developers AI Learning Hackathon. If you're no longer participating, you can unregister here . © 2024 Devpost, Inc. All rights reserved. Unsubscribe from these notifications

subject: Fwd: Don't Miss Out! - ELTAI Webinar 124
content: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: ELTAI India Date: Fri, Jul 12, 2024 at 8:58 PM Subject: Don't Miss Out! - ELTAI Webinar 124 To: ELTAI member 2 , Students of Subjects other than English (College) , Teachers of English (College) , ELTAI Conference 2022 < eltaiconf2022@gmail.com>, ELTAI Conference 2023 Participants < eltaiconf23participants@eltai.in>   [image: image] Unlock the Secrets of Qualitative Research  [image: image]  Dear ELTAI Members and Students,  We cordially invite you to attend our upcoming ELTAI Monthly Webinar on "Doing Literature Review in Qualitative Research" on July 28th. The session will be conducted by Dr. Bharat Neupane from Kathmandu University, Nepal, and will take place on the Google Meet platform.   Literature review is a crucial aspect of qualitative research, as it helps researchers to situate their study within the existing body of knowledge and identify gaps in the literature. In this webinar, Dr. Neupane will provide insights into the process of conducting a comprehensive literature review for qualitative research projects.  Key topics to be covered:     -      Importance of literature review in qualitative research    -     Strategies for searching and selecting relevant literature    -     Techniques for critical analysis and synthesis of literature    -     Structuring and writing the literature review section  We encourage all ELTAI members and students to register for this informative webinar and take advantage of the opportunity to learn from an expert in qualitative research.  We look forward to your participation and engagement in this webinar.  Best regards,  ELTAI Webinar Team Register Now [image: Link] [image: Email] [image: Instagram] [image: Facebook] [image: Twitter] [image: YouTube] [image: Link] English Language Teachers' Association of India  D-54 Third Floor, Anandham Apartments,  #156, SIDCO Nagar Main Road, Villivakkam,  Chennai - 600 049, Tamil Nadu, India   Unsubscribe --  You received this message because you are subscribed to the Google Groups "ELTAI member 2" group. To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to members2+unsubscribe@eltai.in. To view this discussion on the web visit https://groups.google.com/a/eltai.in/d/msgid/members2/CAKvbA4Ue7UBOY-igRN_Fw7HJtx6tSUiOa-_iSAMtCBqtbd1w1w%40mail.gmail.com .   --   Charotar University of Science & Technology Accredited Grade A+ by NAAC Accorded with Centre of Excellence by Govt. of Gujarat Web: www.charusat.ac.in  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT).
