subject: Fwd: Invitation to Participate in Logo Design Competition:  Prohibition/Prevention of Alcohol and Drug Use at CHARUSAT Campus
content: Thanks & Regards, Miss. Naina Parmar, Assistant Professor, Computer Science & Engineering Department, Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR) Changa-Gujarat 388421   ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Hardik Jayswal Date: Wed, Feb 28, 2024 at 10:30 AM Subject: Fwd: Invitation to Participate in Logo Design Competition: Prohibition/Prevention of Alcohol and Drug Use at CHARUSAT Campus To: Naina Parmar , Dr Dweepna Garg < dweepnagarg.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Jay Patel Cc: HOD Depstar , Amit Nayak < amitnayak.it@charusat.ac.in>   please forward this to the students  ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR Date: Tue, Feb 27, 2024 at 8:34 PM Subject: Invitation to Participate in Logo Design Competition: Prohibition/Prevention of Alcohol and Drug Use at CHARUSAT Campus To: Mukesh Pal , hemant kumar < hemantkumar.cips@charusat.ac.in>, Vidhi Thakar < vidhithakar.phy@charusat.ac.in>, Rajesh Savalia < rajeshsavalia.maths@charusat.ac.in>, Hardik Jayswal < hardikjayswal.it@charusat.ac.in>, Kalpit Soni , Dhara Milan Patel , jamin chauhan < jaminchauhan.nur@charusat.ac.in>, Jalpa Suthar < jalpasuthar.ph@charusat.ac.in> Cc: Principal Dear Students,  We are excited to announce the commencement of the *Logo Design Competition organized by the Anti-Drug Squad - DEPSTAR at CHARUSAT*, focusing on promoting the prohibition and prevention of alcohol and drug use in and around our campus.  Please find the below details about the competition:  *About the Competition*:  The "Logo Design Competition" invites all current undergraduate and postgraduate students of CHARUSAT to showcase their creativity and contribute to our mission of fostering a drug-free environment. Please note that the competition is not open to employees of CHARUSAT.  *Competition Details:* Duration: The competition begins at 10:00 AM on 27th February 2024 and ends at 10:00 PM on 5th March 2024. Entries submitted after the deadline will not be considered.  Eligibility: Open to all CHARUSAT students.  Joining: Participation is individual-based; group entries will not be accepted. The competition is free of charge.  Link to upload the Logo: http://172.16.11.158/logo/ [use this link via CHARUSAT LAN only]  *Submission Guidelines:*  · Design a logo that corresponds to the theme of Prohibition/Prevention of Alcohol and Drug Use in and around the CHARUSAT campus. · Your design should be modern, simple, smart, scalable, recognizable, and memorable. · The logo must include the subject "Prohibition/Prevention of Alcohol and Drug Use in and around the CHARUSAT campus". · Submissions must be made online; printed copies will not be accepted. · Logo files must be in jpg or bmp format and should be at least 256 x 256 pixels. The attachment size should not exceed 5MB.  *Selection of Winner and Judging Criteria*: Entries will be evaluated based on the following criteria:  · Storyline/Design Rationale/Quote: 40% · Creativity: 30% · Originality: 30%  The Scrutiny Committee will review all received logos and announce the winner by 15th March 2024, adhering to the provided guidelines.  *Prize:* *Winner Prize: Rs. 2500*  We encourage all eligible students to participate actively and contribute to this meaningful initiative.  For any queries or clarifications, please feel free to contact us below:  Dr. Hardik Jayswal (+91-9825961830), Dr. Dweepna Garg (+91-9601700945), Mr. Jay Patel (+91-9428153390), Ms. Naina Parmar(+91-8849497448)  Best Regards, Principal - DEPSTAR    --   *Hardik S. Jayswal*  (*M) : +91-9825961830*  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). subject: Fwd: Invitation to Participate in International Conference on  Bhartiya Knowledge System at Ganpat University (March 22-23, 2024)
content: *Thanks and Regards,* *RADHIKA H. PATEL* *Assistant Professor* *Department of Information Technology* *DEPSTAR,* *CHARUSAT, Changa*        ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR Date: Tue, Feb 27, 2024 at 8:20 AM Subject: Fwd: Invitation to Participate in International Conference on Bhartiya Knowledge System at Ganpat University (March 22-23, 2024) To: Depstar ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: GUNI-GANPAT UNIVERSITY Date: Mon, 26 Feb 2024 at 7:14 PM Subject: Invitation to Participate in International Conference on Bhartiya Knowledge System at Ganpat University (March 22-23, 2024) To: Dear Sir / Madam  Greetings from Ganpat University -Center for Bhartiya Knowledge System and Ancient Wisdom!  It is our proud pleasure to extend an invitation to you to participate in the International Conference on “Revitalising and Rejuvenating Bhartiya Knowledge System for making Bharat Vishwaguru by 2047”, organized under auspices of *Ganpat University - **Centre* for *Bhartiya Knowledge System and Ancient Wisdom during March 22-23, 2024.*  The conference aims to bring together scholars, researchers, and practitioners from around the world to explore and discuss various aspects of the Bhartiya Knowledge System. Since there are six different tracks, detailed below (covering all the disciplines of Ganpat University), we believe that your expertise and knowledge would make a valuable contribution to the diverse perspectives we aim to showcase during the conference.    *1) Technology Integration to ensure happiness *     - Smart Living Environments    - Educational Technology for Lifelong Learning    - Cybersecurity and Digital Safety    - Health Monitoring and Wearables  *2) BKS based approaches in Science, Mathematics and Language*     - Integration of BKS in Modern Science Education    - Vedic Mathematics    - Sanskrit as a Scientific Language    - Ayurvedic Science and Traditional Medicine  *3) Architectural splendors from past to present*     - Ancient Indian City Planning: Reflecting upon our Past for an    Organized Future    - Indian Temple Architecture: Understanding Monumentality through a    SocioculturalLens    - Forts and Palaces of India: A Representation of Politics in    Constructionh    - The Bhartiya Aspects of Housing in India: A Chronological Study  *4) Rich Indian heritage for health and wellness / Ayurveda, Dravyaguna and Panchkarma*     - Mind-Body Connection in Ayurveda    -  Yogic Practices for Wellness    -  Panchakarma Therapy    -  Culinary Wisdom for Wellness  *5) Agriculture, Nutrition, and Indian Culture*     -  Ancient Agricultural Practices    -  Role of Women in Agriculture    -  Festivals and Harvest Celebrations    - Challenges and Innovations in Agro-Technology  *6) Vedik Indian perspective on Management *     - Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) in Vedic Perspective    - Timeless Wisdom for Decision-Making    - Leadership Insights from the Vedas    - Holistic Employee Well-Being  The given clusters are not exhaustive. Any topic in CONSONANCE to the main theme can be considered for participation.    We encourage you to participate in the conference by submitting a research paper, poster or article under one of the aforesaid tracks. You may also participate as a delegate to relish the key note addresses, and engaging panel discussions relevant to Bhartiya Knowledge System. This conference provides an excellent platform for networking, knowledge exchange, and collaboration among academia and industry professionals.    For detailed information regarding the conference themes, submission guidelines, and registration process, please refer to the attached event brochure or visit the conference website: https://www.ganpatuniversity.ac.in/bks/home-bks While we solicit your active participation, it is also a humble request to circulate this information to your academia and industry acquaintances for wider publicity and unprecedented response.    Thank you,  *Organizing Team, **International Conference on BKS* *Apply Now* *For Details Contact @  * Student Section at Your Institute / Department / Centre, Ganpat University, Ganpat Vidyanagar – 384012  | Mob. No. +91 8100 61 61 61 | Not interested? Unsubscribe here you will not get any correspondences from Institute related to your application process once unsubscribed.  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon  this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient  is strictly prohibited. It is our proud pleasure to extend an invitation to you to participate in the International Conference on “Revitalising and Rejuvenating Bhartiya Knowledge System for making Bharat Vishwaguru by 2047”, organized under auspices of Ganpat University - Centre for Bhartiya Knowledge System and Ancient Wisdom during March 22-23, 2024. The conference aims to bring together scholars, researchers, and practitioners from around the world to explore and discuss various aspects of the Bhartiya Knowledge System. Since there are six different tracks, detailed below (covering all the disciplines of Ganpat University), we believe that your expertise and knowledge would make a valuable contribution to the diverse perspectives we aim to showcase during the conference. 1) Technology Integration to ensure happiness Smart Living Environments Educational Technology for Lifelong Learning Cybersecurity and Digital Safety Health Monitoring and Wearables 2) BKS based approaches in Science, Mathematics and Language Integration of BKS in Modern Science Education Vedic Mathematics Sanskrit as a Scientific Language Ayurvedic Science and Traditional Medicine 3) Architectural splendors from past to present Ancient Indian City Planning: Reflecting upon our Past for an Organized Future Indian Temple Architecture: Understanding Monumentality through a SocioculturalLens Forts and Palaces of India: A Representation of Politics in Constructionh The Bhartiya Aspects of Housing in India: A Chronological Study 4) Rich Indian heritage for health and wellness / Ayurveda, Dravyaguna and Panchkarma Mind-Body Connection in Ayurveda Yogic Practices for Wellness Panchakarma Therapy Culinary Wisdom for Wellness 5) Agriculture, Nutrition, and Indian Culture Ancient Agricultural Practices Role of Women in Agriculture Festivals and Harvest Celebrations Challenges and Innovations in Agro-Technology 6) Vedik Indian perspective on Management Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) in Vedic Perspective Timeless Wisdom for Decision-Making Leadership Insights from the Vedas Holistic Employee Well-Being The given clusters are not exhaustive. Any topic in CONSONANCE to the main theme can be considered for participation. We encourage you to participate in the conference by submitting a research paper, poster or article under one of the aforesaid tracks. You may also participate as a delegate to relish the key note addresses, and engaging panel discussions relevant to Bhartiya Knowledge System. This conference provides an excellent platform for networking, knowledge exchange, and collaboration among academia and industry professionals. For detailed information regarding the conference themes, submission guidelines, and registration process, please refer to the attached event brochure or visit the conference website: https://www.ganpatuniversity.ac.in/bks/home-bks While we solicit your active participation, it is also a humble request to circulate this information to your academia and industry acquaintances for wider publicity and unprecedented response. Thank you, Organizing Team, International Conference on BKS Apply Now For Details Contact @ Student Section at Your Institute / Department / Centre, Ganpat University, Ganpat Vidyanagar – 384012 | Mob. No. +91 8100 61 61 61 | Not interested? Unsubscribe here you will not get any correspondences from Institute related to your application process once unsubscribed. During the session, we delved into a detailed discussion on the Program, roles and responsibilities, and the way forward.  For those who were unable to attend the session, you can access the recording by clicking here .  We kindly ask all the POCs to share the student and faculty nominations through this form as a “Registered Coordinator” by 28 June 2024.  The Phase 1: 2-day Activation Workshop for students and faculty to learn about XR and the metaverse, is scheduled to start on 2 July 2024. The timetable along with RSVP form will be directly shared to the provided Email addresses of the nominees of the Program. So, kindly ensure correct Email addresses are sent in the list.  Should you have any queries regarding the Program, you may contact us directly via Email, Phone or WhatsApp.  We eagerly anticipate your participation.  Thank you! subject: AICTE Internship Certified by CISCO, META, IBM to Kick Start your  Journey !!
content: *Dear Students of **CHARUSAT**.*  Teachnook is conducting an *AICTE APPROVED* Internship for STUDENTS, Kindly go through this join the group, and fill out the form ASAP. Register before Slots get filled.    *Greetings!*  *We are pleased to share that our company is collaborating with INSTITUTION to offer a unique 2-month Training + Internship  Program. This advanced program will provide you with the practical skills that you need to enhance your career.*   We are enrolling only *LIMITED STUDENTS* in the program.    *It is Mandatory for students to fill out the form, if you get shortlisted you will get a call from our HR Team:GOOGLE FORM: https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6 *   *To know more information join in WhatsApp group:*  *https://chat.whatsapp.com/JKAouyKSlFdJ6SJjGoIKOm *   *FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*  *First month: *IIT training has been designed in the form of Live lectures along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login credentials will be provided to students after registration) No Prerequisites Required.  *Second month: *Internship with live mentorship for projects from professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in solving real-world problems.  *Project 1:- *10 individual projects are assigned to each intern, which they must complete with their mentor.  *Project 2:-  *Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a group of 10-12 interns. For each intern particular work will be assigned to them they have to work on it. (Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by the company side itself)  *Here are two types of Sessions we are providing:*  *1. Blended Program/Recorded Sessions: *You will receive recorded sessions, whatever doubts you have you can clear them in live doubt-clearing sessions which will be organized every weekend.  *2. Mentor-led/Live Sessions: *You will be having live Zoom classes after 7 PM for 2 to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well *LMS(Learning Management System)* portal which you will have access to for 6 months.  After Completion of the program, the student shall receive :   [image: ✅] Program completion certificate issued by INSTITUTION and Verified By Wipro DICE ID.  [image: ✅] Co-Branded Internship certificate from Top MNCs.  [image: ✅] Get certified by CISCO, META, IBM, and Microsoft Certified Fundamentals.  [image: ✅] 100% Placement Assistance.  [image: ✅] Access to a growing community.   *Yatharth* *Key Account Manager* *9364102817* *yatharth.sharma@teachnook.com * Dear Students of CHARUSAT . Teachnook is conducting an AICTE APPROVED Internship for STUDENTS, Kindly go through this join the group, and fill out the form ASAP. Register before Slots get filled. Greetings! We are pleased to share that our company is collaborating with INSTITUTION to offer a unique 2-month Training + Internship  Program. This advanced program will provide you with the practical skills that you need to enhance your career. We are enrolling only LIMITED STUDENTS in the program. It is Mandatory for students to fill out the form, if you get shortlisted you will get a call from our HR Team: GOOGLE FORM : https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6 To know more information join in WhatsApp group: https://chat.whatsapp.com/JKAouyKSlFdJ6SJjGoIKOm FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE: First month: IIT training has been designed in the form of Live lectures along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login credentials will be provided to students after registration) No Prerequisites Required. Second month: Internship with live mentorship for projects from professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in solving real-world problems. Project 1:- 10 individual projects are assigned to each intern, which they must complete with their mentor. Project 2:- Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a group of 10-12 interns. For each intern particular work will be assigned to them they have to work on it. (Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by the company side itself) Here are two types of Sessions we are providing: 1. Regards, CP SQUAD CLUB On Sun, Mar 3, 2024 at 6:23 PM CPSQUAD CHARUSAT < cpsqaud@charusat.edu.in > wrote: Dear Students, We hope you are in good health and enthusiastic about the interview process within the club. As you may be aware, we are in the process of selecting new team members for various positions to steer the club to greater heights. We are now excited to welcome you to the interview process. The available positions are as follows: 1. Lead and Co-Lead 2. Technical Team 3. Content Team 4. Graphics and Media Team For the positions of Lead and Co-lead, the selections will be conducted offline . For the other positions, the selection will be conducted online. Interview Dates: Lead and Co-lead: 6th February, 2024 (Wednesday) Other Positions: 7th February, 2024 (Thursday) Venue and timings will be communicated soon. For the interview, we encourage you to come prepared with basic knowledge about the responsibilities of the position you're applying for. Additionally, please bring along any relevant previous work or projects you've undertaken , particularly for positions 2 through 4 (Technical Team, Content Team, Graphic Team, and Social Team). This will provide us with insight into your skills and capabilities. Your unique talents and perspectives will contribute significantly to the club's success, and we are eager to see what you can bring to the table. If you have any questions or concerns regarding the interview process, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. Best regards, CP SQUAD CLUB

subject: Interview for CP Squad Team Selection Process
content: Dear Students,  We hope you are in good health and enthusiastic about the interview process within the club. As you may be aware, we are in the process of selecting new team members for various positions to steer the club to greater heights. We are now excited to welcome you to the interview process.  The available positions are as follows: 1. Lead and Co-Lead 2. Technical Team 3. Content Team 4. Graphics and Media Team  For the positions of *Lead and Co-lead, **the selections will be conducted offline*. For the *other positions, the selection will be conducted online.*    *Interview Dates:Lead and Co-lead: 6th February, 2024 (Wednesday)Other Positions: 7th February, 2024 (Thursday)*  Venue and timings will be communicated soon.  For the interview, we encourage you to come prepared with basic knowledge about the responsibilities of the position you're applying for. Additionally, *please bring along any relevant previous work or projects you've undertaken*, particularly for positions 2 through 4 (Technical Team, Content Team, Graphic Team, and Social Team). This will provide us with insight into your skills and capabilities.  Your unique talents and perspectives will contribute significantly to the club's success, and we are eager to see what you can bring to the table.  If you have any questions or concerns regarding the interview process, please don't hesitate to reach out to us.  Best regards, *CP SQUAD CLUB* Dear Students, We hope you are in good health and enthusiastic about the interview process within the club. For the interview, we encourage you to come prepared with basic knowledge about the responsibilities of the position you're applying for. content: GDSC RCOEM Hey Vansh, Thank you so much for participating in Bappa Ka Prashad 3.0 Contest organized by <> Google                         Developer Student Clubs - RCOEM Chapter. We appreciate you for choosing to start or enhance your coding journey with this contest as a Prashad. Please find attached your certificate. Share your certificates on social media handles using hashtags: #gdsc_rcoem                     #competitive_programming #bkp3.0 Tag us on Social Media: Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/gdsc-rcoem Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gdsc_rcoem We will be organizing more such events in the future. Do follow our social media handles for regular                 updates. See you in the next event. Keep Coding! Regards, <> Google Developer Student Clubs - RCOEM Chapter

content: Dear Students,  A great opportunity is here to get assistance from the university for your idea, proof of concept, or any project you want to pursue. Please discuss the details with me, you can call or WhatsApp me at 9726964512. My seating is in Lab 307. If you have any questions regarding this then also you can come for the discussion.  Dear All, As discussed in the meeting, aware your department faculty and students for SSIP grants and fill the project details by yourself at the given link.   We are planning to conduct pitching for the new phase projects in the Last week of August. So, the link will remain open till 15-8-2024.  --  Dr. Jaimin N Undavia, Associate Professor & Coordinator, CHARUSAT STARTUP AND INNOVATION CELL, Faculty of Computer Science and Applications, CHANGA M: 9426923708, 7283968701 Ext: 5250   --   *Nilesh Kumar Dubey**(PhD)* Assistant Professor, Computer Science and Engineering, Institutional Coordinator of *IQAC*, *CSIC,* *UIIC, IPR* Devang Patel Institute of Advanced Technology & Research  Changa-388421, Gujarat, INDIA. http://www.charusat.ac.in  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). subject: =?UTF-8?q?Guidelines_&_Useful_Resource_Updates_=F0=9F=8C=9F?=
content: View this post on the web at https://gssoc.substack.com/p/guidelines-and-useful-resource-updates  This Newsletter is a guideline for all to get started irrespective of PA’s Contributors & Mentors, Each green square on the contribution GitHub graph represents a day of dedication and hard work. Here are some guidelines to get started.  🌟 Guidelines to Started Step-by-Step Guide. Visit the GSSoC Website: Navigate to the projects section on the GSSoC Website [ https://link.sbstck.com/redirect/a3b08f78-873c-44ff-8b25-0fa600df6cda?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ]. Find Your Match: Browse through the projects and find the one that interests. Start Contributing: This is a tricky part for beginners, watch the video below. [ https://link.sbstck.com/redirect/c288488f-b571-4cdb-adfc-cc8ec5b66ed5?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ] Join our GitHub Organisation  [ https://link.sbstck.com/redirect/95fa11cb-1117-4cb3-bfec-88644b9773f3?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ]to know your mentors, and PA.  For those contributors not yet received confirmation emails: Drop your email ID [ https://link.sbstck.com/redirect/f70c78c5-6901-40ef-8822-6293b8fdb971?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ]. Link to discord server is there on Confirmation mail sent to you.  We know you might have lot of questions to get started, ask your questions below and get GitHub Galaxy Brain Achievement badge. [ https://link.sbstck.com/redirect/9fa9336e-2410-4d0a-b23a-3d8a398ccee4?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ] 🌐 Common FAQs What labels should we check? Look for labels: gssoc, level1, level2, level3. Points Distribution for PRs: Let your PA know if they using wrong label. Every gssoc label PR: 1 point Level1: 10 points Level2: 25 points Level3: 45 points Levels are classified by difficulty and updated on the leader board twice a day, Leader board will be live from May 30. We are onboarding new projects for you to meet the demands, We hope this will increase more issue for you to contribute.  Final Mentors list/Discord channels will be updated once it done.  Maintaining Leader board Position: Focus on contributing to high-difficulty issues (Level1, Level2, Level3) rather than quantity of PRs. Make sure your labels assigned for both issues and PR’s and respective levels else it wont update in Leader board. We have removed few projects from the program due to inactive, If you already contributed to it, your PR will be still counted.  We noticed Leader board spam, Project Admin make sure you assign labels contributor deserve. For GitHub action automation and documentation PR don’t assign label more than level1. If you are stuck with contribution or conflicts mentors are right person to contact. Let us know they are not helping you by flagging the mentor.  [ https://link.sbstck.com/redirect/fce91943-9ec1-4fa6-b97d-8bea9239f330?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ] 🎉 Upcoming Events Event: Weekly Q&A with Program Manager Speaker: Sanjay Viswanathan [ https://link.sbstck.com/redirect/0a340899-84f8-41f9-8e88-c404c0e939f4?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ] Date: 24th May 8:00 PM Location: YouTube Live [ https://link.sbstck.com/redirect/ce5b31bc-1ab3-419e-bcbc-8baa9141c647?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ] Stay tuned for more updates and keep coding! We will send you reminder emails.  🚀 Contribute and Shine! For more tips and strategies on navigating the open-source world, subscribe to our newsletter or connect with program Manager. Let's continue to learn and grow together! Program Manager [ https://link.sbstck.com/redirect/0a340899-84f8-41f9-8e88-c404c0e939f4?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ] GSSOC24  Unsubscribe https://substack.com/redirect/2/eyJlIjoiaHR0cHM6Ly9nc3NvYy5zdWJzdGFjay5jb20vYWN0aW9uL2Rpc2FibGVfZW1haWw_.6RFlcgVovaIUPbmouTedDWsyRwoK0qVJdF9lEzo7H9Q? Subscribe here for more Guidelines & Useful Resource Updates 🌟 Updates to contributor regarding GirlScript Summer of Code (GSSoC) 2024! Girlscript May 23 READ IN APP This Newsletter is a guideline for all to get started irrespective of PA’s Contributors & Mentors, Each green square on the contribution GitHub graph represents a day of dedication and hard work. Here are some guidelines to get started. 🌟 Guidelines to Started Step-by-Step Guide . Visit the GSSoC Website: Navigate to the projects section on the GSSoC Website . Find Your Match: Browse through the projects and find the one that interests. Start Contributing: This is a tricky part for beginners, watch the video below. Join our GitHub Organisation to know your mentors, and PA. For those contributors not yet received confirmation emails: Drop your email ID . Link to discord server is there on Confirmation mail sent to you. We know you might have lot of questions to get started, ask your questions below and get GitHub Galaxy Brain Achievement badge. Ask your Questions 🌐 Common FAQs What labels should we check? Look for labels: gssoc , level1 , level2 , level3 . Points Distribution for PRs: Let your PA know if they using wrong label. Every gssoc label PR: 1 point Level1: 10 points Level2: 25 points Level3: 45 points Levels are classified by difficulty and updated on the leader board twice a day, Leader board will be live from May 30. We are onboarding new projects for you to meet the demands, We hope this will increase more issue for you to contribute. Final Mentors list/Discord channels will be updated once it done. Maintaining Leader board Position: Focus on contributing to high-difficulty issues (Level1, Level2, Level3) rather than quantity of PRs. Make sure your labels assigned for both issues and PR’s and respective levels else it wont update in Leader board. We have removed few projects from the program due to inactive, If you already contributed to it, your PR will be still counted. We noticed Leader board spam, Project Admin make sure you assign labels contributor deserve. For GitHub action automation and documentation PR don’t assign label more than level1. If you are stuck with contribution or conflicts mentors are right person to contact. Let us know they are not helping you by flagging the mentor. 🎉 Upcoming Events Event: Weekly Q&A with Program Manager Speaker: Sanjay Viswanathan Date: 24th May 8:00 PM Location: YouTube Live Stay tuned for more updates and keep coding! We will send you reminder emails. 🚀 Contribute and Shine! For more tips and strategies on navigating the open-source world, subscribe to our newsletter or connect with program Manager. Let's continue to learn and grow together! Program Manager GSSOC24 Like Comment Restack © 2024 Girlscript Cement Rd, Dharampeth, Nagpur, Maharashtra 440010, India Unsubscribe

subject: Announcing Web3Conf India
content: View this post on the web at https://gssoc.substack.com/p/announcing-web3conf-india  Dear Innovators, We’ve got some incredible gifts for you this year! 🎁 We are thrilled to announce that pre-registrations for Hack Web3Conf India are now live on @DoraHacks! This is your chance to win $10,000 and attend the prestigious Web3Conf! 🚀 What makes Web3Conf different this year? 🤔 Phase 1: 🖥️ Virtual Round 💡 Plan and design your groundbreaking Web3 idea. 📸 Submit a presentation and a video explaining your concept. 🔥 Top 10% hackers advance to the next phase. ✅ Network with other innovators and mentors online. 🗓️ Key Dates: Registrations open until 25th July. Submission deadline: 30th July. Results announced: 1st August. Phase 2: 🏝️ Physical Round 🏆 Winners of Phase 1 invited to hack together in Goa. 🌊 ✨ Get hands-on experience and guidance from industry experts. 🤝 Compete for the grand prize in a collaborative environment. Don’t miss out on this incredible opportunity! 🚀 🎉 Upcoming Events on GSSOC Event: Emerging Trends in Cloud-Based Data Engineering Speaker: Venkata Sreeram Date: 15th July 6:00 PM Location: Youtube Live [ https://substack.com/redirect/d04961de-af71-4010-91cd-bb3ba5d1dffb?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ] Stay tuned for more updates and keep coding! For any queries, feel free to reach out at community@girlscript.tech [ mailto:community@girlscript.tech ]. Warm regards, GirlScript Team  Unsubscribe https://substack.com/redirect/2/eyJlIjoiaHR0cHM6Ly9nc3NvYy5zdWJzdGFjay5jb20vYWN0aW9uL2Rpc2FibGVfZW1haWw_.fx28qHYzD-bids42qfE6r9fMGavQ5qdsYjAZEq-xrQo? content: Relive all the excitement from our biggest event Canva ( https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.Note3it1gaozj0PIggVG9lj9gaFRUc4eJ_XLuOvqZr4/47p/1tHStjZ4T_uIm7TTUlypiQ/t0/h001.A-o6AEJN_L7BA3RJsNngRZEd9xUjVJyXhvo2yCqPjHM )      ( https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.Note3it1gaozj0PIggVG9jSYjQmDyWZrqxUXjHgaLPK2PDIIMxy8TQpLSbHfsP7Nfmr-Qzeb4luE22oA6NIoj0_FxeLzq9RmHB6mipxX_Tpnd3n_A0mZILWCojPEpuRV12YBVK6gHi_uY0cEr9CBd7XWvjumJ4GGwctiVYEjg6CnQNIzL_dxIi1zkzMYLy4ePdB8zb8E84LvSjMUIEGYJjnA4VSidS0j2e4-MfwI55tHrESHs1hOkTJocEHtPiEKETVckqKyOt8TncgQB3BHGA/47p/1tHStjZ4T_uIm7TTUlypiQ/t1/h001.3RbNyJRvvb7D3jQxei8RYgYGT9Z9Er1Xx7QuZ6QqnVw )           ( https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.Note3it1gaozj0PIggVG9lj9gaFRUc4eJ_XLuOvqZr4/47p/1tHStjZ4T_uIm7TTUlypiQ/t2/h001.fpi6DnrDZIcuOM2_2BnxKauSsd2bczLH9tS4RZ4Z03E )  **************************************** Catch up on everything from Canva Create ****************************************  That’s officially a wrap on our biggest ever event, Canva Create.  Didn’t get a chance to attend? Don’t worry, you can easily watch recordings of some of the sessions below.  Watch now  ( https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.CfOoif63IrzNhQPL6_V0etfl6msNOoGhqvflgvL-hv0kRgo3OQv0c_QKoWvexmrMWwDCRfilMCzO5vbSEGBLi7SwGDvXFMfkjfxp5LgLFJtlYZ8s7uhUSqNIaSKy68HL/47p/1tHStjZ4T_uIm7TTUlypiQ/t3/h001.0RSg3NKR-wcqHjwWGQB0xTNtWBdiaeRUTdMfHqMw8w0 )  Learning Studio  ( https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.Note3it1gaozj0PIggVG9tZCzu9JMGAxYUjnJaK1fL8UPPNHk3oxkSgbKyIy7IapHRZpMrv1Nlg0ER2FdHS7X_oGLc0_bOkWJd4OmSCfbuXpB3Lz-v3xqqsLsKHwENZtdy0vb4ZyGy_ekUe8yr1ooGbnDUUOubwb0o9pHFtvfAslVGOur_lZIlLd0oLwLXPo/47p/1tHStjZ4T_uIm7TTUlypiQ/t4/h001.YZz493QriU-7-4a23pcg10rDkVzksYTzDhgOgnyXGuU )                Canva Create Sessions  ( https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.CfOoif63IrzNhQPL6_V0etfl6msNOoGhqvflgvL-hv0kRgo3OQv0c_QKoWvexmrMWwDCRfilMCzO5vbSEGBLi7SwGDvXFMfkjfxp5LgLFJtlYZ8s7uhUSqNIaSKy68HL/47p/1tHStjZ4T_uIm7TTUlypiQ/t5/h001.S5CcTXEfWtwUMl-lgaZ3DuJWV6XYo0GSANVj5FWRrZ0 )   *********************************** Check out sessions from every stage ***********************************  Create Stage  ( https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.CfOoif63IrzNhQPL6_V0etfl6msNOoGhqvflgvL-hv0kRgo3OQv0c_QKoWvexmrMWwDCRfilMCzO5vbSEGBLi7SwGDvXFMfkjfxp5LgLFJtlYZ8s7uhUSqNIaSKy68HL/47p/1tHStjZ4T_uIm7TTUlypiQ/t6/h001.4SrMvQoOSSD6VA04o4Jy-T6hmpbZoCq-ex3ZiZdGnKs )   Create Stage ------------  Join intimate and insightful sessions with industry leaders like Bob Iger, Melanie Perkins, and Cameron Adams as they unpack the secrets to building a business and brand as well as what the future of work could look like.  Canva For You Stage  ( https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.CfOoif63IrzNhQPL6_V0etfl6msNOoGhqvflgvL-hv0kRgo3OQv0c_QKoWvexmrMWwDCRfilMCzO5vbSEGBLi7SwGDvXFMfkjfxp5LgLFJtlYZ8s7uhUSqNIaSKy68HL/47p/1tHStjZ4T_uIm7TTUlypiQ/t7/h001.bNc2kYr7SpPtYyQGLp5Me8yv0YBaHSgj7Sf_KEJXazw )   Canva For You Stage  -------------------  Learn how creators, brands, and major organizations like Amazon, Expedia Group, Workday, and OMD use high-impact visuals to share their mission and drive their growth.  Design and Innovation Stage  ( https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.CfOoif63IrzNhQPL6_V0etfl6msNOoGhqvflgvL-hv0kRgo3OQv0c_QKoWvexmrMWwDCRfilMCzO5vbSEGBLi7SwGDvXFMfkjfxp5LgLFJtlYZ8s7uhUSqNIaSKy68HL/47p/1tHStjZ4T_uIm7TTUlypiQ/t8/h001.J-YjezINVC6ExCsiWMlX9reeQ1lrcx2q9HzGBiEc8tk )   Design and Innovation Stage  ---------------------------  Hear from innovative thinkers like Guy Kawasaki, Duncan Clark, and Armin Vit as they lead thought-provoking discussions on data design, branding, and more.  Learning Studio  ( https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.Note3it1gaozj0PIggVG9tZCzu9JMGAxYUjnJaK1fL8UPPNHk3oxkSgbKyIy7IapHRZpMrv1Nlg0ER2FdHS7X_oGLc0_bOkWJd4OmSCfbuXpB3Lz-v3xqqsLsKHwENZtdy0vb4ZyGy_ekUe8yr1ooGbnDUUOubwb0o9pHFtvfAslVGOur_lZIlLd0oLwLXPo/47p/1tHStjZ4T_uIm7TTUlypiQ/t9/h001.mDEXHQAtJ6KONIvFUFM4d_so2it5I7L6MEF1GTcGQxA )   Learning Studio  ---------------  Learn how to harness the power of visual communication using Canva’s AI-powered tools, Visual Suite, and social media hacks.  Watch now  ( https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.CfOoif63IrzNhQPL6_V0etfl6msNOoGhqvflgvL-hv0kRgo3OQv0c_QKoWvexmrMWwDCRfilMCzO5vbSEGBLi7SwGDvXFMfkjfxp5LgLFJtlYZ8s7uhUSqNIaSKy68HL/47p/1tHStjZ4T_uIm7TTUlypiQ/t10/h001.7vUosx7dNRSVwna2BNDz0UvUUasiRAKOuxreQxKibzY )  Learning Studio  ( https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.Note3it1gaozj0PIggVG9tZCzu9JMGAxYUjnJaK1fL8UPPNHk3oxkSgbKyIy7IapHRZpMrv1Nlg0ER2FdHS7X_oGLc0_bOkWJd4OmSCfbuXpB3Lz-v3xqqsLsKHwENZtdy0vb4ZyGy_ekUe8yr1ooGbnDUUOubwb0o9pHFtvfAslVGOur_lZIlLd0oLwLXPo/47p/1tHStjZ4T_uIm7TTUlypiQ/t11/h001.difeBHScG9j4L41VuPmJmuqbJlbEAbQc2_J4udSXUF4 )     ( https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.Note3it1gaozj0PIggVG9lj9gaFRUc4eJ_XLuOvqZr4/47p/1tHStjZ4T_uIm7TTUlypiQ/t12/h001.IwwPSM0aBSI7iHxfV5U-zA-yTVfPBotJAOGYGA6vLEo )  ( https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.Note3it1gaozj0PIggVG9lj9gaFRUc4eJ_XLuOvqZr4/47p/1tHStjZ4T_uIm7TTUlypiQ/t13/h001.Ni3t6iYPjgm53XoxKsV7b6ZxPlpsEfl0j2VkNJG5Zgc )  ( https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.Note3it1gaozj0PIggVG9lj9gaFRUc4eJ_XLuOvqZr4/47p/1tHStjZ4T_uIm7TTUlypiQ/t14/h001.N45WoBCbhaG9hUUfJ2-5eS2x5sbE7tr-ZGeIqYWVRAY )  ( https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.Note3it1gaozj0PIggVG9lj9gaFRUc4eJ_XLuOvqZr4/47p/1tHStjZ4T_uIm7TTUlypiQ/t15/h001.UHj-HICtzD7OqrqCvaBdfMamf606qAktrEMD1W1eLDI )  ( https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.Note3it1gaozj0PIggVG9lj9gaFRUc4eJ_XLuOvqZr4/47p/1tHStjZ4T_uIm7TTUlypiQ/t16/h001.FHVVfe74sLsHaVYSXk70CR3k5lldTRHnPxsET9X6ZCo )        app store  ( https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.Note3it1gaozj0PIggVG9lj9gaFRUc4eJ_XLuOvqZr4/47p/1tHStjZ4T_uIm7TTUlypiQ/t17/h001.8_LecDek2lAXLVjIqOi99JnBC90O-YoCVqtTJCmffIY )    google play ( https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.Note3it1gaozj0PIggVG9lj9gaFRUc4eJ_XLuOvqZr4/47p/1tHStjZ4T_uIm7TTUlypiQ/t18/h001.mIxalVIItWFZtoG3ToLIbaU--1Tu7KXjgmFo9dSxhIA )     Canva Pty Ltd, 110 Kippax St, NSW 2010, Australia. subject: =?UTF-8?Q?Fwd=3A_Request_to_join_Launch_of_AICTE_=2D_ServiceNow_Vi?= 	=?UTF-8?Q?rtual_Internship_Program_2024_on_April_05=2C_2024_=28Friday=29_at_?= 	=?UTF-8?Q?11=3A30_am_onwards=E2=80=93reg?=
content: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: AICTE(no-reply) Date: Thu, Apr 4, 2024 at 3:45 AM Subject: Request to join Launch of AICTE - ServiceNow Virtual Internship Program 2024 on April 05, 2024 (Friday) at 11:30 am onwards–reg To:   Dear Sir/Mam,  Greetings from AICTE..  *AICTE* has partnered with ServiceNow (www.servicenow.com) a cloud-based platform and solutions company that helps digitize and unify organizations so that they can find smarter, faster, better ways to make workflow.  Our collaboration with ServiceNow provides students global and centralized learning, while building future-ready skills and capabilities. The students are provided education path with access to ServiceNow Administrator and Developer courses on the Now Learning platform. Importantly, students will be introduced to emerging AI technologies, providing valuable insights needed by all prospective employees.  *Virtual Internship program* is offered to students under the global program “Rise Up with ServiceNow” to empower young engineers from your institutions with job-ready capabilities.  Join us for the ServiceNow Live webinar, an opportunity to hear and interact.  Speakers(s):     - * Buddha Chandrasekhar - Chief Coordinating Officer, AICTE*    - Bhaskar Gandhavadi - Director, ServiceNow  Time & Date:*11.30 am, Friday 5th APRIL 2024*  Log in / Webinar Registration: https://zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_q-YOki5_TzefpeVXJ0nRVA#/registration  It is requested to encourage your students/faculty members/ TPO to join this free virtual learning journey.  For any further support, please contact support@thesmartbridge.com  *With Regards,* *Dr. Buddha Chandrasekhar,* *Chief Coordinating Officer,* *AICTE HQs, New Delhi* *011-29581423* *internship@aicte-india.org *  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon  this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient  is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, or the  employee, or agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended  recipient and/or if you have received this in error, please contact the  sender and delete the material from the computer or device. CHARUSAT does  not take any liability or responsibility for any malicious codes/software  and/or viruses/Trojan horses that may have been picked up during the  transmission of this message. By opening and solely relying on the contents  or part thereof this message, and taking action thereof, the recipient  relieves the CHARUSAT of all the liabilities including any damages done to  the recipient's pc/laptop/peripherals and other communication devices due  to any reason. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: AICTE(no-reply) < noreply12@aicte-india.org > Date: Thu, Apr 4, 2024 at 3:45 AM Subject: Request to join Launch of AICTE - ServiceNow Virtual Internship Program 2024 on April 05, 2024 (Friday) at 11:30 am onwards–reg To: Dear Sir/Mam, Greetings from AICTE.. subject: TRAINING & INTERNSHIP FOR CHARUSAT STUDENTS
content: *EMPOWERING FUTURE INNOVATORS: TRAINING & INTERNSHIP FOR CHARUSAT STUDENTS.*                     [image: hand-holding-glowing-brain-technology-background.jpg]    [image: 2150905287.jpg]  *TEACHNOOK*, in partnership with (*COGNIZANCE*) *IIT* *ROORKEE*, is thrilled to announce an exclusive 2-month training and internship program designed by industrial mentors. We have a limited number of slots available for enrollment in our program. Secure your slot today before they're all filled!                            [image: 2149901783.jpg]   [image: 4019.jpg]  *Program Highlights: *  Gain real-world experience in cutting-edge technologies with our Tech Domain Internship. Work alongside industry experts on live projects, sharpen your programming skills, and learn the latest trends in AI, ML, IoT, and more. Collaborate with a dynamic team, solve complex problems, and innovate solutions that make a difference. Get hands-on with industry-standard tools and technologies, preparing you for a successful career in the tech industry.   *To ensure your participation and make the most out of this opportunity, please make sure to fill out the application form: *            Application form: *https://forms.gle/RPMmwLY5KwDwLRGe *   *Program promises:*      - *36+ hours of live training*    - *10+ live hands-on Minor project*    - *1 live capstone project*    - *Live doubt-clearing sessions*    - *Mentors from the market tech giants*    - *Cutting-edge Curriculum*          [image: 388.jpg]                       [image: 16406277_rm373-banner-02-s88.jpg]  *Internship: *  Provides practical experience with 10+ live projects alongside the training program. Projects challenge students to apply learned skills in real-world situations. The capstone project, integrated into the final week of the internship, requires students to apply all learned skills and knowledge.    *Certificate of Training and Internship Completion:*     - *Course Completion Certificate from COGNIZANCE IIT ROORKEE.*    - *Internship Completion Certificate from Top MNCs.*    - *Includes Wipro Dice ID verified Certification.*                                         [image: WhatsApp Image 2024-03-04 at 18.48.35 (1).jpeg]              [image: WhatsApp Image 2024-01-20 at 13.58.19 (1).jpeg] *Perks/Benefits:*     - *Letter of Recommendation.*    - *PPO(Pre Placement Offer Opportunities).*    - *Resume Building Training.*    - *Interview Preparations.*    - *Growth Community Access for further Opportunities*.                                                                   [image: WhatsApp Image 2024-03-19 at 00.58.46.jpeg]   *     We look forward to your active participation in the Training and Internship Program under TEACHNOOK IN COLLABORATION WITH COGNIZANCE IIT ROORKEE. This is an excellent chance for you to broaden your horizons and take a step towards a successful career. For any inquiries or assistance, feel free to contact us.*    *Best regards,* EMPOWERING FUTURE INNOVATORS: TRAINING & INTERNSHIP FOR CHARUSAT STUDENTS. TEACHNOOK , in partnership with ( COGNIZANCE ) IIT ROORKEE , is thrilled to announce an exclusive 2-month training and internship program designed by industrial mentors. We have a limited number of slots available for enrollment in our program. Secure your slot today before they're all filled! Program Highlights: Gain real-world experience in cutting-edge technologies with our Tech Domain Internship. Work alongside industry experts on live projects, sharpen your programming skills, and learn the latest trends in AI, ML, IoT, and more. Collaborate with a dynamic team, solve complex problems, and innovate solutions that make a difference. Get hands-on with industry-standard tools and technologies, preparing you for a successful career in the tech industry. To ensure your participation and make the most out of this opportunity, please make sure to fill out the application form: Application form : https://forms.gle/RPMmwLY5KwDwLRGe Program promises: 36+ hours of live training 10+ live hands-on Minor project 1 live capstone project Live doubt-clearing sessions Mentors from the market tech giants Cutting-edge Curriculum Internship: Provides practical experience with 10+ live projects alongside the training program. Projects challenge students to apply learned skills in real-world situations. The capstone project, integrated into the final week of the internship, requires students to apply all learned skills and knowledge. Certificate of Training and Internship Completion: Course Completion Certificate from COGNIZANCE IIT ROORKEE. Internship Completion Certificate from Top MNCs. Includes Wipro Dice ID verified Certification. Perks/Benefits: Letter of Recommendation. PPO(Pre Placement Offer Opportunities). Resume Building Training. Interview Preparations. Growth Community Access for further Opportunities . We look forward to your active participation in the Training and Internship Program under TEACHNOOK IN COLLABORATION WITH COGNIZANCE IIT ROORKEE . This is an excellent chance for you to broaden your horizons and take a step towards a successful career. For any inquiries or assistance, feel free to contact us. Best regards,

subject: CHARUSAT Education Expo: Transportation Requirement
content: Dear Aspirant / Student / Visitor    We would like to welcome you to Amul Presents ‘CHARUSAT EDUCATION EXPO’. As you have shown interest to be part of the Expo, we would like to request you to please avail the services of the Free Transportation facility. We have arranged Free Transportation Facility from the following locations:    ·         Ahmedabad (Multiple Pick-up points available)  ·         Vadodara (Multiple Pick-up points available)  ·         Anand via V V Nagar, Bakrol, Vadtal (Multiple Pick-up points available)  ·         Thasra via Dakor, Nadiad (Multiple Pick-up points available)  ·         Khambhat / Dharmaj / Petlad (Multiple Pick-up points available)    You are requested to please *click here* to register yourself on or before April 23, 2024, to avail the facility (The detailed Departure Time and Pick-up Points are listed in the Form)     *Free Transportation Facility will not be available if you do not register. No need to fillup the form in case transportation is not required.*    With Regards,     CHARUSAT University  CHANGA    *Note: Bus will return only after the end of the last programme of the day (Preferably after 09:00 PM)* Dear Aspirant / Student / Visitor We would like to welcome you to Amul Presents ‘CHARUSAT EDUCATION EXPO’. As you have shown interest to be part of the Expo, we would like to request you to please avail the services of the Free Transportation facility. subject: Fwd: Standard Normal Z - Table
content: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Jignesh Chauhan Date: Wed, Apr 10, 2024 at 1:03 PM Subject: Standard Normal Z - Table To:  Dear Students,  Kindly find herewith the attached "Standard Normal Z-table (Area between 0 and z)" used in Normal distribution (Unit-6) and keep the printout available with you. subject: =?UTF-8?Q?Fwd=3A_Participation_in_Live_WEBINAR_on_SWAYAM_Plus_on?= 	=?UTF-8?Q?_13th_May=2C_2024_at_10=2E00_AM_onwards_=E2=80=93_Regarding?=
content: From: Principal DEPSTAR Date: Wed, May 8, 2024 at 9:06 AM Subject: Fwd: Participation in Live WEBINAR on SWAYAM Plus on 13th May, 2024 at 10.00 AM onwards – Regarding To: Depstar     ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: AICTE(no-reply) Date: Mon, May 6, 2024 at 4:50 PM Subject: Participation in Live WEBINAR on SWAYAM Plus on 13th May, 2024 at 10.00 AM onwards – Regarding To: To   *Sub:Participation in Live WEBINAR on SWAYAM Plus on 13th May, 2024 at 10.00 AM onwards – Regarding*  Sir/Madam,  As you are aware, in alignment with NEP 2020, the Ministry of Education has launched SWAYAM Plus on 27th February, 2024 in collaboration with leading industry players and ed‐tech companies to bring employability and professional development‐focused programs to its learners. SWAYAM Plus has been designed to have  programmes in chosen sectors, namely-Manufacturing, Energy, Computer Science & Engineering/IT/ITES, Management Studies, Teacher Education, Healthcare, Hospitality & Tourism, Social Science, Indian Knowledge Systems, Media, Communication, etc.  The main aim of the SWAYAM Plus is to build an ecosystem for all stakeholders in professional and career development, including learners, course providers, industry, academia, and strategic partners with High‐quality learning and certification programs from the best industry and academia at affordable costs.  The Platform is also employment‐focused programs imparting future skills in chosen domains and to reach a large learner base by catering to learning across the country, with a focus on reaching learners from tier 2 and 3 towns with flexible offerings based on learner needs – across chosen disciplines with options to learn through resources in vernacular languages. More than 1,30,000+ Learners have already explored SWAYAM Plus.  A live Webinar on SWAYAM Plus has been scheduled on 13th May, 2024 at 10.00 AM onwards.  You are requested to attend the “Live Webinar on SWAYAM Plus with Shri Govind Jaiswal, Joint Secretary, Department of Higher Education and Prof. V. Kamakoti, Director, IIT, Madras.  You are further requested to please give wide publicity to the above among all faculty and students of your Institute and register on the QR code attached herewith provided in the poster to attend Live Webinar on 13th May, 2024 at 10.00 AM onwards.   PFA:- https://drive.google.com/file/d/10IxW7NIwQs1eJr2OMHPBjbJRwLVidL3J/view?usp=sharing   *With regards* *(e-Governance)* *All India Council for Technical Education* *Nelson Mandela road, Vasant kunj * *New Delhi-110070*  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon  this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient  is strictly prohibited. subject: Fwd: AIESEC Exchange Opportunity in Poland
content: Thanks & Regards,  *Corporate Communication Officer* [image: ] : www.charusat.ac.in [image: ] : *https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PdpuaQNgDSc&t=85s * [image: My account - Activating your personal WhatsApp link] ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Parshwa Salot Date: Wed, Mar 27, 2024 at 12:46 PM Subject: AIESEC Exchange Opportunity in Poland To: [image: image] Looking for a life-changing experience in Poland ?  [image: image]   Register Now! [image: image] What are you doing this summer ?  Apply to become a Global Volunteer! A 45days of wonderful experience, a Certificate from United Nations to boost your CV! Know More! Register Now! [image: image] Warsaw's Old Town  Despite wartime destruction, Warsaw's Old Town has been meticulously reconstructed to its former glory. Wander through cobblestone streets lined with colorful townhouses, visit the Royal Castle, and soak in the vibrant atmosphere of Market Square. [image: image] Gdansk's Main Town  The heart of Gdansk's historic district, Main Town enchants visitors with its picturesque streets, Renaissance architecture, and bustling marketplaces. Don't miss the towering spire of St. Mary's Church and the iconic Neptune Fountain. [image: image] Malbork Castle  As one of the largest brick castles in the world, Malbork Castle is a testament to Poland's medieval heritage. Explore its vast fortifications, grand halls, and Gothic architecture, which transport visitors back in time to the era of the Teutonic Knights.   Register Now! Skill Enhancement: Students will solve real-world problems, enhancing their coding and problem-solving skills. Networking Opportunities: Participants will have the chance to connect with industry professionals and like-minded peers. Prizes and Recognition: Winners will receive cash rewards and recognition from Odoo. Career Growth: Outstanding participants may receive internship and job opportunities with Odoo and its partners. Attached is a flyer with more details about the competition that you can share with your student community. subject: Fwd: to participate in Odoo Combat 2024 - National Level Coding Challenge
content: Dear Students,   We are excited to announce the Odoo Combat 2024, a national coding challenge designed to identify and celebrate the brightest young minds in the field of software development.  This event, hosted by Odoo, is an excellent opportunity for students to showcase their coding skills, learn from industry experts, and win exciting prizes. We are expecting 1000+ finest minds of India to participate in this event.   Odoo Combat 2024 Details     - Dates: 29-30 June 2024    - Location: Odoo IN Pvt Ltd, Infocity,    Gandhinagar, Gujarat - Registration Link:Odoo Combat 2024 Registration Why participate?     1. Skill Enhancement: Students will solve real-world problems, enhancing    their coding and problem-solving skills.    2. Networking Opportunities: Participants will have the chance to    connect with industry professionals and like-minded peers.    3. Career Growth: Outstanding participants may receive internship and    job opportunities with Odoo and its partners.   Who can participate?  This competition is open to all students and fresh graduates in India with a passion for coding and technology. subject: Hackathon Phase 1 Office Hours and Rule Changes! - Microsoft Developers AI  Learning Hackathon
content: ( http://devpost.com )  We've noticed some of you are encountering challenges in Phase 1 of the hackathon so we're hosting two Discord Office Hours sessions featuring a Microsoft Learn team member.   * May 6 from 3PM - 4PM ET * May 13 from 8:30AM - 9:30AM ET * Join our Devpost Discord here ( https://discord.gg/HP4BhW3hnp ) and then check into the microsoftdevelopersailearninghackathon-checkin channel to get access  * You may need to go into Channels & Roles > Browse Channels to follow the hackathon specific channels.  These sessions will address your Phase 1 questions, ensuring you can submit to Phase 1 and help you transition into Phase 2.  Key points to be covered: -------------------------  * Navigating Learning Modules: Learn tips to progress through the modules. * Submission Requirements: Understand what is required to submit an eligible submission. * Overcoming VM Roadblocks: Gain insights into troubleshooting Open AI API access challenges within the VM.  In the meantime, if you still find yourself stuck on the Labs segment of the modules, we've got a pro tip for you. We encourage you to still request Open AI API access ( https://customervoice.microsoft.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=v4j5cvGGr0GRqy180BHbR7en2Ais5pxKtso_Pz4b1_xUNTZBNzRKNlVQSFhZMU9aV09EVzYxWFdORCQlQCN0PWcu ) however, if you encounter difficulties, proceed by clicking through the modules and then refer to the developer guide. The developer guide will also allow you to complete similar exercises covered in the Learn modules and you can leverage the proxy site for the Azure OpenAI API access.   We also have important updates regarding the rules! ---------------------------------------------------  We heard your concerns and now providing screenshots of completion emails from the learning modules is optional. Simply share your Microsoft Learn username, and we'll verify your module completion status.  Thank you for participating and we can’t wait to see what you’ve come up with in Phase 2! Don’t forget to save the date for Office Hours – we’ll see you there!  You received this email because you signed up for Microsoft Developers AI Learning Hackathon. If you're no longer participating, you can unregister here ( https://azurecosmosdb.devpost.com/ ).  © 2024 Devpost, Inc. All rights reserved. Unsubscribe from these notifications ( https://devpost.com/notification_subscriptions/1KcgPg0OAsGJvKeu8JQeVA ) We've noticed some of you are encountering challenges in Phase 1 of the hackathon so we're hosting two Discord Office Hours sessions featuring a Microsoft Learn team member. May 6 from 3PM - 4PM ET May 13 from 8:30AM - 9:30AM ET Join our Devpost Discord here and then check into the microsoftdevelopersailearninghackathon-checkin channel to get access You may need to go into Channels & Roles > Browse Channels to follow the hackathon specific channels. These sessions will address your Phase 1 questions, ensuring you can submit to Phase 1 and help you transition into Phase 2. Key points to be covered: Navigating Learning Modules: Learn tips to progress through the modules. Submission Requirements: Understand what is required to submit an eligible submission. Overcoming VM Roadblocks: Gain insights into troubleshooting Open AI API access challenges within the VM. In the meantime, if you still find yourself stuck on the Labs segment of the modules, we've got a pro tip for you. We encourage you to still request Open AI API access however, if you encounter difficulties, proceed by clicking through the modules and then refer to the developer guide. The developer guide will also allow you to complete similar exercises covered in the Learn modules and you can leverage the proxy site for the Azure OpenAI API access. We also have important updates regarding the rules! We heard your concerns and now providing screenshots of completion emails from the learning modules is optional . Simply share your Microsoft Learn username, and we'll verify your module completion status. Thank you for participating and we can’t wait to see what you’ve come up with in Phase 2! Don’t forget to save the date for Office Hours – we’ll see you there! You received this email because you signed up for Microsoft Developers AI Learning Hackathon. If you're no longer participating, you can unregister here . © 2024 Devpost, Inc. All rights reserved. Unsubscribe from these notifications

content: View this post on the web at https://gssoc.substack.com/p/introducing-customized-badges  Dear Contributors, We're back with another exciting surprise for you! 🎁 We’re thrilled to announce the launch of our latest feature: Customized Badges! 🏅🎉 With this new update, contributors working on open-source projects can now create and personalise badges to highlight their achievements, contributions, and milestones. This feature lets you showcase your hard work and get noticed by potential connections on OPN. Key Features: ✨Shareable: Easily share your badges on social media and other platforms. ✨Customizable: Make your badges truly yours with personalised designs. How to Get Started? Navigate to the Leaderboard: Leaderboard Link [ https://substack.com/redirect/f3e2c2ec-8f6b-4c2e-8e24-1163952d019b?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ] Hover over your score to view your badges. 🏅 Click on a badge to download and share it as an image. Share your badge on LinkedIn, Twitter, or your GitHub Readme profile! Giveaway Alert: The first 1000 people to share their badges on social media will receive free XYZ domain coupons plus a free subscription to the Wireframe app. Details of Giveaway: Giveaway Link [ https://substack.com/redirect/e98edbff-3b70-441f-91be-818f95db67c2?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ] Leaderboard: Leaderboard Link [ https://substack.com/redirect/f3e2c2ec-8f6b-4c2e-8e24-1163952d019b?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ] Explanation Video: Watch Here [ https://substack.com/redirect/1b1db058-05b1-4024-92a2-7561e6aba2f7?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ]. 🎉 Upcoming Events on GSSOC Event: GitHub Profile Review Session #2 Speaker: Sanjay Viswanathan [ https://substack.com/redirect/65d92711-2bbd-4ac7-8590-e792386f84c6?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ] Date: 21st July 7:00 PM Location: Youtube Live [ https://substack.com/redirect/6a8a88ca-c4cc-4eda-acc9-dc194f01b472?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ] We’d love to hear your thoughts and feedback on this new feature. Feel free to share your experiences and suggestions below. 💬 Thank you for being a part of this amazing community. Happy customizing! 🎨 Stay tuned for more updates, and keep coding!  For any queries, feel free to reach out at community@girlscript.tech. Warm regards, Sanjay Viswanathan [ https://substack.com/redirect/438caf3f-0f3f-4e0c-8d4b-f77472a8fb44?j=eyJ1IjoiM3Yxd3RxIn0.pS6nfe3axVnbdKqBjOVXmoGAY01Y5n5tFxjxFZEfFWU ] Program Manager  Unsubscribe https://substack.com/redirect/2/eyJlIjoiaHR0cHM6Ly9nc3NvYy5zdWJzdGFjay5jb20vYWN0aW9uL2Rpc2FibGVfZW1haWw_.YILo0-frCRrrVMdJEHL7LZsBDt7wFGtm8VYHcpH_jIg? subject: DEPSTAR_B.Tech CSE_ Sem - 2_May 2024 Examination _List of Toppers
content: Dear Students,  It brings me immense joy to extend my heartfelt congratulations to each one of you on your remarkable performance in the recent *Sem-2 B.Tech CSE University exams.*  Please find attached a* list of toppers *in the recent examination.  As you move forward in your academic pursuits, remember that *learning is a continuous journey*, and your thirst for knowledge will undoubtedly lead you to even greater heights. I am excited to see the positive impact you will make in the field of Computer Science and Engineering.  *Best wishes!!!* *Notes: *     - To decide the rank, the recent semester's SGPA was considered.    - In case students have an equal SGPA then overall performance till    semester -2 (CGPA) was considered.    - In case students have an equal CGPA then marks in the Theory    examinations were considered.  Please get in touch with the undersigned if you have any questions.  Thanks & regards,  *Mr. Hardik Parmar* Assistant Professor, Department of Computer Science & Engineering, Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR),  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). content: *Thanks and Regards,* *RADHIKA H. PATEL* *Assistant Professor* *Department of Information Technology* *DEPSTAR,* *CHARUSAT, Changa*        ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: AWS Cloud Club CHARUSAT Date: Thu, Feb 29, 2024 at 1:08 PM Subject: 🌟You are invited!🚀 Join Us for an Exciting AWS Workshop - Infrastructure Camp To: <20dce@charusat.edu.in>, <20dit@charusat.edu.in>, <20ce@charusat.edu.in>, <20cs@charusat.edu.in>, <20it@charusat.edu.in>, <20bca@charusat.edu.in>, < 20bscit@charusat.edu.in>, <20ec@charusat.edu.in>, <21bca@charusat.edu.in>, < 21bscit@charusat.edu.in>, <21ce@charusat.edu.in>, <21cs@charusat.edu.in>, < 21dce@charusat.edu.in>, <21dit@charusat.edu.in>, <21ec@charusat.edu.in>, < 21it@charusat.edu.in>, <22bca@charusat.edu.in>, <22bscit@charusat.edu.in>, < 22ce@charusat.edu.in>, <22cs@charusat.edu.in>, <22dce@charusat.edu.in>, < 22dit@charusat.edu.in>, <22it@charusat.edu.in>, <20dcs@charusat.edu.in>, < 22aiml@charusat.edu.in>, <23aiml@charusat.edu.in> Cc: Parth Shah , Sanket Suthar < sanketsuthar.it@charusat.ac.in>, , < mayurbhatti.it@gmail.com>, <20it062@charusat.edu.in>, < 20it116@charusat.edu.in>, Sandip Patel , < 20cs036@charusat.edu.in>, Principal C.S.Patel Institute of Technology < principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in>, Minal Patel , Principal DPTR , Chirag Patel < chiragpatel.dce@charusat.ac.in>, Radhika Patel < RADHIKAPATEL.IT@charusat.ac.in>, Ritesh Patel , Dipak Ramoliya , Head IT CHARUSAT < hod.it@charusat.ac.in>, Dharmendra Patel , Head CE CHARUSAT , Dweepna Garg < dweepnagarg.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Ashwin Makwana < ashwinmakwana.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Amit Nayak , Amit Thakkar , , < dnnair@amazon.com>, , , Nirav Bhatt *Hello AWS Enthusiasts👋*  Are you ready to dive into the world of AWS? Whether you're new to the cloud or an experienced professional, our upcoming workshop organized by *AWS Cloud Club CHARUSAT*, *"Infrastructure Camp,"* is designed to equip you with the knowledge and skills needed to deploy AWS services effectively.  Join us for an interactive workshop focusing on AWS, suitable for both beginners and experienced professionals.   Benefit from expert guidance and insights from *Shashank Chinchili, Champion Technical Trainer at Amazon Web Services with 8X AWS certifications*. Connect with peers and professionals, expand your professional network, and exchange ideas in a collaborative setting.   Don't miss this opportunity to deepen your expertise in AWS. Reserve your spot today and embark on a journey to mastering *AWS Infrastructure Camp*!   *Workshop Details:-* Date: 4th March 2024  Time: 10 AM to 3 PM  Venue: Charotar University of Science and Technology   *Please note that the exact location of the workshop within the campus will be mailed to the registered participants only.* Click here We look forward to welcoming you to *Infrastructure Camp!*  For any queries contact:  Viraj Patoliya (Captain): +91 9714597273  Jay Lakhani (Captain): +91 9979748872  Khushi Minipara (Tech Advisor): +91 9157919087  Regards, *AWS Cloud Club CHARUSAT* *Instagram || LinkedIn || **Meetup* --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Infrastructure Camp To:  < 20dce@charusat.edu.in >,  < 20dit@charusat.edu.in >,  < 20ce@charusat.edu.in >,  < 20cs@charusat.edu.in >,  < 20it@charusat.edu.in >,  < 20bca@charusat.edu.in >,  < 20bscit@charusat.edu.in >,  < 20ec@charusat.edu.in >,  < 21bca@charusat.edu.in >,  < 21bscit@charusat.edu.in >,  < 21ce@charusat.edu.in >,  < 21cs@charusat.edu.in >,  < 21dce@charusat.edu.in >,  < 21dit@charusat.edu.in >,  < 21ec@charusat.edu.in >,  < 21it@charusat.edu.in >,  < 22bca@charusat.edu.in >,  < 22bscit@charusat.edu.in >,  < 22ce@charusat.edu.in >,  < 22cs@charusat.edu.in >,  < 22dce@charusat.edu.in >,  < 22dit@charusat.edu.in >,  < 22it@charusat.edu.in >,  < 20dcs@charusat.edu.in >,  < 22aiml@charusat.edu.in >,  < 23aiml@charusat.edu.in > Cc: Parth Shah < parthshah.ce@charusat.ac.in >, Sanket Suthar < sanketsuthar.it@charusat.ac.in >,  < harshviradia1491@gmail.com >,  < mayurbhatti.it@gmail.com >,  < 20it062@charusat.edu.in >,  < 20it116@charusat.edu.in >, Sandip Patel < sandippatel872@gmail.com >,  < 20cs036@charusat.edu.in >, Principal C.S.Patel Institute of Technology < principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in >, Minal Patel < minalpatel.dce@charusat.ac.in >, Principal DPTR < principal.dptr@charusat.ac.in >, Chirag Patel < chiragpatel.dce@charusat.ac.in >, Radhika Patel < RADHIKAPATEL.IT@charusat.ac.in >, Ritesh Patel < riteshpatel.ce@charusat.ac.in >, Dipak Ramoliya < dipakramoliya.ce@charusat.ac.in >, Head IT CHARUSAT < hod.it@charusat.ac.in >, Dharmendra Patel < dharmendrapatel.mca@charusat.ac.in >, Head CE CHARUSAT < hod.ce@charusat.ac.in >, Dweepna Garg < dweepnagarg.ce@charusat.ac.in >, Ashwin Makwana < ashwinmakwana.ce@charusat.ac.in >, Amit Nayak < amitnayak.it@charusat.ac.in >, Amit Thakkar < amitthakkar.it@charusat.ac.in >,  < jelooper@amazon.com >,  < dnnair@amazon.com >,  < curtevan@amazon.com >,  < schinchl@amazon.com >, Nirav Bhatt < niravbhatt.it@charusat.ac.in > Hello AWS Enthusiasts👋 Are you ready to dive into the world of AWS? Whether you're new to the cloud or an experienced professional, our upcoming workshop organized by AWS Cloud Club CHARUSAT , "Infrastructure Camp," is designed to equip you with the knowledge and skills needed to deploy AWS services effectively. Join us for an interactive workshop focusing on AWS, suitable for both beginners and experienced professionals. Benefit from expert guidance and insights from Shashank Chinchili, Champion Technical Trainer at Amazon Web Services with 8X AWS certifications . Connect with peers and professionals, expand your professional network, and exchange ideas in a collaborative setting. Don't miss this opportunity to deepen your expertise in AWS. Reserve your spot today and embark on a journey to mastering AWS Infrastructure Camp ! Workshop Details:- Date: 4th March 2024 Time: 10 AM to 3 PM Venue: Charotar University of Science and Technology Please note that the exact location of the workshop within the campus will be mailed to the registered participants only. Click here We look forward to welcoming you to Infrastructure Camp! For any queries contact: Viraj Patoliya (Captain): +91 9714597273 Jay Lakhani (Captain): +91 9979748872 Khushi Minipara (Tech Advisor): +91 9157919087 Regards, AWS Cloud Club CHARUSAT Instagram || LinkedIn || Meetup DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). subject: =?UTF-8?Q?Fwd=3A_AICTE_=E2=80=93_MIC_=26_IIT_Kharagpur_=2D_Registration_ar?= 	=?UTF-8?Q?e_Open_for_the_Swayam_course_=E2=80=98Introduction_to_Intellectual?= 	=?UTF-8?Q?_Property=E2=80=99=2E?=
content: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: AICTE(no-reply) Date: Tue, Jul 9, 2024 at 3:47 PM Subject: AICTE – MIC & IIT Kharagpur - Registration are Open for the Swayam course ‘Introduction to Intellectual Property’. To:  Dear Sir/ Madam,  Greetings from MoE’s Innovation Cell!  In continuation to its efforts towards spreading IP literacy across the country, Innovation Cell of Ministry of Education, Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur and AICTE has developed an online course ‘Introduction to Intellectual Property’.  It is a 12-week course developed by best-in-field instructors and comprises of workshops, tutorials, weekly assignments, quizzes and mini-project. Learner may also take a proctored exam at the end of the course in case he/ she wishes to earn academic credits and certificate (3- Credits) for it.  * Registration is Free and open to all. Sign-up now to enrol for this course at *https://onlinecourses.swayam2.ac.in/aic24_ge21/preview  *The course will start from 1st July 2024*. We will keep posting updates to all enrolled learners.  *Objectives*  This course is created with an objective to introduce a very important area, that is intellectual property. After doing this course, learner will:     1. Know concept of intellectual property (IP)    2. Appreciate the nature, scope and different types of IPs, its    different utilities and approaches followed to get various benefits    3. Understand the rationale and importance of IP in knowledge economy    4. Be introduced to practical aspects of intellectual property  *Who can register:*  Students (pursuing/ completed graduation, post-graduation, 12th), Teachers, Faculty, Engineers, Researchers, Professors, Academic coordinators, Principal, Vice-Principals of Schools, Start-up Founders, Incubation Managers, PhD Scholars, IP professionals, lawyers and any professional who wants to understand Intellectual property and its real-life aspects.  *Enclosed is a banner with a registration QR code.* *Please circulate it to your colleagues/ students/ professionals/ reseacrhers, so that maximum number of learners get benefit from it and understand various aspects of Intellectual Property.*  For any technical support related to registration, completion certificate, etc., write at aicteswayam@aicte-india.org or call at 011 2958 1202  PFA: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hEHLdSH3Ilao-EBDRPPcntQi8NkScLVL/view?usp=sharing   *Thanks and Regards,*  *Dr. Elangovan KariappanAssistant Innovation Director,* *Program Incharge - Kalam Program for IP Literacy and Awareness (KAPILA)* *MoE's Innovation Cell, New Delhi* *Contact No. 011-2958 1337* *Join our Telegram Group for more updates - https://t.me/+SljAoMOwrF0wMDNl * *Website: https://kapila.mic.gov.in/ *  --    DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar  University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon  this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient  is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, or the  employee, or agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended  recipient and/or if you have received this in error, please contact the  sender and delete the material from the computer or device. CHARUSAT does  not take any liability or responsibility for any malicious codes/software  and/or viruses/Trojan horses that may have been picked up during the  transmission of this message. By opening and solely relying on the contents  or part thereof this message, and taking action thereof, the recipient  relieves the CHARUSAT of all the liabilities including any damages done to  the recipient's pc/laptop/peripherals and other communication devices due  to any reason. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: AICTE(no-reply) Date: Tue, Jul 9, 2024 at 3:47 PM Subject: AICTE – MIC & IIT Kharagpur - Registration are Open for the Swayam course ‘Introduction to Intellectual Property’. subject: Keep the Momentum Going - Microsoft Developers AI Learning Hackathon
content: Hi 23DCS056  Now that you have registered for the Microsoft Developers AI Learning Hackathon , it is time to start thinking about your project!  Here are a few places to get started if you haven't done so already:  1.) Join the Discord Server and check-in to the hackathon to post technical questions, learn, share, and support each other.  2.) Looking to form a team? If you want to work in a team to create your project, navigate over to the participants tab and search for other participants looking for teammates. You can message them right from the platform!  3.) Check out the Resources Tab to:     - Take a look at the technical resources    - Find inspiration in the example and previous challenge submissions  4.) Check out the special Learning Journey tab to get the most out of this hackathon!  If you have any hackathon questions, please feel free to reach out via the Hackathon Discussion Forum!  Happy Building!  Best, Cassie  Devpost 222 Broadway New York, NY 10038  Want to learn more about hackathons? Join our Discord server !  I always try to personalize the information you receive to only include competitions that fit your interests; however, if you'd prefer to not receive emails about them, please click here to let me know! subject: MATLAB and Simulink Software for Minidrone Competition India 2024 -  CHARUSAT;CHARUSAT    [ ref:!00Di00Ha1u.!5003q01fRFd7:ref ]
content: Hello Vansh Malani,  I am pleased to inform you that your MathWorks license has been created. Please share this information with your team members.  License Number: 41223329 Activation Key: 11945-55162-13602-06534-11310  Submit models by 5 PM, 14-Aug-2024 ET. Round 2 qualifiers notified by 5 PM, 04-Sept-2024 ET at Indian Institute Of Science, Bangalore, Karnataka- 560012, India on 27-28 Sept-2024.  To use MATLAB software you need to associate your MathWorks account with a license, download the software, install the software, and finally activate the software. Please forward this email to additional team members and ask them to follow the same process as above.  Follow our Instagram channel @matlab_students for your daily dose of inspiration, tips and tricks, and resources tailored specifically for students. Don't forget to let us know how you're using MATLAB & Simulink. Tag us on Instagram @matlab_students.  Link to License  If you have not yet created a MathWorks account, you can do so here: https://www.mathworks.com/mwaccount/register  Once you have a MathWorks account, you need to associate it with a license. Your activation key is included in this email and is required to complete the association process. Instructions for associating with a license are available here: http://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/answers/102871  Download and Install  Once you are associated with a license you need to download the software. Download instructions are available here: http://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/answers/98268  The installation will begin as soon as the download is complete.  Activate your Software  Once the software is installed MATLAB will attempt to activate itself. You will be required to enter your MathWorks account credentials again for activation. If the software does not automatically attempt to activate, you will need to launch the activation client: http://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/answers/99457-how-do-i-activate-matlab  In some setups, such as one where a firewall is in place or a proxy is filtering all network activity, you may need to activate MATLAB manually. Instructions for manual activation can be found here: http://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/answers/105854  To get MathWorks’ logos, the .zip file can be downloaded here: https://www.mathworks.com/content/dam/mathworks/mathworks-dot-com/images/company/brandguide/download/logos/mathworks-logos.zip  The extent of the permitted use of MathWorks’ logo is limited. If you intend to use the logo in any other way, please contact us again for approval. If you haven’t already, please consult the Usage Guidelines: https://www.mathworks.com/brand.html#logo  Here are additional resources for your team: Student Lounge Blog: https://blogs.mathworks.com/student-lounge/ Student Competition Support: http://www.mathworks.com/academia/student-competitions/  Best Regards, MathWorks Student Competition Program http://www.mathworks.com/academia/student-competitions/ 07152237 ref:_00Di0Ha1u._5003q1fRFd7:ref Hello Vansh Malani, I am pleased to inform you that your MathWorks license has been created.
